  Chapter 2

   ^1 vnps ky-tqryb qrbn mnxh lyhvh $lt yhyh qrbnv vy&q jlyh smn vntn jlyh
   lbnh.

   ^2 vhby`h `l-bny `hrn hkhnym vqm& msm ml` qm&v m$lth vmsmnh jl kl-lbnth
   vhq+yr hkhn `t-`zkrth hmzbxh `sh ryx nyxx lyhvh.

   ^3 vhnvtrt mn-hmnxh l`hrn vlbnyv qds qdsym m`sy yhvh.

   ^4 vky tqrb qrbn mnxh m`ph tnvr $lt xlvt m&t blvlt bsmn vrqyqy m&vt
   msxym bsmn.

   ^5 v`m-mnxh jl-hmxbt qrbnk $lt blvlh bsmn m&h thyh.

   ^6 ptvt `th ptym vy&qt jlyh smn mnxh hv`.

   ^7 v`m-mnxt mrxst qrbnk $lt bsmn tjsh.

   ^8 vhb`t `t-hmnxh `sr yjsh m`lh lyhvh vhqrybh `l-hkhn vhgysh `l- hmzbx.

   ^9 vhrym hkhn mn-hmnxh `t-`zkrth vhq+yr hmzbxh `sh ryx nyxx lyhvh.

   ^10 vhnvtrt mn-hmnxh l`hrn vlbnyv qds qdsym m`sy yhvh.

   ^11 kl-hmnxh `sr tqrybv lyhvh l` tjsh xm& ky kl-s`r vkl-dbs l`- tq+yrv
   mmnv `sh lyhvh.

   ^12 qrbn r`syt tqrybv `tm lyhvh v`l-hmzbx l`-yjlv lryx nyxx.

   ^13 vkl-qrbn mnxtk bmlx tmlx vl` tsbyt mlx bryt `lhyk mjl mnxtk jl
   kl-qrbnk tqryb mlx.

   ^14 v`m-tqryb mnxt bkvrym lyhvh `byb qlvy b`s grs krml tqryb `t mnxt
   bkvryk.

   ^15 vntt jlyh smn vsmt jlyh lbnh mnxh hv`.

   ^16 vhq+yr hkhn `t-`zkrth mgrsh vmsmnh jl kl-lbnth `sh lyhvh.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 3

   ^1 v`m-zbx slmym qrbnv `m mn-hbqr hv` mqryb `m-zkr `m-nqbh tmym yqrybnv
   lpny yhvh.

   ^2 v$mk ydv jl-r`s qrbnv vsx+v ptx `hl mvjd vzrqv bny `hrn hkhnym
   `t-hdm jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^3 vhqryb mzbx hslmym `sh lyhvh `t-hxlb hmk$h `t-hqrb v`t kl- hxlb `sr
   jl-hqrb.

   ^4 v`t sty hklyt v`t-hxlb `sr jlhn `sr jl-hk$lym v`t-hytrt jl- hkbd
   jl-hklyvt y$yrnh.

   ^5 vhq+yrv `tv bny-`hrn hmzbxh jl-hjlh `sr jl-hj&ym `sr jl-h`s `sh ryx
   nyxx lyhvh.

   ^6 v`m-mn-h&`n qrbnv lzbx slmym lyhvh zkr `v nqbh tmym yqrybnv.

   ^7 `m-ksb hv`-mqryb `t-qrbnv vhqryb `tv lpny yhvh.

   ^8 v$mk `t-ydv jl-r`s qrbnv vsx+ `tv lpny `hl mvjd vzrqv bny `hrn
   `t-dmv jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^9 vhqryb mzbx hslmym `sh lyhvh xlbv h`lyh tmymh ljmt hj&h y$yrnh
   v`t-hxlb hmk$h `t-hqrb v`t kl-hxlb `sr jl-hqrb.

   ^10 v`t sty hklyt v`t-hxlb `sr jlhn `sr jl-hk$lym v`t-hytrt jl- hkbd
   jl-hklyt y$yrnh.

   ^11 vhq+yrv hkhn hmzbxh lxm `sh lyhvh.

   ^12 v`m jz qrbnv vhqrybv lpny yhvh.

   ^13 v$mk `t-ydv jl-r`sv vsx+ `tv lpny `hl mvjd vzrqv bny `hrn `t- dmv
   jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^14 vhqryb mmnv qrbnv `sh lyhvh `t-hxlb hmk$h `t-hqrb v`t kl- hxlb `sr
   jl-hqrb.

   ^15 v`t sty hklyt v`t-hxlb `sr jlhn `sr jl-hk$lym v`t-hytrt jl- hkbd
   jl-hklyt y$yrnh.

   ^16 vhq+yrm hkhn hmzbxh lxm `sh lryx nyxx kl-xlb lyhvh.

   ^17 xqt jvlm ldrtykm bkl mvsbtykm kl-xlb vkl-dm l` t`klv.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 4

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-bny ysr`l l`mr nps ky-tx+` bsggh mkl m&vt yhvh `sr l` tjsynh
   vjsh m`xt mhnh.

   ^3 `m hkhn hmsyx yx+` l`smt hjm vhqryb jl x+`tv `sr x+` pr bn- bqr tmym
   lyhvh lx+`t.

   ^4 vhby` `t-hpr `l-ptx `hl mvjd lpny yhvh v$mk `t-ydv jl-r`s hpr vsx+
   `t-hpr lpny yhvh.

   ^5 vlqx hkhn hmsyx mdm hpr vhby` `tv `l-`hl mvjd.

   ^6 v+bl hkhn `t-`&bjv bdm vhzh mn-hdm sbj pjmym lpny yhvh `t-pny prkt
   hqds.

   ^7 vntn hkhn mn-hdm jl-qrnvt mzbx q+rt h$mym lpny yhvh `sr b`hl mvjd
   v`t kl-dm hpr yspk `l-y$vd mzbx hjlh `sr-ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^8 v`t-kl-xlb pr hx+`t yrym mmnv `t-hxlb hmk$h jl-hqrb v`t kl- hxlb `sr
   jl-hqrb.

   ^9 v`t sty hklyt v`t-hxlb `sr jlyhn `sr jl-hk$lym v`t-hytrt jl- hkbd
   jl-hklyvt y$yrnh.

   ^10 k`sr yvrm msvr zbx hslmym vhq+yrm hkhn jl mzbx hjlh.

   ^11 v`t-jvr hpr v`t-kl-bsrv jl-r`sv vjl-krjyv vqrbv vprsv.

   ^12 vhv&y` `t-kl-hpr `l-mxv& lmxnh `l-mqvm +hvr `l-spk hdsn vsrp `tv
   jl-j&ym b`s jl-spk hdsn ysrp.

   ^13 v`m kl-jdt ysr`l ysgv vnjlm dbr mjyny hqhl vjsv `xt mkl-m&vt yhvh
   `sr l`-tjsynh v`smv.

   ^14 vnvdjh hx+`t `sr x+`v jlyh vhqrybv hqhl pr bn-bqr lx+`t vhby`v `tv
   lpny `hl mvjd.

   ^15 v$mkv zqny hjdh `t-ydyhm jl-r`s hpr lpny yhvh vsx+ `t-hpr lpny
   yhvh.

   ^16 vhby` hkhn hmsyx mdm hpr `l-`hl mvjd.

   ^17 v+bl hkhn `&bjv mn-hdm vhzh sbj pjmym lpny yhvh `t pny hprkt.

   ^18 vmn-hdm ytn jl-qrnt hmzbx `sr lpny yhvh `sr b`hl mvjd v`t kl- hdm
   yspk `l-y$vd mzbx hjlh `sr-ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^19 v`t kl-xlbv yrym mmnv vhq+yr hmzbxh.

   ^20 vjsh lpr k`sr jsh lpr hx+`t kn yjsh-lv vkpr jlhm hkhn vn$lx lhm.

   ^21 vhv&y` `t-hpr `l-mxv& lmxnh vsrp `tv k`sr srp `t hpr hr`svn x+`t
   hqhl hv`.

   ^22 `sr nsy` yx+` vjsh `xt mkl-m&vt yhvh `lhyv `sr l`-tjsynh bsggh
   v`sm.

   ^23 `v-hvdj `lyv x+`tv `sr x+` bh vhby` `t-qrbnv sjyr jzym zkr tmym.

   ^24 v$mk ydv jl-r`s hsjyr vsx+ `tv bmqvm `sr-ysx+ `t-hjlh lpny yhvh
   x+`t hv`.

   ^25 vlqx hkhn mdm hx+`t b`&bjv vntn jl-qrnt mzbx hjlh v`t-dmv yspk
   `l-y$vd mzbx hjlh.

   ^26 v`t-kl-xlbv yq+yr hmzbxh kxlb zbx hslmym vkpr jlyv hkhn mx+`tv
   vn$lx lv.

   ^27 v`m-nps `xt tx+` bsggh mjm h`r& bjsth `xt mm&vt yhvh `sr l`- tjsynh
   v`sm.

   ^28 `v hvdj `lyv x+`tv `sr x+` vhby` qrbnv sjyrt jzym tmymh nqbh
   jl-x+`tv `sr x+`.

   ^29 v$mk `t-ydv jl r`s hx+`t vsx+ `t-hx+`t bmqvm hjlh.

   ^30 vlqx hkhn mdmh b`&bjv vntn jl-qrnt mzbx hjlh v`t-kl-dmh yspk
   `l-y$vd hmzbx.

   ^31 v`t-kl-xlbh y$yr k`sr hv$r xlb mjl zbx hslmym vhq+yr hkhn hmzbxh
   lryx nyxx lyhvh vkpr jlyv hkhn vn$lx lv.

   ^32 v`m-kbs yby` qrbnv lx+`t nqbh tmymh yby`nh.

   ^33 v$mk `t-ydv jl r`s hx+`t vsx+ `th lx+`t bmqvm `sr ysx+ `t- hjlh.

   ^34 vlqx hkhn mdm hx+`t b`&bjv vntn jl-qrnt mzbx hjlh v`t-kl-dmh yspk
   `l-y$vd hmzbx.

   ^35 v`t-kl-xlbh y$yr k`sr yv$r xlb-hksb mzbx hslmym vhq+yr hkhn `tm
   hmzbxh jl `sy yhvh vkpr jlyv hkhn jl-x+`tv `sr-x+` vn$lx lv.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 5

   ^1 vnps ky-tx+` vsmjh qvl `lh vhv` jd `v r`h `v ydj `m-lv` ygyd vns`
   jvnv.

   ^2 `v nps `sr tgj bkl-dbr +m` `v bnblt xyh +m`h `v bnblt bhmh +m`h `v
   bnblt sr& +m` vnjlm mmnv vhv` +m` v`sm.

   ^3 `v ky ygj b+m`t `dm lkl +m`tv `sr y+m` bh vnjlm mmnv vhv` ydj v`sm.

   ^4 `v nps ky tsbj lb+` bsptym lhrj `v lhy+yb lkl `sr yb+` h`dm bsbjh
   vnjlm mmnv vhv`-ydj v`sm l`xt m`lh.

   ^5 vhyh ky-y`sm l`xt m`lh vhtvdh `sr x+` jlyh.

   ^6 vhby` `t-`smv lyhvh jl x+`tv `sr x+` nqbh mn-h&`n ksbh `v- sjyrt
   jzym lx+`t vkpr jlyv hkhn mx+`tv.

   ^7 v`m-l` tgyj ydv dy sh vhby` `t-`smv `sr x+` sty trym `v-sny bny-yvnh
   lyhvh `xd lx+`t v`xd ljlh.

   ^8 vhby` `tm `l-hkhn vhqryb `t-`sr lx+`t r`svnh vmlq `t-r`sv mmvl jrpv
   vl` ybdyl.

   ^9 vhzh mdm hx+`t jl-qyr hmzbx vhns`r bdm ym&h `l-y$vd hmzbx x+`t hv`.

   ^10 v`t-hsny yjsh jlh kmsp+ vkpr jlyv hkhn mx+`tv `sr-x+` vn$lx lv.

   ^11 v`m-l` tsyg ydv lsty trym `v lsny bny-yvnh vhby` `t-qrbnv `sr x+`
   jsyrt h`ph $lt lx+`t l`-ysym jlyh smn vl`-ytn jlyh lbnh ky x+`t hv`.

   ^12 vhby`h `l-hkhn vqm& hkhn mmnh mlv` qm&v `t-`zkrth vhq+yr hmzbxh jl
   `sy yhvh x+`t hv`.

   ^13 vkpr jlyv hkhn jl-x+`tv `sr-x+` m`xt m`lh vn$lx lv vhyth lkhn
   kmnxh.

   ^14 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^15 nps ky-tmjl mjl vx+`h bsggh mqdsy yhvh vhby` `t-`smv lyhvh `yl tmym
   mn-h&`n bjrkk k$p-sqlym bsql-hqds l`sm.

   ^16 v`t `sr x+` mn-hqds yslm v`t-xmystv yv$p jlyv vntn `tv lkhn vhkhn
   ykpr jlyv b`yl h`sm vn$lx lv.

   ^17 v`m-nps ky tx+` vjsth `xt mkl-m&vt yhvh `sr l` tjsynh vl`- ydj v`sm
   vns` jvnv.

   ^18 vhby` `yl tmym mn-h&`n bjrkk l`sm `l-hkhn vkpr jlyv hkhn jl sggtv
   `sr-sgg vhv` l`-ydj vn$lx lv.

   ^19 `sm hv` `sm `sm lyhvh.

   ^20 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^21 nps ky tx+` vmjlh mjl byhvh vkxs bjmytv bpqdvn `v-btsvmt yd `v bgzl
   `v jsq `t-jmytv.

   ^22 `v-m&` `bdh vkxs bh vnsbj jl-sqr jl-`xt mkl `sr-yjsh h`dm lx+`
   bhnh.

   ^23 vhyh ky-yx+` v`sm vhsyb `t-hgzlh `sr gzl `v `t-hjsq `sr jsq `v
   `t-hpqdvn `sr hpqd `tv `v `t-h`bdh `sr m&`.

   ^24 `v mkl `sr-ysbj jlyv lsqr vslm `tv br`sv vxmstyv y$p jlyv l`sr hv`
   lv ytnnv byvm `smtv.

   ^25 v`t-`smv yby` lyhvh `yl tmym mn-h&`n bjrkk l`sm `l-hkhn.

   ^26 vkpr jlyv hkhn lpny yhvh vn$lx lv jl-`xt mkl `sr-yjsh l`smh bh.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 6

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 &v `t-`hrn v`t-bnyv l`mr z`t tvrt hjlh hv` hjlh jl mvqdh jl- hmzbx
   kl-hlylh jd-hbqr v`s hmzbx tvqd bv.

   ^3 vlbs hkhn mdv bd vmkn$y-bd ylbs jl-bsrv vhrym `t-hdsn `sr t`kl h`s
   `t-hjlh jl-hmzbx vsmv `&l hmzbx.

   ^4 vps+ `t-bgdyv vlbs bgdym `xrym vhv&y` `t-hdsn `l-mxv& lmxnh `l-mqvm
   +hvr.

   ^5 vh`s jl-hmzbx tvqd-bv l` tkbh vbjr jlyh hkhn j&ym bbqr bbqr vjrk
   jlyh hjlh vhq+yr jlyh xlby hslmym.

   ^6 `s tmyd tvqd jl-hmzbx l` tkbh.

   ^7 vz`t tvrt hmnxh hqrb `th bny-`hrn lpny yhvh `l-pny hmzbx.

   ^8 vhrym mmnv bqm&v m$lt hmnxh vmsmnh v`t kl-hlbnh `sr jl-hmnxh vhq+yr
   hmzbx ryx nyxx `zkrth lyhvh.

   ^9 vhnvtrt mmnh y`klv `hrn vbnyv m&vt t`kl bmqvm qds bx&r `hl- mvjd
   y`klvh.

   ^10 l` t`ph xm& xlqm ntty `th m`sy qds qdsym hv` kx+`t vk`sm.

   ^11 kl-zkr bbny `hrn y`klnh xq-jvlm ldrtykm m`sy yhvh kl `sr-ygj bhm
   yqds.

   ^12 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^13 zh qrbn `hrn vbnyv `sr-yqrybv lyhvh byvm hmsx `tv jsyrt h`ph $lt
   mnxh tmyd mx&yth bbqr vmx&yth bjrb.

   ^14 jl-mxbt bsmn tjsh mrbkt tby`nh tpyny mnxt ptym tqryb ryx- nyxx
   lyhvh.

   ^15 vhkhn hmsyx txtyv mbnyv yjsh `th xq-jvlm lyhvh klyl tq+r.

   ^16 vkl-mnxt khn klyl thyh l` t`kl.

   ^17 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^18 dbr `l-`hrn v`l-bnyv l`mr z`t tvrt hx+`t bmqvm `sr tsx+ hjlh tsx+
   hx+`t lpny yhvh qds qdsym hv`.

   ^19 hkhn hmx+` `th y`klnh bmqvm qds t`kl bx&r `hl mvjd.

   ^20 kl `sr-ygj bbsrh yqds v`sr yzh mdmh jl-hbgd `sr yzh jlyh tkb$ bmqvm
   qds.

   ^21 vkly-xrs `sr tbsl-bv ysbr v`m-bkly nxst bslh vmrq vs+p bmym.

   ^22 kl-zkr bkhnym y`kl `th qds qdsym hv`.

   ^23 vkl-x+`t `sr yvb` mdmh `l-`hl mvjd lkpr bqds l` t`kl b`s tsrp.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 7

   ^1 vz`t tvrt h`sm qds qdsym hv`.

   ^2 bmqvm `sr ysx+v `t-hjlh ysx+v `t-h`sm v`t-dmv yzrq jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^3 v`t kl-xlbv yqryb mmnv `t h`lyh v`t-hxlb hmk$h `t-hqrb.

   ^4 v`t sty hklyt v`t-hxlb `sr jlyhn `sr jl-hk$lym v`t-hytrt jl- hkbd
   jl-hklyt y$yrnh.

   ^5 vhq+yr `tm hkhn hmzbxh `sh lyhvh `sm hv`.

   ^6 kl-zkr bkhnym y`klnv bmqvm qdvs y`kl qds qdsym hv`.

   ^7 kx+`t k`sm tvrh `xt lhm hkhn `sr ykpr-bv lv yhyh.

   ^8 vhkhn hmqryb `t-jlt `ys jvr hjlh `sr hqryb lkhn lv yhyh.

   ^9 vkl-mnxh `sr t`ph btnvr vkl-njsh bmrxst vjl-mxbt lkhn hmqryb `th lv
   thyh.

   ^10 vkl-mnxh blvlh-bsmn vxrbh lkl-bny `hrn thyh `ys k`xyv.

   ^11 vz`t tvrt zbx hslmym `sr yqryb lyhvh.

   ^12 `m jl-tvdh yqrybnv vhqryb jl-zbx htvdh xlvt m&vt blvlt bsmn vrqyqy
   m&vt msxym bsmn v$lt mrbkt xlt blvlt bsmn.

   ^13 jl-xlt lxm xm& yqryb qrbnv jl-zbx tvdt slmyv.

   ^14 vhqryb mmnv `xd mkl-qrbn trvmh lyhvh lkhn hzrq `t-dm hslmym lv
   yhyh.

   ^15 vbsr zbx tvdt slmyv byvm qrbnv y`kl l`-ynyx mmnv jd-bqr.

   ^16 v`m-ndr `v ndbh zbx qrbnv byvm hqrybv `t-zbxv y`kl vmmxrt vhnvtr
   mmnv y`kl.

   ^17 vhnvtr mbsr hzbx byvm hslysy b`s ysrp.

   ^18 v`m h`kl y`kl mbsr-zbx slmyv byvm hslysy l` yr&h hmqryb `tv l` yxsb
   lv pgvl yhyh vhnps h`klt mmnv jvnh ts`.

   ^19 vhbsr `sr-ygj bkl-+m` l` y`kl b`s ysrp vhbsr kl-+hvr y`kl bsr.

   ^20 vhnps `sr-t`kl bsr mzbx hslmym `sr lyhvh v+m`tv jlyv vnkrth hnps
   hhv` mjmyh.

   ^21 vnps ky-tgj bkl-+m` b+m`t `dm `v bbhmh +m`h `v bkl-sq& +m` v`kl
   mbsr-zbx hslmym `sr lyhvh vnkrth hnps hhv` mjmyh.

   ^22 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^23 dbr `l-bny ysr`l l`mr kl-xlb svr vksb vjz l` t`klv.

   ^24 vxlb nblh vxlb +rph yjsh lkl-ml`kh v`kl l` t`klhv.

   ^25 ky kl-`kl xlb mn-hbhmh `sr yqryb mmnh `sh lyhvh vnkrth hnps h`klt
   mjmyh.

   ^26 vkl-dm l` t`klv bkl mvsbtykm ljvp vlbhmh.

   ^27 kl-nps `sr-t`kl kl-dm vnkrth hnps hhv` mjmyh.

   ^28 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^29 dbr `l-bny ysr`l l`mr hmqryb `t-zbx slmyv lyhvh yby` `t- qrbnv
   lyhvh mzbx slmyv.

   ^30 ydyv tby`ynh `t `sy yhvh `t-hxlb jl-hxzh yby`nv `t hxzh lhnyp `tv
   tnvph lpny yhvh.

   ^31 vhq+yr hkhn `t-hxlb hmzbxh vhyh hxzh l`hrn vlbnyv.

   ^32 v`t svq hymyn ttnv trvmh lkhn mzbxy slmykm.

   ^33 hmqryb `t-dm hslmym v`t-hxlb mbny `hrn lv thyh svq hymyn lmnh.

   ^34 ky `t-xzh htnvph v`t svq htrvmh lqxty m`t bny-ysr`l mzbxy slmyhm
   v`tn `tm l`hrn hkhn vlbnyv lxq-jvlm m`t bny ysr`l.

   ^35 z`t msxt `hrn vmsxt bnyv m`sy yhvh byvm hqryb `tm lkhn lyhvh.

   ^36 `sr &vh yhvh ltt lhm byvm msxv `tm m`t bny ysr`l xqt jvlm ldrtm.

   ^37 z`t htvrh ljlh lmnxh vlx+`t vl`sm vlmlv`ym vlzbx hslmym.

   ^38 `sr &vh yhvh `t-msh bhr $yny byvm &vtv `t-bny ysr`l lhqryb
   `t-qrbnyhm lyhvh bmdbr $yny.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 8

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 qx `t-`hrn v`t-bnyv `tv v`t hbgdym v`t smn hmsxh v`t pr hx+`t v`t
   sny h`ylym v`t $l hm&vt.

   ^3 v`t kl-hjdh hqhl `l-ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^4 vyjs msh k`sr &vh yhvh `tv vtqhl hjdh `l-ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^5 vy`mr msh `l-hjdh zh hdbr `sr-&vh yhvh ljsvt.

   ^6 vyqrb msh `t-`hrn v`t-bnyv vyrx& `tm bmym.

   ^7 vytn jlyv `t-hktnt vyxgr `tv b`bn+ vylbs `tv `t-hmjyl vytn jlyv
   `t-h`pd vyxgr `tv bxsb h`pd vy`pd lv bv.

   ^8 vysm jlyv `t-hxsn vytn `l-hxsn `t-h`vrym v`t-htmym.

   ^9 vysm `t-hm&npt jl-r`sv vysm jl-hm&npt `l-mvl pnyv `t &y& hzhb nzr
   hqds k`sr &vh yhvh `t-msh.

   ^10 vyqx msh `t-smn hmsxh vymsx `t-hmskn v`t-kl-`sr-bv vyqds `tm.

   ^11 vyz mmnv jl-hmzbx sbj pjmym vymsx `t-hmzbx v`t-kl-klyv v`t- hkyr
   v`t-knv lqdsm.

   ^12 vy&q msmn hmsxh jl r`s `hrn vymsx `tv lqdsv.

   ^13 vyqrb msh `t-bny `hrn vylbsm ktnt vyxgr `tm `bn+ vyxbs lhm mgbjvt
   k`sr &vh yhvh `t-msh.

   ^14 vygs `t pr hx+`t vy$mk `hrn vbnyv `t-ydyhm jl-r`s pr hx+`t.

   ^15 vysx+ vyqx msh `t-hdm vytn jl-qrnvt hmzbx $byb b`&bjv vyx+`
   `t-hmzbx v`t-hdm y&q `l-y$vd hmzbx vyqdshv lkpr jlyv.

   ^16 vyqx `t-kl-hxlb `sr jl-hqrb v`t ytrt hkbd v`t-sty hklyt v`t- xlbhn
   vyq+r msh hmzbxh.

   ^17 v`t-hpr v`t-jrv v`t-bsrv v`t-prsv srp b`s mxv& lmxnh k`sr &vh yhvh
   `t-msh.

   ^18 vyqrb `t `yl hjlh vy$mkv `hrn vbnyv `t-ydyhm jl-r`s h`yl.

   ^19 vysx+ vyzrq msh `t-hdm jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^20 v`t-h`yl ntx lntxyv vyq+r msh `t-hr`s v`t-hntxym v`t-hpdr.

   ^21 v`t-hqrb v`t-hkrjym rx& bmym vyq+r msh `t-kl-h`yl hmzbxh jlh hv`
   lryx-nyxx `sh hv` lyhvh k`sr &vh yhvh `t-msh.

   ^22 vyqrb `t-h`yl hsny `yl hml`ym vy$mkv `hrn vbnyv `t-ydyhm jl- r`s
   h`yl.

   ^23 vysx+ vyqx msh mdmv vytn jl-tnvk `zn-`hrn hymnyt vjl-bhn ydv hymnyt
   vjl-bhn rglv hymnyt.

   ^24 vyqrb `t-bny `hrn vytn msh mn-hdm jl-tnvk `znm hymnyt vjl- bhn ydm
   hymnyt vjl-bhn rglm hymnyt vyzrq msh `t-hdm jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^25 vyqx `t-hxlb v`t-h`lyh v`t-kl-hxlb `sr jl-hqrb v`t ytrt hkbd
   v`t-sty hklyt v`t-xlbhn v`t svq hymyn.

   ^26 vm$l hm&vt `sr lpny yhvh lqx xlt m&h `xt vxlt lxm smn `xt vrqyq `xd
   vysm jl-hxlbym vjl svq hymyn.

   ^27 vytn `t-hkl jl kpy `hrn vjl kpy bnyv vynp `tm tnvph lpny yhvh.

   ^28 vyqx msh `tm mjl kpyhm vyq+r hmzbxh jl-hjlh ml`ym hm lryx nyxx `sh
   hv` lyhvh.

   ^29 vyqx msh `t-hxzh vynyphv tnvph lpny yhvh m`yl hml`ym lmsh hyh lmnh
   k`sr &vh yhvh `t-msh.

   ^30 vyqx msh msmn hmsxh vmn-hdm `sr jl-hmzbx vyz jl-`hrn jl- bgdyv
   vjl-bnyv vjl-bgdy bnyv `tv vyqds `t-`hrn `t-bgdyv v`t- bnyv v`t-bgdy
   bnyv `tv.

   ^31 vy`mr msh `l-`hrn v`l-bnyv bslv `t-hbsr ptx `hl mvjd vsm t`klv `tv
   v`t-hlxm `sr b$l hml`ym k`sr &vyty l`mr `hrn vbnyv y`klhv.

   ^32 vhnvtr bbsr vblxm b`s tsrpv.

   ^33 vmptx `hl mvjd l` t&`v sbjt ymym jd yvm ml`t ymy ml`ykm ky sbjt
   ymym yml` `t-ydkm.

   ^34 k`sr jsh byvm hzh &vh yhvh ljst lkpr jlykm.

   ^35 vptx `hl mvjd tsbv yvmm vlylh sbjt ymym vsmrtm `t-msmrt yhvh vl`
   tmvtv ky-kn &vyty.

   ^36 vyjs `hrn vbnyv `t kl-hdbrym `sr-&vh yhvh byd-msh.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 9

   ^1 vyhy byvm hsmyny qr` msh l`hrn vlbnyv vlzqny ysr`l.

   ^2 vy`mr `l-`hrn qx-lk jgl bn-bqr lx+`t v`yl ljlh tmymm vhqrb lpny
   yhvh.

   ^3 v`l-bny ysr`l tdbr l`mr qxv sjyr-jzym lx+`t vjgl vkbs bny-snh tmymm
   ljlh.

   ^4 vsvr v`yl lslmym lzbx lpny yhvh vmnxh blvlh bsmn ky hyvm yhvh nr`h
   `lykm.

   ^5 vyqxv `t `sr &vh msh `l-pny `hl mvjd vyqrbv kl-hjdh vyjmdv lpny
   yhvh.

   ^6 vy`mr msh zh hdbr `sr-&vh yhvh tjsv vyr` `lykm kbvd yhvh.

   ^7 vy`mr msh `l-`hrn qrb `l-hmzbx vjsh `t-x+`tk v`t-jltk vkpr bjdk vbjd
   hjm vjsh `t-qrbn hjm vkpr bjdm k`sr &vh yhvh.

   ^8 vyqrb `hrn `l-hmzbx vysx+ `t-jgl hx+`t `sr-lv.

   ^9 vyqrbv bny `hrn `t-hdm `lyv vy+bl `&bjv bdm vytn jl-qrnvt hmzbx
   v`t-hdm y&q `l-y$vd hmzbx.

   ^10 v`t-hxlb v`t-hklyt v`t-hytrt mn-hkbd mn-hx+`t hq+yr hmzbxh k`sr &vh
   yhvh `t-msh.

   ^11 v`t-hbsr v`t-hjvr srp b`s mxv& lmxnh.

   ^12 vysx+ `t-hjlh vym&`v bny `hrn `lyv `t-hdm vyzrqhv jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^13 v`t-hjlh hm&y`v `lyv lntxyh v`t-hr`s vyq+r jl-hmzbx.

   ^14 vyrx& `t-hqrb v`t-hkrjym vyq+r jl-hjlh hmzbxh.

   ^15 vyqrb `t qrbn hjm vyqx `t-sjyr hx+`t `sr ljm vysx+hv vyx+`hv
   kr`svn.

   ^16 vyqrb `t-hjlh vyjsh kmsp+.

   ^17 vyqrb `t-hmnxh vyml` kpv mmnh vyq+r jl-hmzbx mlbd jlt hbqr.

   ^18 vysx+ `t-hsvr v`t-h`yl zbx hslmym `sr ljm vym&`v bny `hrn `t- hdm
   `lyv vyzrqhv jl-hmzbx $byb.

   ^19 v`t-hxlbym mn-hsvr vmn-h`yl h`lyh vhmk$h vhklyt vytrt hkbd.

   ^20 vysymv `t-hxlbym jl-hxzvt vyq+r hxlbym hmzbxh.

   ^21 v`t hxzvt v`t svq hymyn hnyp `hrn tnvph lpny yhvh k`sr &vh msh.

   ^22 vys` `hrn `t-ydv `l-hjm vybrkm vyrd mjst hx+`t vhjlh vhslmym.

   ^23 vyb` msh v`hrn `l-`hl mvjd vy&`v vybrkv `t-hjm vyr` kbvd- yhvh
   `l-kl-hjm.

   ^24 vt&` `s mlpny yhvh vt`kl jl-hmzbx `t-hjlh v`t-hxlbym vyr` kl- hjm
   vyrnv vyplv jl-pnyhm.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 10

   ^1 vyqxv bny-`hrn ndb v`byhv` `ys mxttv vytnv bhn `s vysymv jlyh q+rt
   vyqrybv lpny yhvh `s zrh `sr l` &vh `tm.

   ^2 vt&` `s mlpny yhvh vt`kl `vtm vymtv lpny yhvh.

   ^3 vy`mr msh `l-`hrn hv` `sr-dbr yhvh l`mr bqrby `qds vjl-pny kl- hjm
   `kbd vydm `hrn.

   ^4 vyqr` msh `l-mys`l v`l `l&pn bny jzy`l dd `hrn vy`mr `lhm qrbv s`v
   `t-`xykm m`t pny-hqds `l-mxv& lmxnh.

   ^5 vyqrbv vys`m bktntm `l-mxv& lmxnh k`sr dbr msh.

   ^6 vy`mr msh `l-`hrn vl`ljzr vl`ytmr bnyv r`sykm `l-tprjv vbgdykm
   l`-tprmv vl` tmtv vjl kl-hjdh yq&p v`xykm kl-byt ysr`l ybkv `t-hsrph
   `sr srp yhvh.

   ^7 vmptx `hl mvjd l` t&`v pn-tmtv ky-smn msxt yhvh jlykm vyjsv kdbr
   msh.

   ^8 vydbr yhvh `l-`hrn l`mr.

   ^9 yyn vskr `l-tst `th vbnyk `tk bb`km `l-`hl mvjd vl` tmtv xqt jvlm
   ldrtykm.

   ^10 vlhbdyl byn hqds vbyn hxl vbyn h+m` vbyn h+hvr.

   ^11 vlhvrt `t-bny ysr`l `t kl-hxqym `sr dbr yhvh `lyhm byd-msh.

   ^12 vydbr msh `l-`hrn v`l `ljzr v`l-`ytmr bnyv hnvtrym qxv `t- hmnxh
   hnvtrt m`sy yhvh v`klvh m&vt `&l hmzbx ky qds qdsym hv`.

   ^13 v`kltm `th bmqvm qdvs ky xqk vxq-bnyk hv` m`sy yhvh ky-kn &vyty.

   ^14 v`t xzh htnvph v`t svq htrvmh t`klv bmqvm +hvr `th vbnyk vbntyk `tk
   ky-xqk vxq-bnyk ntnv mzbxy slmy bny ysr`l.

   ^15 svq htrvmh vxzh htnvph jl `sy hxlbym yby`v lhnyp tnvph lpny yhvh
   vhyh lk vlbnyk `tk lxq-jvlm k`sr &vh yhvh.

   ^16 v`t sjyr hx+`t drs drs msh vhnh srp vyq&p jl-`ljzr vjl-`ytmr bny
   `hrn hnvtrm l`mr.

   ^17 mdvj l`-`kltm `t-hx+`t bmqvm hqds ky qds qdsym hv` v`th ntn lkm
   ls`t `t-jvn hjdh lkpr jlyhm lpny yhvh.

   ^18 hn l`-hvb` `t-dmh `l-hqds pnymh `kvl t`klv `th bqds k`sr &vyty.

   ^19 vydbr `hrn `l-msh hn hyvm hqrybv `t-x+`tm v`t-jltm lpny yhvh
   vtqr`nh `ty k`lh v`klty x+`t hyvm hyy+b bjyny yhvh.

   ^20 vysmj msh vyy+b bjynyv.

  Chapter 11

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh v`l-`hrn l`mr `lhm.

   ^2 dbrv `l-bny ysr`l l`mr z`t hxyh `sr t`klv mkl-hbhmh `sr jl- h`r&.

   ^3 kl mpr$t pr$h vs$jt s$j pr$t mjlt grh bbhmh `th t`klv.

   ^4 `k `t-zh l` t`klv mmjly hgrh vmmpr$y hpr$h `t-hgml ky-mjlh grh hv`
   vpr$h `ynnv mpry$ +m` hv` lkm.

   ^5 v`t-hspn ky-mjlh grh hv` vpr$h l` ypry$ +m` hv` lkm.

   ^6 v`t-h`rnbt ky-mjlt grh hv` vpr$h l` hpry$h +m`h hv` lkm.

   ^7 v`t-hxzyr ky-mpry$ pr$h hv` vs$j s$j pr$h vhv` grh l`-ygr +m` hv`
   lkm.

   ^8 mbsrm l` t`klv vbnbltm l` tgjv +m`ym hm lkm.

   ^9 `t-zh t`klv mkl `sr bmym kl `sr-lv $npyr vqsqst bmym bymym vbnxlym
   `tm t`klv.

   ^10 vkl `sr `yn-lv $npyr vqsqst bymym vbnxlym mkl sr& hmym vmkl nps
   hxyh `sr bmym sq& hm lkm.

   ^11 vsq& yhyv lkm mbsrm l` t`klv v`t-nbltm tsq&v.

   ^12 kl `sr `yn-lv $npyr vqsqst bmym sq& hv` lkm.

   ^13 v`t-`lh tsq&v mn-hjvp l` y`klv sq& hm `t-hnsr v`t-hpr$ v`t hjznyh.

   ^14 v`t-hd`h v`t-h`yh lmynh.

   ^15 `t kl-jrb lmynv.

   ^16 v`t bt hyjnh v`t-htxm$ v`t-hsxp v`t-hn& lmynhv.

   ^17 v`t-hkv$ v`t-hslk v`t-hynsvp.

   ^18 v`t-htnsmt v`t-hq`t v`t-hrxm.

   ^19 v`t hx$ydh h`nph lmynh v`t-hdvkypt v`t-hj+lp.

   ^20 kl sr& hjvp hhlk jl-`rbj sq& hv` lkm.

   ^21 `k `t-zh t`klv mkl sr& hjvp hhlk jl-`rbj `sr-l` krjym mmjl lrglyv
   lntr bhn jl-h`r&.

   ^22 `t-`lh mhm t`klv `t-h`rbh lmynv v`t-h$ljm lmynhv v`t-hxrgl lmynhv
   v`t-hxgb lmynhv.

   ^23 vkl sr& hjvp `sr-lv `rbj rglym sq& hv` lkm.

   ^24 vl`lh t+m`v kl-hngj bnbltm y+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^25 vkl-hns` mnbltm ykb$ bgdyv v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^26 lkl-hbhmh `sr hv` mpr$t pr$h vs$j `ynnh s$jt vgrh `ynnh mjlh +m`ym
   hm lkm kl-hngj bhm y+m`.

   ^27 vkl hvlk jl-kpyv bkl-hxyh hhlkt jl-`rbj +m`ym hm lkm kl-hngj bnbltm
   y+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^28 vhns` `t-nbltm ykb$ bgdyv v+m` jd-hjrb +m`ym hmh lkm.

   ^29 vzh lkm h+m` bsr& hsr& jl-h`r& hxld vhjkbr vh&b lmynhv.

   ^30 vh`nqh vhkx vhl+`h vhxm+ vhtnsmt.

   ^31 `lh h+m`ym lkm bkl-hsr& kl-hngj bhm bmtm y+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^32 vkl `sr-ypl-jlyv mhm bmtm y+m` mkl-kly-j& `v bgd `v-jvr `v sq
   kl-kly `sr-yjsh ml`kh bhm bmym yvb` v+m` jd-hjrb v+hr.

   ^33 vkl-kly-xrs `sr-ypl mhm `l-tvkv kl `sr btvkv y+m` v`tv tsbrv.

   ^34 mkl-h`kl `sr y`kl `sr ybv` jlyv mym y+m` vkl-msqh `sr ysth bkl-kly
   y+m`.

   ^35 vkl `sr-ypl mnbltm jlyv y+m` tnvr vkyrym yt& +m`ym hm v+m`ym yhyv
   lkm.

   ^36 `k mjyn vbvr mqvh-mym yhyh +hvr vngj bnbltm y+m`.

   ^37 vky ypl mnbltm jl-kl-zrj zrvj `sr yzrj +hvr hv`.

   ^38 vky ytn-mym jl-zrj vnpl mnbltm jlyv +m` hv` lkm.

   ^39 vky ymvt mn-hbhmh `sr-hy` lkm l`klh hngj bnblth y+m` jd- hjrb.

   ^40 vh`kl mnblth ykb$ bgdyv v+m` jd-hjrb vhns` `t-nblth ykb$ bgdyv v+m`
   jd-hjrb.

   ^41 vkl-hsr& hsr& jl-h`r& sq& hv` l` y`kl.

   ^42 kl hvlk jl-gxvn vkl hvlk jl-`rbj jd kl-mrbh rglym lkl-hsr& hsr&
   jl-h`r& l` t`klvm ky-sq& hm.

   ^43 `l-tsq&v `t-npstykm bkl-hsr& hsr& vl` t+m`v bhm vn+mtm bm.

   ^44 ky `ny yhvh `lhykm vhtqdstm vhyytm qdsym ky qdvs `ny vl` t+m`v
   `t-npstykm bkl-hsr& hrms jl-h`r&.

   ^45 ky `ny yhvh hmjlh `tkm m`r& m&rym lhyt lkm l`lhym vhyytm qdsym ky
   qdvs `ny.

   ^46 z`t tvrt hbhmh vhjvp vkl nps hxyh hrmst bmym vlkl-nps hsr&t
   jl-h`r&.

   ^47 lhbdyl byn h+m` vbyn h+hr vbyn hxyh hn`klt vbyn hxyh `sr l` t`kl.

  Chapter 12

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-bny ysr`l l`mr `sh ky tzryj vyldh zkr v+m`h sbjt ymym kymy
   ndt dvth t+m`.

   ^3 vbyvm hsmyny ymvl bsr jrltv.

   ^4 vslsym yvm vslst ymym tsb bdmy +hrh bkl-qds l`-tgj v`l-hmqds l` tb`
   jd-ml`t ymy +hrh.

   ^5 v`m-nqbh tld v+m`h sbjym kndth vssym yvm vsst ymym tsb jl-dmy +hrh.

   ^6 vbml`t ymy +hrh lbn `v lbt tby` kbs bn-sntv ljlh vbn-yvnh `v- tr
   lx+`t `l-ptx `hl-mvjd `l-hkhn.

   ^7 vhqrybv lpny yhvh vkpr jlyh v+hrh mmqr dmyh z`t tvrt hyldt lzkr `v
   lnqbh.

   ^8 v`m-l` tm&` ydh dy sh vlqxh sty-trym `v sny bny yvnh `xd ljlh v`xd
   lx+`t vkpr jlyh hkhn v+hrh.

  Chapter 13

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh v`l-`hrn l`mr.

   ^2 `dm ky-yhyh bjvr-bsrv s`t `v-$pxt `v bhrt vhyh bjvr-bsrv lngj &rjt
   vhvb` `l-`hrn hkhn `v `l-`xd mbnyv hkhnym.

   ^3 vr`h hkhn `t-hngj bjvr-hbsr vsjr bngj hpk lbn vmr`h hngj jmq mjvr
   bsrv ngj &rjt hv` vr`hv hkhn v+m` `tv.

   ^4 v`m-bhrt lbnh hv` bjvr bsrv vjmq `yn-mr`h mn-hjvr vsjrh l`- hpk lbn
   vh$gyr hkhn `t-hngj sbjt ymym.

   ^5 vr`hv hkhn byvm hsbyjy vhnh hngj jmd bjynyv l`-psh hngj bjvr vh$gyrv
   hkhn sbjt ymym snyt.

   ^6 vr`h hkhn `tv byvm hsbyjy snyt vhnh khh hngj vl`-psh hngj bjvr v+hrv
   hkhn m$pxt hv` vkb$ bgdyv v+hr.

   ^7 v`m-psh tpsh hm$pxt bjvr `xry hr`tv `l-hkhn l+hrtv vnr`h snyt
   `l-hkhn.

   ^8 vr`h hkhn vhnh psth hm$pxt bjvr v+m`v hkhn &rjt hv`.

   ^9 ngj &rjt ky thyh b`dm vhvb` `l-hkhn.

   ^10 vr`h hkhn vhnh s`t-lbnh bjvr vhy` hpkh sjr lbn vmxyt bsr xy bs`t.

   ^11 &rjt nvsnt hv` bjvr bsrv v+m`v hkhn l` y$grnv ky +m` hv`.

   ^12 v`m-prvx tprx h&rjt bjvr vk$th h&rjt `t kl-jvr hngj mr`sv vjd-rglyv
   lkl-mr`h jyny hkhn.

   ^13 vr`h hkhn vhnh k$th h&rjt `t-kl-bsrv v+hr `t-hngj klv hpk lbn +hvr
   hv`.

   ^14 vbyvm hr`vt bv bsr xy y+m`.

   ^15 vr`h hkhn `t-hbsr hxy v+m`v hbsr hxy +m` hv` &rjt hv`.

   ^16 `v ky ysvb hbsr hxy vnhpk llbn vb` `l-hkhn.

   ^17 vr`hv hkhn vhnh nhpk hngj llbn v+hr hkhn `t-hngj +hvr hv`.

   ^18 vbsr ky-yhyh bv-bjrv sxyn vnrp`.

   ^19 vhyh bmqvm hsxyn s`t lbnh `v bhrt lbnh `dmdmt vnr`h `l-hkhn.

   ^20 vr`h hkhn vhnh mr`h spl mn-hjvr vsjrh hpk lbn v+m`v hkhn ngj- &rjt
   hv` bsxyn prxh.

   ^21 v`m yr`nh hkhn vhnh `yn-bh sjr lbn vsplh `ynnh mn-hjvr vhy` khh
   vh$gyrv hkhn sbjt ymym.

   ^22 v`m-psh tpsh bjvr v+m` hkhn `tv ngj hv`.

   ^23 v`m-txtyh tjmd hbhrt l` psth &rbt hsxyn hv` v+hrv hkhn.

   ^24 `v bsr ky-yhyh bjrv mkvt-`s vhyth mxyt hmkvh bhrt lbnh `dmdmt `v
   lbnh.

   ^25 vr`h `th hkhn vhnh nhpk sjr lbn bbhrt vmr`h jmq mn-hjvr &rjt hv`
   bmkvh prxh v+m` `tv hkhn ngj &rjt hv`.

   ^26 v`m yr`nh hkhn vhnh `yn-bbhrt sjr lbn vsplh `ynnh mn-hjvr vhv` khh
   vh$gyrv hkhn sbjt ymym.

   ^27 vr`hv hkhn byvm hsbyjy `m-psh tpsh bjvr v+m` hkhn `tv ngj &rjt hv`.

   ^28 v`m-txtyh tjmd hbhrt l`-psth bjvr vhv` khh s`t hmkvh hv` v+hrv hkhn
   ky-&rbt hmkvh hv`.

   ^29 v`ys `v `sh ky-yhyh bv ngj br`s `v bzqn.

   ^30 vr`h hkhn `t-hngj vhnh mr`hv jmq mn-hjvr vbv sjr &hb dq v+m` `tv
   hkhn ntq hv` &rjt hr`s `v hzqn hv`.

   ^31 vky-yr`h hkhn `t-ngj hntq vhnh `yn-mr`hv jmq mn-hjvr vsjr sxr `yn
   bv vh$gyr hkhn `t-ngj hntq sbjt ymym.

   ^32 vr`h hkhn `t-hngj byvm hsbyjy vhnh l`-psh hntq vl`-hyh bv sjr &hb
   vmr`h hntq `yn jmq mn-hjvr.

   ^33 vhtglx v`t-hntq l` yglx vh$gyr hkhn `t-hntq sbjt ymym snyt.

   ^34 vr`h hkhn `t-hntq byvm hsbyjy vhnh l`-psh hntq bjvr vmr`hv `ynnv
   jmq mn-hjvr v+hr `tv hkhn vkb$ bgdyv v+hr.

   ^35 v`m-psh ypsh hntq bjvr `xry +hrtv.

   ^36 vr`hv hkhn vhnh psh hntq bjvr l`-ybqr hkhn lsjr h&hb +m` hv`.

   ^37 v`m-bjynyv jmd hntq vsjr sxr &mx-bv nrp` hntq +hvr hv` v+hrv hkhn.

   ^38 v`ys `v-`sh ky-yhyh bjvr-bsrm bhrt bhrt lbnt.

   ^39 vr`h hkhn vhnh bjvr-bsrm bhrt khvt lbnt bhq hv` prx bjvr +hvr hv`.

   ^40 v`ys ky ymr+ r`sv qrx hv` +hvr hv`.

   ^41 v`m mp`t pnyv ymr+ r`sv gbx hv` +hvr hv`.

   ^42 vky-yhyh bqrxt `v bgbxt ngj lbn `dmdm &rjt prxt hv` bqrxtv `v
   bgbxtv.

   ^43 vr`h `tv hkhn vhnh s`t-hngj lbnh `dmdmt bqrxtv `v bgbxtv kmr`h &rjt
   jvr bsr.

   ^44 `ys-&rvj hv` +m` hv` +m` y+m`nv hkhn br`sv ngjv.

   ^45 vh&rvj `sr-bv hngj bgdyv yhyv prmym vr`sv yhyh prvj vjl-spm yj+h
   v+m` +m` yqr`.

   ^46 kl-ymy `sr hngj bv y+m` +m` hv` bdd ysb mxv& lmxnh mvsbv.

   ^47 vhbgd ky-yhyh bv ngj &rjt bbgd &mr `v bbgd pstym.

   ^48 `v bsty `v bjrb lpstym vl&mr `v bjvr `v bkl-ml`kt jvr.

   ^49 vhyh hngj yrqrq `v `dmdm bbgd `v bjvr `v-bsty `v-bjrb `v bkl-
   kly-jvr ngj &rjt hv` vhr`h `t-hkhn.

   ^50 vr`h hkhn `t-hngj vh$gyr `t-hngj sbjt ymym.

   ^51 vr`h `t-hngj byvm hsbyjy ky-psh hngj bbgd `v-bsty `v-bjrb `v bjvr
   lkl `sr-yjsh hjvr lml`kh &rjt mm`rt hngj +m` hv`.

   ^52 vsrp `t-hbgd `v `t-hsty `v `t-hjrb b&mr `v bpstym `v `t-kl- kly
   hjvr `sr-yhyh bv hngj ky-&rjt mm`rt hv` b`s tsrp.

   ^53 v`m yr`h hkhn vhnh l`-psh hngj bbgd `v bsty `v bjrb `v bkl-
   kly-jvr.

   ^54 v&vh hkhn vkb$v `t `sr-bv hngj vh$gyrv sbjt-ymym snyt.

   ^55 vr`h hkhn `xry hkb$ `t-hngj vhnh l`-hpk hngj `t-jynv vhngj l`-psh
   +m` hv` b`s tsrpnv pxtt hv` bqrxtv `v bgbxtv.

   ^56 v`m r`h hkhn vhnh khh hngj `xry hkb$ `tv vqrj `tv mn-hbgd `v
   mn-hjvr `v mn-hsty `v mn-hjrb.

   ^57 v`m-tr`h jvd bbgd `v-bsty `v-bjrb `v bkl-kly-jvr prxt hv` b`s
   tsrpnv `t `sr-bv hngj.

   ^58 vhbgd `v-hsty `v-hjrb `v-kl-kly hjvr `sr tkb$ v$r mhm hngj vkb$
   snyt v+hr.

   ^59 z`t tvrt ngj-&rjt bgd h&mr `v hpstym `v hsty `v hjrb `v kl- kly-jvr
   l+hrv `v l+m`v.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 14

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 z`t thyh tvrt hm&rj byvm +hrtv vhvb` `l-hkhn.

   ^3 vy&` hkhn `l-mxv& lmxnh vr`h hkhn vhnh nrp` ngj-h&rjt mn- h&rvj.

   ^4 v&vh hkhn vlqx lm+hr sty-&prym xyvt +hrvt vj& `rz vsny tvljt v`zb.

   ^5 v&vh hkhn vsx+ `t-h&pvr h`xt `l-kly-xrs jl-mym xyym.

   ^6 `t-h&pr hxyh yqx `th v`t-j& h`rz v`t-sny htvljt v`t-h`zb v+bl `vtm
   v`t h&pr hxyh bdm h&pr hsx+h jl hmym hxyym.

   ^7 vhzh jl hm+hr mn-h&rjt sbj pjmym v+hrv vslx `t-h&pr hxyh jl- pny
   hsdh.

   ^8 vkb$ hm+hr `t-bgdyv vglx `t-kl-sjrv vrx& bmym v+hr v`xr ybv`
   `l-hmxnh vysb mxv& l`hlv sbjt ymym.

   ^9 vhyh byvm hsbyjy yglx `t-kl-sjrv `t-r`sv v`t-zqnv v`t gbt jynyv
   v`t-kl-sjrv yglx vkb$ `t-bgdyv vrx& `t-bsrv bmym v+hr.

   ^10 vbyvm hsmyny yqx sny-kbsym tmymm vkbsh `xt bt-snth tmymh vslsh
   jsrnym $lt mnxh blvlh bsmn vlg `xd smn.

   ^11 vhjmyd hkhn hm+hr `t h`ys hm+hr v`tm lpny yhvh ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^12 vlqx hkhn `t-hkbs h`xd vhqryb `tv l`sm v`t-lg hsmn vhnyp `tm tnvph
   lpny yhvh.

   ^13 vsx+ `t-hkbs bmqvm `sr ysx+ `t-hx+`t v`t-hjlh bmqvm hqds ky kx+`t
   h`sm hv` lkhn qds qdsym hv`.

   ^14 vlqx hkhn mdm h`sm vntn hkhn jl-tnvk `zn hm+hr hymnyt vjl- bhn ydv
   hymnyt vjl-bhn rglv hymnyt.

   ^15 vlqx hkhn mlg hsmn vy&q jl-kp hkhn hsm`lyt.

   ^16 v+bl hkhn `t-`&bjv hymnyt mn-hsmn `sr jl-kpv hsm`lyt vhzh mn- hsmn
   b`&bjv sbj pjmym lpny yhvh.

   ^17 vmytr hsmn `sr jl-kpv ytn hkhn jl-tnvk `zn hm+hr hymnyt vjl- bhn
   ydv hymnyt vjl-bhn rglv hymnyt jl dm h`sm.

   ^18 vhnvtr bsmn `sr jl-kp hkhn ytn jl-r`s hm+hr vkpr jlyv hkhn lpny
   yhvh.

   ^19 vjsh hkhn `t-hx+`t vkpr jl-hm+hr m+m`tv v`xr ysx+ `t-hjlh.

   ^20 vhjlh hkhn `t-hjlh v`t-hmnxh hmzbxh vkpr jlyv hkhn v+hr.

   ^21 v`m-dl hv` v`yn ydv msgt vlqx kbs `xd `sm ltnvph lkpr jlyv vjsrvn
   $lt `xd blvl bsmn lmnxh vlg smn.

   ^22 vsty trym `v sny bny yvnh `sr tsyg ydv vhyh `xd x+`t vh`xd jlh.

   ^23 vhby` `tm byvm hsmyny l+hrtv `l-hkhn `l-ptx `hl-mvjd lpny yhvh.

   ^24 vlqx hkhn `t-kbs h`sm v`t-lg hsmn vhnyp `tm hkhn tnvph lpny yhvh.

   ^25 vsx+ `t-kbs h`sm vlqx hkhn mdm h`sm vntn jl-tnvk `zn-hm+hr hymnyt
   vjl-bhn ydv hymnyt vjl-bhn rglv hymnyt.

   ^26 vmn-hsmn y&q hkhn jl-kp hkhn hsm`lyt.

   ^27 vhzh hkhn b`&bjv hymnyt mn-hsmn `sr jl-kpv hsm`lyt sbj pjmym lpny
   yhvh.

   ^28 vntn hkhn mn-hsmn `sr jl-kpv jl-tnvk `zn hm+hr hymnyt vjl- bhn ydv
   hymnyt vjl-bhn rglv hymnyt jl-mqvm dm h`sm.

   ^29 vhnvtr mn-hsmn `sr jl-kp hkhn ytn jl-r`s hm+hr lkpr jlyv lpny yhvh.

   ^30 vjsh `t-h`xd mn-htrym `v mn-bny hyvnh m`sr tsyg ydv.

   ^31 `t `sr-tsyg ydv `t-h`xd x+`t v`t-h`xd jlh jl-hmnxh vkpr hkhn jl
   hm+hr lpny yhvh.

   ^32 z`t tvrt `sr-bv ngj &rjt `sr l`-tsyg ydv b+hrtv.

   ^33 vydbr yhvh `l-msh v`l-`hrn l`mr.

   ^34 ky tb`v `l-`r& knjn `sr `ny ntn lkm l`xzh vntty ngj &rjt bbyt `r&
   `xztkm.

   ^35 vb` `sr-lv hbyt vhgyd lkhn l`mr kngj nr`h ly bbyt.

   ^36 v&vh hkhn vpnv `t-hbyt b+rm yb` hkhn lr`vt `t-hngj vl` y+m` kl-`sr
   bbyt v`xr kn yb` hkhn lr`vt `t-hbyt.

   ^37 vr`h `t-hngj vhnh hngj bqyrt hbyt sqjrvrt yrqrqt `v `dmdmt vmr`yhn
   spl mn-hqyr.

   ^38 vy&` hkhn mn-hbyt `l-ptx hbyt vh$gyr `t-hbyt sbjt ymym.

   ^39 vsb hkhn byvm hsbyjy vr`h vhnh psh hngj bqyrt hbyt.

   ^40 v&vh hkhn vxl&v `t-h`bnym `sr bhn hngj vhslykv `thn `l-mxv& ljyr
   `l-mqvm +m`.

   ^41 v`t-hbyt yq&j mbyt $byb vspkv `t-hjpr `sr hq&v `l-mxv& ljyr `l-mqvm
   +m`.

   ^42 vlqxv `bnym `xrvt vhby`v `l-txt h`bnym vjpr `xr yqx v+x `t- hbyt.

   ^43 v`m-ysvb hngj vprx bbyt `xr xl& `t-h`bnym v`xry hq&vt `t- hbyt
   v`xry h+vx.

   ^44 vb` hkhn vr`h vhnh psh hngj bbyt &rjt mm`rt hv` bbyt +m` hv`.

   ^45 vnt& `t-hbyt `t-`bnyv v`t-j&yv v`t kl-jpr hbyt vhv&y` `l- mxv& ljyr
   `l-mqvm +m`.

   ^46 vhb` `l-hbyt kl-ymy h$gyr `tv y+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^47 vhskb bbyt ykb$ `t-bgdyv vh`kl bbyt ykb$ `t-bgdyv.

   ^48 v`m-b` yb` hkhn vr`h vhnh l`-psh hngj bbyt `xry h+x `t-hbyt v+hr
   hkhn `t-hbyt ky nrp` hngj.

   ^49 vlqx lx+` `t-hbyt sty &prym vj& `rz vsny tvljt v`zb.

   ^50 vsx+ `t-h&pr h`xt `l-kly-xrs jl-mym xyym.

   ^51 vlqx `t-j&-h`rz v`t-h`zb v`t sny htvljt v`t h&pr hxyh v+bl `tm bdm
   h&pr hsxv+h vbmym hxyym vhzh `l-hbyt sbj pjmym.

   ^52 vx+` `t-hbyt bdm h&pvr vbmym hxyym vb&pr hxyh vbj& h`rz vb`zb vbsny
   htvljt.

   ^53 vslx `t-h&pr hxyh `l-mxv& ljyr `l-pny hsdh vkpr jl-hbyt v+hr.

   ^54 z`t htvrh lkl-ngj h&rjt vlntq.

   ^55 vl&rjt hbgd vlbyt.

   ^56 vls`t vl$pxt vlbhrt.

   ^57 lhvrt byvm h+m` vbyvm h+hr z`t tvrt h&rjt.

  Chapter 15

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh v`l-`hrn l`mr.

   ^2 dbrv `l-bny ysr`l v`mrtm `lhm `ys `ys ky yhyh zb mbsrv zvbv +m` hv`.

   ^3 vz`t thyh +m`tv bzvbv rr bsrv `t-zvbv `v-hxtym bsrv mzvbv +m`tv hv`.

   ^4 kl-hmskb `sr yskb jlyv hzb y+m` vkl-hkly `sr-ysb jlyv y+m`.

   ^5 v`ys `sr ygj bmskbv ykb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^6 vhysb jl-hkly `sr-ysb jlyv hzb ykb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd- hjrb.

   ^7 vhngj bbsr hzb ykb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^8 vky-yrq hzb b+hvr vkb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^9 vkl-hmrkb `sr yrkb jlyv hzb y+m`.

   ^10 vkl-hngj bkl `sr yhyh txtyv y+m` jd-hjrb vhnvs` `vtm ykb$ bgdyv
   vrx& bmym v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^11 vkl `sr ygj-bv hzb vydyv l`-s+p bmym vkb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m`
   jd-hjrb.

   ^12 vkly-xrs `sr-ygj-bv hzb ysbr vkl-kly-j& ys+p bmym.

   ^13 vky-y+hr hzb mzvbv v$pr lv sbjt ymym l+hrtv vkb$ bgdyv vrx& bsrv
   bmym xyym v+hr.

   ^14 vbyvm hsmyny yqx-lv sty trym `v sny bny yvnh vb` lpny yhvh `l-ptx
   `hl mvjd vntnm `l-hkhn.

   ^15 vjsh `tm hkhn `xd x+`t vh`xd jlh vkpr jlyv hkhn lpny yhvh mzvbv.

   ^16 v`ys ky-t&` mmnv skbt-zrj vrx& bmym `t-kl-bsrv v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^17 vkl-bgd vkl-jvr `sr-yhyh jlyv skbt-zrj vkb$ bmym v+m` jd- hjrb.

   ^18 v`sh `sr yskb `ys `th skbt-zrj vrx&v bmym v+m`v jd-hjrb.

   ^19 v`sh ky-thyh zbh dm yhyh zbh bbsrh sbjt ymym thyh bndth vkl- hngj
   bh y+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^20 vkl `sr tskb jlyv bndth y+m` vkl `sr-tsb jlyv y+m`.

   ^21 vkl-hngj bmskbh ykb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^22 vkl-hngj bkl-kly `sr-tsb jlyv ykb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd- hjrb.

   ^23 v`m jl-hmskb hv` `v jl-hkly `sr-hv` ysbt-jlyv bngjv-bv y+m`
   jd-hjrb.

   ^24 v`m skb yskb `ys `th vthy ndth jlyv v+m` sbjt ymym vkl-hmskb
   `sr-yskb jlyv y+m`.

   ^25 v`sh ky-yzvb zvb dmh ymym rbym bl` jt-ndth `v ky-tzvb jl- ndth
   kl-ymy zvb +m`th kymy ndth thyh +m`h hv`.

   ^26 kl-hmskb `sr-tskb jlyv kl-ymy zvbh kmskb ndth yhyh-lh vkl- hkly `sr
   tsb jlyv +m` yhyh k+m`t ndth.

   ^27 vkl-hnvgj bm y+m` vkb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m` jd-hjrb.

   ^28 v`m-+hrh mzvbh v$prh lh sbjt ymym v`xr t+hr.

   ^29 vbyvm hsmyny tqx-lh sty trym `v sny bny yvnh vhby`h `vtm `l- hkhn
   `l-ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^30 vjsh hkhn `t-h`xd x+`t v`t-h`xd jlh vkpr jlyh hkhn lpny yhvh mzvb
   +m`th.

   ^31 vhzrtm `t-bny-ysr`l m+m`tm vl` ymtv b+m`tm b+m`m `t-mskny `sr
   btvkm.

   ^32 z`t tvrt hzb v`sr t&` mmnv skbt-zrj l+m`h-bh.

   ^33 vhdvh bndth vhzb `t-zvbv lzkr vlnqbh vl`ys `sr yskb jm-+m`h.

  Chapter 16

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh `xry mvt sny bny `hrn bqrbtm lpny-yhvh vymtv.

   ^2 vy`mr yhvh `l-msh dbr `l-`hrn `xyk v`l-yb` bkl-jt `l-hqds mbyt lprkt
   `l-pny hkprt `sr jl-h`rn vl` ymvt ky bjnn `r`h jl- hkprt.

   ^3 bz`t yb` `hrn `l-hqds bpr bn-bqr lx+`t v`yl ljlh.

   ^4 ktnt-bd qds ylbs vmkn$y-bd yhyv jl-bsrv vb`bn+ bd yxgr vbm&npt bd
   y&np bgdy-qds hm vrx& bmym `t-bsrv vlbsm.

   ^5 vm`t jdt bny ysr`l yqx sny-sjyry jzym lx+`t v`yl `xd ljlh.

   ^6 vhqryb `hrn `t-pr hx+`t `sr-lv vkpr bjdv vbjd bytv.

   ^7 vlqx `t-sny hsjyrm vhjmyd `tm lpny yhvh ptx `hl mvjd.

   ^8 vntn `hrn jl-sny hsjyrm grlvt gvrl `xd lyhvh vgvrl `xd ljz`zl.

   ^9 vhqryb `hrn `t-hsjyr `sr jlh jlyv hgvrl lyhvh vjshv x+`t.

   ^10 vhsjyr `sr jlh jlyv hgvrl ljz`zl yjmd-xy lpny yhvh lkpr jlyv lslx
   `tv ljz`zl hmdbrh.

   ^11 vhqryb `hrn `t-pr hx+`t `sr-lv vkpr bjdv vbjd bytv vsx+ `t- pr
   hx+`t `sr-lv.

   ^12 vlqx ml`-hmxth gxly-`s mjl hmzbx mlpny yhvh vml` xpnyv q+rt $mym
   dqh vhby` mbyt lprkt.

   ^13 vntn `t-hq+rt jl-h`s lpny yhvh vk$h jnn hq+rt `t-hkprt `sr jl-hjdvt
   vl` ymvt.

   ^14 vlqx mdm hpr vhzh b`&bjv jl-pny hkprt qdmh vlpny hkprt yzh
   sbj-pjmym mn-hdm b`&bjv.

   ^15 vsx+ `t-sjyr hx+`t `sr ljm vhby` `t-dmv `l-mbyt lprkt vjsh `t-dmv
   k`sr jsh ldm hpr vhzh `tv jl-hkprt vlpny hkprt.

   ^16 vkpr jl-hqds m+m`t bny ysr`l vmpsjyhm lkl-x+`tm vkn yjsh l`hl mvjd
   hskn `tm btvk +m`tm.

   ^17 vkl-`dm l`-yhyh b`hl mvjd bb`v lkpr bqds jd-&`tv vkpr bjdv vbjd
   bytv vbjd kl-qhl ysr`l.

   ^18 vy&` `l-hmzbx `sr lpny-yhvh vkpr jlyv vlqx mdm hpr vmdm hsjyr vntn
   jl-qrnvt hmzbx $byb.

   ^19 vhzh jlyv mn-hdm b`&bjv sbj pjmym v+hrv vqdsv m+m`t bny ysr`l.

   ^20 vklh mkpr `t-hqds v`t-`hl mvjd v`t-hmzbx vhqryb `t-hsjyr hxy.

   ^21 v$mk `hrn `t-sty ydv jl r`s hsjyr hxy vhtvdh jlyv `t-kl-jvnt bny
   ysr`l v`t-kl-psjyhm lkl-x+`tm vntn `tm jl-r`s hsjyr vslx byd-`ys jty
   hmdbrh.

   ^22 vns` hsjyr jlyv `t-kl-jvntm `l-`r& gzrh vslx `t-hsjyr bmdbr.

   ^23 vb` `hrn `l-`hl mvjd vps+ `t-bgdy hbd `sr lbs bb`v `l-hqds vhnyxm
   sm.

   ^24 vrx& `t-bsrv bmym bmqvm qdvs vlbs `t-bgdyv vy&` vjsh `t-jltv
   v`t-jlt hjm vkpr bjdv vbjd hjm.

   ^25 v`t xlb hx+`t yq+yr hmzbxh.

   ^26 vhmslx `t-hsjyr ljz`zl ykb$ bgdyv vrx& `t-bsrv bmym v`xry-kn ybv`
   `l-hmxnh.

   ^27 v`t pr hx+`t v`t sjyr hx+`t `sr hvb` `t-dmm lkpr bqds yv&y` `l-mxv&
   lmxnh vsrpv b`s `t-jrtm v`t-bsrm v`t-prsm.

   ^28 vhsrp `tm ykb$ bgdyv vrx& `t-bsrv bmym v`xry-kn ybv` `l- hmxnh.

   ^29 vhyth lkm lxqt jvlm bxds hsbyjy bjsvr lxds tjnv `t-npstykm
   vkl-ml`kh l` tjsv h`zrx vhgr hgr btvkkm.

   ^30 ky-byvm hzh ykpr jlykm l+hr `tkm mkl x+`tykm lpny yhvh t+hrv.

   ^31 sbt sbtvn hy` lkm vjnytm `t-npstykm xqt jvlm.

   ^32 vkpr hkhn `sr-ymsx `tv v`sr yml` `t-ydv lkhn txt `byv vlbs `t-bgdy
   hbd bgdy hqds.

   ^33 vkpr `t-mqds hqds v`t-`hl mvjd v`t-hmzbx ykpr vjl hkhnym vjl- kl-jm
   hqhl ykpr.

   ^34 vhyth-z`t lkm lxqt jvlm lkpr jl-bny ysr`l mkl-x+`tm `xt bsnh vyjs
   k`sr &vh yhvh `t-msh.

  Chapter 17

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-`hrn v`l-bnyv v`l kl-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lyhm zh hdbr `sr- &vh
   yhvh l`mr.

   ^3 `ys `ys mbyt ysr`l `sr ysx+ svr `v-ksb `v-jz bmxnh `v `sr ysx+ mxv&
   lmxnh.

   ^4 v`l-ptx `hl mvjd l` hby`v lhqryb qrbn lyhvh lpny mskn yhvh dm yxsb
   l`ys hhv` dm spk vnkrt h`ys hhv` mqrb jmv.

   ^5 lmjn `sr yby`v bny ysr`l `t-zbxyhm `sr hm zbxym jl-pny hsdh vhby`m
   lyhvh `l-ptx `hl mvjd `l-hkhn vzbxv zbxy slmym lyhvh `vtm.

   ^6 vzrq hkhn `t-hdm jl-mzbx yhvh ptx `hl mvjd vhq+yr hxlb lryx nyxx
   lyhvh.

   ^7 vl`-yzbxv jvd `t-zbxyhm lsjyrm `sr hm znym `xryhm xqt jvlm thyh-z`t
   lhm ldrtm.

   ^8 v`lhm t`mr `ys `ys mbyt ysr`l vmn-hgr `sr-ygvr btvkm `sr-yjlh jlh
   `v-zbx.

   ^9 v`l-ptx `hl mvjd l` yby`nv ljsvt `tv lyhvh vnkrt h`ys hhv` mjmyv.

   ^10 v`ys `ys mbyt ysr`l vmn-hgr hgr btvkm `sr y`kl kl-dm vntty pny bnps
   h`klt `t-hdm vhkrty `th mqrb jmh.

   ^11 ky nps hbsr bdm hv` v`ny nttyv lkm jl-hmzbx lkpr jl-npstykm ky-hdm
   hv` bnps ykpr.

   ^12 jl-kn `mrty lbny ysr`l kl-nps mkm l`-t`kl dm vhgr hgr btvkkm
   l`-y`kl dm.

   ^13 v`ys `ys mbny ysr`l vmn-hgr hgr btvkm `sr y&vd &yd xyh `v- jvp `sr
   y`kl vspk `t-dmv vk$hv bjpr.

   ^14 ky-nps kl-bsr dmv bnpsv hv` v`mr lbny ysr`l dm kl-bsr l` t`klv ky
   nps kl-bsr dmv hv` kl-`klyv ykrt.

   ^15 vkl-nps `sr t`kl nblh v+rph b`zrx vbgr vkb$ bgdyv vrx& bmym v+m`
   jd-hjrb v+hr.

   ^16 v`m l` ykb$ vbsrv l` yrx& vns` jvnv.

  Chapter 18

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lhm `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^3 kmjsh `r&-m&rym `sr ysbtm-bh l` tjsv vkmjsh `r&-knjn `sr `ny mby`
   `tkm smh l` tjsv vbxqtyhm l` tlkv.

   ^4 `t-msp+y tjsv v`t-xqty tsmrv llkt bhm `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^5 vsmrtm `t-xqty v`t-msp+y `sr yjsh `tm h`dm vxy bhm `ny yhvh.

   ^6 `ys `ys `l-kl-s`r bsrv l` tqrbv lglvt jrvh `ny yhvh.

   ^7 jrvt `byk vjrvt `mk l` tglh `mk hv` l` tglh jrvth.

   ^8 jrvt `st-`byk l` tglh jrvt `byk hv`.

   ^9 jrvt `xvtk bt-`byk `v bt-`mk mvldt byt `v mvldt xv& l` tglh jrvtn.

   ^10 jrvt bt-bnk `v bt-btk l` tglh jrvtn ky jrvtk hnh.

   ^11 jrvt bt-`st `byk mvldt `byk `xvtk hv` l` tglh jrvth.

   ^12 jrvt `xvt-`byk l` tglh s`r `byk hv`.

   ^13 jrvt `xvt-`mk l` tglh ky-s`r `mk hv`.

   ^14 jrvt `xy-`byk l` tglh `l-`stv l` tqrb ddtk hv`.

   ^15 jrvt kltk l` tglh `st bnk hv` l` tglh jrvth.

   ^16 jrvt `st-`xyk l` tglh jrvt `xyk hv`.

   ^17 jrvt `sh vbth l` tglh `t-bt-bnh v`t-bt-bth l` tqx lglvt jrvth s`rh
   hnh zmh hv`.

   ^18 v`sh `l-`xth l` tqx l&rr lglvt jrvth jlyh bxyyh.

   ^19 v`l-`sh bndt +m`th l` tqrb lglvt jrvth.

   ^20 v`l-`st jmytk l`-ttn skbtk lzrj l+m`h-bh.

   ^21 vmzrjk l`-ttn lhjbyr lmlk vl` txll `t-sm `lhyk `ny yhvh.

   ^22 v`t-zkr l` tskb mskby `sh tvjbh hv`.

   ^23 vbkl-bhmh l`-ttn skbtk l+m`h-bh v`sh l`-tjmd lpny bhmh lrbjh tbl
   hv`.

   ^24 `l-t+m`v bkl-`lh ky bkl-`lh n+m`v hgvym `sr-`ny mslx mpnykm.

   ^25 vt+m` h`r& v`pqd jvnh jlyh vtq` h`r& `t-ysbyh.

   ^26 vsmrtm `tm `t-xqty v`t-msp+y vl` tjsv mkl htvjbt h`lh h`zrx vhgr
   hgr btvkkm.

   ^27 ky `t-kl-htvjbt h`l jsv `nsy-h`r& `sr lpnykm vt+m` h`r&.

   ^28 vl`-tqy` h`r& `tkm b+m`km `th k`sr q`h `t-hgvy `sr lpnykm.

   ^29 ky kl-`sr yjsh mkl htvjbt h`lh vnkrtv hnpsvt hjst mqrb jmm.

   ^30 vsmrtm `t-msmrty lblty jsvt mxqvt htvjbt `sr njsv lpnykm vl` t+m`v
   bhm `ny yhvh `lhykm.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 19

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-kl-jdt bny-ysr`l v`mrt `lhm qdsym thyv ky qdvs `ny yhvh
   `lhykm.

   ^3 `ys `mv v`byv tyr`v v`t-sbtty tsmrv `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^4 `l-tpnv `l-h`lylm v`lhy m$kh l` tjsv lkm `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^5 vky tzbxv zbx slmym lyhvh lr&nkm tzbxhv.

   ^6 byvm zbxkm y`kl vmmxrt vhnvtr jd-yvm hslysy b`s ysrp.

   ^7 v`m h`kl y`kl byvm hslysy pgvl hv` l` yr&h.

   ^8 v`klyv jvnv ys` ky-`t-qds yhvh xll vnkrth hnps hhv` mjmyh.

   ^9 vbq&rkm `t-q&yr `r&km l` tklh p`t sdk lq&r vlq+ q&yrk l` tlq+.

   ^10 vkrmk l` tjvll vpr+ krmk l` tlq+ ljny vlgr tjzb `tm `ny yhvh
   `lhykm.

   ^11 l` tgnbv vl`-tkxsv vl`-tsqrv `ys bjmytv.

   ^12 vl`-tsbjv bsmy lsqr vxllt `t-sm `lhyk `ny yhvh.

   ^13 l`-tjsq `t-rjk vl` tgzl l`-tlyn pjlt skyr `tk jd-bqr.

   ^14 l`-tqll xrs vlpny jvr l` ttn mksl vyr`t m`lhyk `ny yhvh.

   ^15 l`-tjsv jvl bmsp+ l`-ts` pny-dl vl` thdr pny gdvl b&dq tsp+ jmytk.

   ^16 l`-tlk rkyl bjmyk l` tjmd jl-dm rjk `ny yhvh.

   ^17 l`-tsn` `t-`xyk blbbk hvkx tvkyx `t-jmytk vl`-ts` jlyv x+`.

   ^18 l`-tqm vl`-t+r `t-bny jmk v`hbt lrjk kmvk `ny yhvh.

   ^19 `t-xqty tsmrv bhmtk l`-trbyj kl`ym sdk l`-tzrj kl`ym vbgd kl`ym
   sj+nz l` yjlh jlyk.

   ^20 v`ys ky-yskb `t-`sh skbt-zrj vhv` spxh nxrpt l`ys vhpdh l` npdth `v
   xpsh l` ntn-lh bqrt thyh l` yvmtv ky-l` xpsh.

   ^21 vhby` `t-`smv lyhvh `l-ptx `hl mvjd `yl `sm.

   ^22 vkpr jlyv hkhn b`yl h`sm lpny yhvh jl-x+`tv `sr x+` vn$lx lv mx+`tv
   `sr x+`.

   ^23 vky-tb`v `l-h`r& vn+jtm kl-j& m`kl vjrltm jrltv `t-pryv sls snym
   yhyh lkm jrlym l` y`kl.

   ^24 vbsnh hrbyjt yhyh kl-pryv qds hlvlym lyhvh.

   ^25 vbsnh hxmyst t`klv `t-pryv lhv$yp lkm tbv`tv `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^26 l` t`klv jl-hdm l` tnxsv vl` tjvnnv.

   ^27 l` tqpv p`t r`skm vl` tsxyt `t p`t zqnk.

   ^28 vsr+ lnps l` ttnv bbsrkm vktbt qjqj l` ttnv bkm `ny yhvh.

   ^29 `l-txll `t-btk lhznvth vl`-tznh h`r& vml`h h`r& zmh.

   ^30 `t-sbtty tsmrv vmqdsy tyr`v `ny yhvh.

   ^31 `l-tpnv `l-h`bt v`l-hydjnym `l-tbqsv l+m`h bhm `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^32 mpny sybh tqvm vhdrt pny zqn vyr`t m`lhyk `ny yhvh.

   ^33 vky-ygvr `tk gr b`r&km l` tvnv `tv.

   ^34 k`zrx mkm yhyh lkm hgr hgr `tkm v`hbt lv kmvk ky-grym hyytm b`r&
   m&rym `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^35 l`-tjsv jvl bmsp+ bmdh bmsql vbmsvrh.

   ^36 m`zny &dq `bny-&dq `ypt &dq vhyn &dq yhyh lkm `ny yhvh `lhykm
   `sr-hv&`ty `tkm m`r& m&rym.

   ^37 vsmrtm `t-kl-xqty v`t-kl-msp+y vjsytm `tm `ny yhvh.

  Chapter 20

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 v`l-bny ysr`l t`mr `ys `ys mbny ysr`l vmn-hgr hgr bysr`l `sr ytn
   mzrjv lmlk mvt yvmt jm h`r& yrgmhv b`bn.

   ^3 v`ny `tn `t-pny b`ys hhv` vhkrty `tv mqrb jmv ky mzrjv ntn lmlk lmjn
   +m` `t-mqdsy vlxll `t-sm qdsy.

   ^4 v`m hjlm yjlymv jm h`r& `t-jynyhm mn-h`ys hhv` bttv mzrjv lmlk lblty
   hmyt `tv.

   ^5 vsmty `ny `t-pny b`ys hhv` vbmspxtv vhkrty `tv v`t kl-hznym `xryv
   lznvt `xry hmlk mqrb jmm.

   ^6 vhnps `sr tpnh `l-h`bt v`l-hydjnym lznt `xryhm vntty `t-pny bnps
   hhv` vhkrty `tv mqrb jmv.

   ^7 vhtqdstm vhyytm qdsym ky `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^8 vsmrtm `t-xqty vjsytm `tm `ny yhvh mqdskm.

   ^9 ky-`ys `ys `sr yqll `t-`byv v`t-`mv mvt yvmt `byv v`mv qll dmyv bv.

   ^10 v`ys `sr yn`p `t-`st `ys `sr yn`p `t-`st rjhv mvt-yvmt hn`p vhn`pt.

   ^11 v`ys `sr yskb `t-`st `byv jrvt `byv glh mvt-yvmtv snyhm dmyhm bm.

   ^12 v`ys `sr yskb `t-kltv mvt yvmtv snyhm tbl jsv dmyhm bm.

   ^13 v`ys `sr yskb `t-zkr mskby `sh tvjbh jsv snyhm mvt yvmtv dmyhm bm.

   ^14 v`ys `sr yqx `t-`sh v`t-`mh zmh hv` b`s ysrpv `tv v`thn vl`- thyh
   zmh btvkkm.

   ^15 v`ys `sr ytn skbtv bbhmh mvt yvmt v`t-hbhmh thrgv.

   ^16 v`sh `sr tqrb `l-kl-bhmh lrbjh `th vhrgt `t-h`sh v`t-hbhmh mvt
   yvmtv dmyhm bm.

   ^17 v`ys `sr-yqx `t-`xtv bt-`byv `v bt-`mv vr`h `t-jrvth vhy`- tr`h
   `t-jrvtv x$d hv` vnkrtv ljyny bny jmm jrvt `xtv glh jvnv ys`.

   ^18 v`ys `sr-yskb `t-`sh dvh vglh `t-jrvth `t-mqrh hjrh vhv` glth
   `t-mqvr dmyh vnkrtv snyhm mqrb jmm.

   ^19 vjrvt `xvt `mk v`xvt `byk l` tglh ky `t-s`rv hjrh jvnm ys`v.

   ^20 v`ys `sr yskb `t-ddtv jrvt ddv glh x+`m ys`v jryrym ymtv.

   ^21 v`ys `sr yqx `t-`st `xyv ndh hv` jrvt `xyv glh jryrym yhyv.

   ^22 vsmrtm `t-kl-xqty v`t-kl-msp+y vjsytm `tm vl`-tqy` `tkm h`r& `sr
   `ny mby` `tkm smh lsbt bh.

   ^23 vl` tlkv bxqt hgvy `sr-`ny mslx mpnykm ky `t-kl-`lh jsv v`q& bm.

   ^24 v`mr lkm `tm tyrsv `t-`dmtm v`ny `tnnh lkm lrst `th `r& zbt xlb
   vdbs `ny yhvh `lhykm `sr-hbdlty `tkm mn-hjmym.

   ^25 vhbdltm byn-hbhmh h+hrh l+m`h vbyn-hjvp h+m` l+hr vl`-tsq&v
   `t-npstykm bbhmh vbjvp vbkl `sr trms h`dmh `sr-hbdlty lkm l+m`.

   ^26 vhyytm ly qdsym ky qdvs `ny yhvh v`bdl `tkm mn-hjmym lhyvt ly.

   ^27 v`ys `v-`sh ky-yhyh bhm `vb `v ydjny mvt yvmtv b`bn yrgmv `tm dmyhm
   bm.

  Chapter 21

   ^1 vy`mr yhvh `l-msh `mr `l-hkhnym bny `hrn v`mrt `lhm lnps l`- y+m`
   bjmyv.

   ^2 ky `m-ls`rv hqrb `lyv l`mv vl`byv vlbnv vlbtv vl`xyv.

   ^3 vl`xtv hbtvlh hqrvbh `lyv `sr l`-hyth l`ys lh y+m`.

   ^4 l` y+m` bjl bjmyv lhxlv.

   ^5 l`-yqrxh qrxh br`sm vp`t zqnm l` yglxv vbbsrm l` ysr+v sr+t.

   ^6 qdsym yhyv l`lhyhm vl` yxllv sm `lhyhm ky `t-`sy yhvh lxm `lhyhm hm
   mqrybm vhyv qds.

   ^7 `sh znh vxllh l` yqxv v`sh grvsh m`ysh l` yqxv ky-qds hv` l`lhyv.

   ^8 vqdstv ky-`t-lxm `lhyk hv` mqryb qds yhyh-lk ky qdvs `ny yhvh
   mqdskm.

   ^9 vbt `ys khn ky txl lznvt `t-`byh hy` mxllt b`s tsrp.

   ^10 vhkhn hgdvl m`xyv `sr-yv&q jl-r`sv smn hmsxh vml` `t-ydv llbs
   `t-hbgdym `t-r`sv l` yprj vbgdyv l` yprm.

   ^11 vjl kl-npst mt l` yb` l`byv vl`mv l` y+m`.

   ^12 vmn-hmqds l` y&` vl` yxll `t mqds `lhyv ky nzr smn msxt `lhyv jlyv
   `ny yhvh.

   ^13 vhv` `sh bbtvlyh yqx.

   ^14 `lmnh vgrvsh vxllh znh `t-`lh l` yqx ky `m-btvlh mjmyv yqx `sh.

   ^15 vl`-yxll zrjv bjmyv ky `ny yhvh mqdsv.

   ^16 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^17 dbr `l-`hrn l`mr `ys mzrjk ldrtm `sr yhyh bv mvm l` yqrb lhqryb lxm
   `lhyv.

   ^18 ky kl-`ys `sr-bv mvm l` yqrb `ys jvr `v p$x `v xrm `v srvj.

   ^19 `v `ys `sr-yhyh bv sbr rgl `v sbr yd.

   ^20 `v-gbn `v-dq `v tbll bjynv `v grb `v ylpt `v mrvx `sk.

   ^21 kl-`ys `sr-bv mvm mzrj `hrn hkhn l` ygs lhqryb `t-`sy yhvh mvm bv
   `t lxm `lhyv l` ygs lhqryb.

   ^22 lxm `lhyv mqdsy hqdsym vmn-hqdsym y`kl.

   ^23 `k `l-hprkt l` yb` v`l-hmzbx l` ygs ky-mvm bv vl` yxll `t- mqdsy ky
   `ny yhvh mqdsm.

   ^24 vydbr msh `l-`hrn v`l-bnyv v`l-kl-bny ysr`l.

  Chapter 22

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-`hrn v`l-bnyv vynzrv mqdsy bny-ysr`l vl` yxllv `t-sm qdsy `sr
   hm mqdsym ly `ny yhvh.

   ^3 `mr `lhm ldrtykm kl-`ys `sr-yqrb mkl-zrjkm `l-hqdsym `sr yqdysv
   bny-ysr`l lyhvh v+m`tv jlyv vnkrth hnps hhv` mlpny `ny yhvh.

   ^4 `ys `ys mzrj `hrn vhv` &rvj `v zb bqdsym l` y`kl jd `sr y+hr vhngj
   bkl-+m`-nps `v `ys `sr-t&` mmnv skbt-zrj.

   ^5 `v-`ys `sr ygj bkl-sr& `sr y+m`-lv `v b`dm `sr y+m`-lv lkl +m`tv.

   ^6 nps `sr tgj-bv v+m`h jd-hjrb vl` y`kl mn-hqdsym ky `m-rx& bsrv bmym.

   ^7 vb` hsms v+hr v`xr y`kl mn-hqdsym ky lxmv hv`.

   ^8 nblh v+rph l` y`kl l+m`h-bh `ny yhvh.

   ^9 vsmrv `t-msmrty vl`-ys`v jlyv x+` vmtv bv ky yxllhv `ny yhvh mqdsm.

   ^10 vkl-zr l`-y`kl qds tvsb khn vskyr l`-y`kl qds.

   ^11 vkhn ky-yqnh nps qnyn k$pv hv` y`kl bv vylyd bytv hm y`klv blxmv.

   ^12 vbt-khn ky thyh l`ys zr hv` btrvmt hqdsym l` t`kl.

   ^13 vbt-khn ky thyh `lmnh vgrvsh vzrj `yn lh vsbh `l-byt `byh knjvryh
   mlxm `byh t`kl vkl-zr l`-y`kl bv.

   ^14 v`ys ky-y`kl qds bsggh vy$p xmsytv jlyv vntn lkhn `t-hqds.

   ^15 vl` yxllv `t-qdsy bny ysr`l `t `sr-yrymv lyhvh.

   ^16 vhsy`v `vtm jvn `smh b`klm `t-qdsyhm ky `ny yhvh mqdsm.

   ^17 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^18 dbr `l-`hrn v`l-bnyv v`l kl-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lhm `ys `ys mbyt ysr`l
   vmn-hgr bysr`l `sr yqryb qrbnv lkl-ndryhm vlkl- ndbvtm `sr-yqrybv lyhvh
   ljlh.

   ^19 lr&nkm tmym zkr bbqr bksbym vbjzym.

   ^20 kl `sr-bv mvm l` tqrybv ky-l` lr&vn yhyh lkm.

   ^21 v`ys ky-yqryb zbx-slmym lyhvh lpl`-ndr `v lndbh bbqr `v b&`n tmym
   yhyh lr&vn kl-mvm l` yhyh-bv.

   ^22 jvrt `v sbvr `v-xrv& `v-yblt `v grb `v ylpt l`-tqrybv `lh lyhvh
   v`sh l`-ttnv mhm jl-hmzbx lyhvh.

   ^23 vsvr vsh srvj vqlv+ ndbh tjsh `tv vlndr l` yr&h.

   ^24 vmjvk vktvt vntvq vkrvt l` tqrybv lyhvh vb`r&km l` tjsv.

   ^25 vmyd bn-nkr l` tqrybv `t-lxm `lhykm mkl-`lh ky msxtm bhm mvm bm l`
   yr&v lkm.

   ^26 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^27 svr `v-ksb `v-jz ky yvld vhyh sbjt ymym txt `mv vmyvm hsmyny vhl`h
   yr&h lqrbn `sh lyhvh.

   ^28 vsvr `v-sh `tv v`t-bnv l` tsx+v byvm `xd.

   ^29 vky-tzbxv zbx-tvdh lyhvh lr&nkm tzbxv.

   ^30 byvm hhv` y`kl l`-tvtyrv mmnv jd-bqr `ny yhvh.

   ^31 vsmrtm m&vty vjsytm `tm `ny yhvh.

   ^32 vl` txllv `t-sm qdsy vnqdsty btvk bny ysr`l `ny yhvh mqdskm.

  Chapter 23

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lhm mvjdy yhvh `sr-tqr`v `tm mqr`y qds `lh
   hm mvjdy.

   ^3 sst ymym tjsh ml`kh vbyvm hsbyjy sbt sbtvn mqr`-qds kl-ml`kh l` tjsv
   sbt hv` lyhvh bkl mvsbtykm.

   ^4 `lh mvjdy yhvh mqr`y qds `sr-tqr`v `tm bmvjdm.

   ^5 bxds hr`svn b`rbjh jsr lxds byn hjrbym p$x lyhvh.

   ^6 vbxmsh jsr yvm lxds hzh xg hm&vt lyhvh sbjt ymym m&vt t`klv.

   ^7 byvm hr`svn mqr`-qds yhyh lkm kl-ml`kt jbdh l` tjsv.

   ^8 vhqrbtm `sh lyhvh sbjt ymym byvm hsbyjy mqr`-qds kl-ml`kt jbdh l`
   tjsv.

   ^9 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^10 dbr `l-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lhm ky-tb`v `l-h`r& `sr `ny ntn lkm vq&rtm
   `t-q&yrh vhb`tm `t-jmr r`syt q&yrkm `l-hkhn.

   ^11 vhnyp `t-hjmr lpny yhvh lr&nkm mmxrt hsbt ynypnv hkhn.

   ^12 vjsytm byvm hnypkm `t-hjmr kbs tmym bn-sntv ljlh lyhvh.

   ^13 vmnxtv sny jsrnym $lt blvlh bsmn `sh lyhvh ryx nyxx vn$kh yyn rbyjt
   hhyn.

   ^14 vlxm vqly vkrml l` t`klv jd-j&m hyvm hzh jd hby`km `t-qrbn `lhykm
   xqt jvlm ldrtykm bkl msbtykm.

   ^15 v$prtm lkm mmxrt hsbt myvm hby`km `t-jmr htnvph sbj sbtvt tmymt
   thyynh.

   ^16 jd mmxrt hsbt hsbyjt t$prv xmsym yvm vhqrbtm mnxh xdsh lyhvh.

   ^17 mmvsbtykm tby`v lxm tnvph stym sny jsrnym $lt thyynh xm& t`pynh
   bkvrym lyhvh.

   ^18 vhqrbtm jl-hlxm sbjt kbsym tmymm bny snh vpr bn-bqr `xd v`ylm snym
   yhyv jlh lyhvh vmnxtm vn$kyhm `sh ryx-nyxx lyhvh.

   ^19 vjsytm sjyr-jzym `xd lx+`t vsny kbsym bny snh lzbx slmym.

   ^20 vhnyp hkhn `tm jl lxm hbkrym tnvph lpny yhvh jl-sny kbsym qds yhyv
   lyhvh lkhn.

   ^21 vqr`tm bj&m hyvm hzh mqr`-qds yhyh lkm kl-ml`kt jbdh l` tjsv xqt
   jvlm bkl-mvsbtykm ldrtykm.

   ^22 vbq&rkm `t-q&yr `r&km l`-tklh p`t sdk bq&rk vlq+ q&yrk l` tlq+ ljny
   vlgr tjzb `tm `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^23 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^24 dbr `l-bny ysr`l l`mr bxds hsbyjy b`xd lxds yhyh lkm sbtvn zkrvn
   trvjh mqr`-qds.

   ^25 kl-ml`kt jbdh l` tjsv vhqrbtm `sh lyhvh.

   ^26 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^27 `k bjsvr lxds hsbyjy hzh yvm hkprym hv` mqr`-qds yhyh lkm vjnytm
   `t-npstykm vhqrbtm `sh lyhvh.

   ^28 vkl-ml`kh l` tjsv bj&m hyvm hzh ky yvm kprym hv` lkpr jlykm lpny
   yhvh `lhykm.

   ^29 ky kl-hnps `sr l`-tjnh bj&m hyvm hzh vnkrth mjmyh.

   ^30 vkl-hnps `sr tjsh kl-ml`kh bj&m hyvm hzh vh`bdty `t-hnps hhv` mqrb
   jmh.

   ^31 kl-ml`kh l` tjsv xqt jvlm ldrtykm bkl msbtykm.

   ^32 sbt sbtvn hv` lkm vjnytm `t-npstykm btsjh lxds bjrb mjrb jd- jrb
   tsbtv sbtkm.

   ^33 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^34 dbr `l-bny ysr`l l`mr bxmsh jsr yvm lxds hsbyjy hzh xg h$kvt sbjt
   ymym lyhvh.

   ^35 byvm hr`svn mqr`-qds kl-ml`kt jbdh l` tjsv.

   ^36 sbjt ymym tqrybv `sh lyhvh byvm hsmyny mqr`-qds yhyh lkm vhqrbtm
   `sh lyhvh j&rt hv` kl-ml`kt jbdh l` tjsv.

   ^37 `lh mvjdy yhvh `sr-tqr`v `tm mqr`y qds lhqryb `sh lyhvh jlh vmnxh
   zbx vn$kym dbr-yvm byvmv.

   ^38 mlbd sbtt yhvh vmlbd mtnvtykm vmlbd kl-ndrykm vmlbd kl- ndbtykm `sr
   ttnv lyhvh.

   ^39 `k bxmsh jsr yvm lxds hsbyjy b`$pkm `t-tbv`t h`r& txgv `t-xg- yhvh
   sbjt ymym byvm hr`svn sbtvn vbyvm hsmyny sbtvn.

   ^40 vlqxtm lkm byvm hr`svn pry j& hdr kpt tmrym vjnp j&-jbt vjrby-nxl
   vsmxtm lpny yhvh `lhykm sbjt ymym.

   ^41 vxgtm `tv xg lyhvh sbjt ymym bsnh xqt jvlm ldrtykm bxds hsbyjy txgv
   `tv.

   ^42 b$kt tsbv sbjt ymym kl-h`zrx bysr`l ysbv b$kt.

   ^43 lmjn ydjv drtykm ky b$kvt hvsbty `t-bny ysr`l bhv&y`y `vtm m`r&
   m&rym `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^44 vydbr msh `t-mjdy yhvh `l-bny ysr`l.

  Chapter 24

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 &v `t-bny ysr`l vyqxv `lyk smn zyt zk ktyt lm`vr lhjlt nr tmyd.

   ^3 mxv& lprkt hjdt b`hl mvjd yjrk `tv `hrn mjrb jd-bqr lpny yhvh tmyd
   xqt jvlm ldrtykm.

   ^4 jl hmnrh h+hrh yjrk `t-hnrvt lpny yhvh tmyd.

   ^5 vlqxt $lt v`pyt `th stym jsrh xlvt sny jsrnym yhyh hxlh h`xt.

   ^6 vsmt `vtm stym mjrkvt ss hmjrkt jl hslxn h+hr lpny yhvh.

   ^7 vntt jl-hmjrkt lbnh zkh vhyth llxm l`zkrh `sh lyhvh.

   ^8 byvm hsbt byvm hsbt yjrknv lpny yhvh tmyd m`t bny-ysr`l bryt jvlm.

   ^9 vhyth l`hrn vlbnyv v`klhv bmqvm qds ky qds qdsym hv` lv m`sy yhvh
   xq-jvlm.

   ^10 vy&` bn-`sh ysr`lyt vhv` bn-`ys m&ry btvk bny ysr`l vyn&v bmxnh bn
   hysr`lyt v`ys hysr`ly.

   ^11 vyqb bn-h`sh hysr`lyt `t-hsm vyqll vyby`v `tv `l-msh vsm `mv slmyt
   bt-dbry lm+h-dn.

   ^12 vynyxhv bmsmr lprs lhm jl-py yhvh.

   ^13 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^14 hv&` `t-hmqll `l-mxv& lmxnh v$mkv kl-hsmjym `t-ydyhm jl-r`sv vrgmv
   `tv kl-hjdh.

   ^15 v`l-bny ysr`l tdbr l`mr `ys `ys ky-yqll `lhyv vns` x+`v.

   ^16 vnqb sm-yhvh mvt yvmt rgvm yrgmv-bv kl-hjdh kgr k`zrx bnqbv- sm
   yvmt.

   ^17 v`ys ky ykh kl-nps `dm mvt yvmt.

   ^18 vmkh nps-bhmh yslmnh nps txt nps.

   ^19 v`ys ky-ytn mvm bjmytv k`sr jsh kn yjsh lv.

   ^20 sbr txt sbr jyn txt jyn sn txt sn k`sr ytn mvm b`dm kn yntn bv.

   ^21 vmkh bhmh yslmnh vmkh `dm yvmt.

   ^22 msp+ `xd yhyh lkm kgr k`zrx yhyh ky `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^23 vydbr msh `l-bny ysr`l vyv&y`v `t-hmqll `l-mxv& lmxnh vyrgmv `tv
   `bn vbny-ysr`l jsv k`sr &vh yhvh `t-msh.

  Chapter 25

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh bhr $yny l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lhm ky tb`v `l-h`r& `sr `ny ntn lkm vsbth
   h`r& sbt lyhvh.

   ^3 ss snym tzrj sdk vss snym tzmr krmk v`$pt `t-tbv`th.

   ^4 vbsnh hsbyjt sbt sbtvn yhyh l`r& sbt lyhvh sdk l` tzrj vkrmk l`
   tzmr.

   ^5 `t $pyx q&yrk l` tq&vr v`t-jnby nzyrk l` tb&r snt sbtvn yhyh l`r&.

   ^6 vhyth sbt h`r& lkm l`klh lk vljbdk vl`mtk vlskyrk vltvsbk hgrym jmk.

   ^7 vlbhmtk vlxyh `sr b`r&k thyh kl-tbv`th l`kl.

   ^8 v$prt lk sbj sbtt snym sbj snym sbj pjmym vhyv lk ymy sbj sbtt hsnym
   tsj v`rbjym snh.

   ^9 vhjbrt svpr trvjh bxds hsbjy bjsvr lxds byvm hkprym tjbyrv svpr
   bkl-`r&km.

   ^10 vqdstm `t snt hxmsym snh vqr`tm drvr b`r& lkl-ysbyh yvbl hv` thyh
   lkm vsbtm `ys `l-`xztv v`ys `l-mspxtv tsbv.

   ^11 yvbl hv` snt hxmsym snh thyh lkm l` tzrjv vl` tq&rv `t- $pyxyh vl`
   tb&rv `t-nzryh.

   ^12 ky yvbl hv` qds thyh lkm mn-hsdh t`klv `t-tbv`th.

   ^13 bsnt hyvbl hz`t tsbv `ys `l-`xztv.

   ^14 vky-tmkrv mmkr ljmytk `v qnh myd jmytk `l-tvnv `ys `t-`xyv.

   ^15 bm$pr snym `xr hyvbl tqnh m`t jmytk bm$pr sny-tbv`t ymkr-lk.

   ^16 lpy rb hsnym trbh mqntv vlpy mj+ hsnym tmjy+ mqntv ky m$pr tbv`t
   hv` mkr lk.

   ^17 vl` tvnv `ys `t-jmytv vyr`t m`lhyk ky `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^18 vjsytm `t-xqty v`t-msp+y tsmrv vjsytm `tm vysbtm jl-h`r& lb+x.

   ^19 vntnh h`r& pryh v`kltm lsbj vysbtm lb+x jlyh.

   ^20 vky t`mrv mh-n`kl bsnh hsbyjt hn l` nzrj vl` n`$p `t- tbv`tnv.

   ^21 v&vyty `t-brkty lkm bsnh hssyt vjst `t-htbv`h lsls hsnym.

   ^22 vzrjtm `t hsnh hsmynt v`kltm mn-htbv`h ysn jd hsnh htsyjt jd- bv`
   tbv`th t`klv ysn.

   ^23 vh`r& l` tmkr l&mtt ky-ly h`r& ky-grym vtvsbym `tm jmdy.

   ^24 vbkl `r& `xztkm g`lh ttnv l`r&.

   ^25 ky-ymvk `xyk vmkr m`xztv vb` g`lv hqrb `lyv vg`l `t mmkr `xyv.

   ^26 v`ys ky l` yhyh-lv g`l vhsygh ydv vm&` kdy g`ltv.

   ^27 vxsb `t-sny mmkrv vhsyb `t-hjdp l`ys `sr mkr-lv vsb l`xztv.

   ^28 v`m l`-m&`h ydv dy hsyb lv vhyh mmkrv byd hqnh `tv jd snt hyvbl
   vy&` bybl vsb l`xztv.

   ^29 v`ys ky-ymkr byt-mvsb jyr xvmh vhyth g`ltv jd-tm snt mmkrv ymym
   thyh g`ltv.

   ^30 v`m l`-yg`l jd-ml`t lv snh tmymh vqm hbyt `sr-bjyr `sr-l` xmh
   l&mytt lqnh `tv ldrtyv l` y&` bybl.

   ^31 vbty hx&rym `sr `yn-lhm xmh $byb jl-sdh h`r& yxsb g`lh thyh- lv
   vbybl y&`.

   ^32 vjry hlvym bty jry `xztm g`lt jvlm thyh llvym.

   ^33 v`sr yg`l mn-hlvym vy&` mmkr-byt vjyr `xztv bybl ky bty jry hlvym
   hv` `xztm btvk bny ysr`l.

   ^34 vsdh mgrs jryhm l` ymkr ky-`xzt jvlm hv` lhm.

   ^35 vky-ymvk `xyk vm+h ydv jmk vhxzqt bv gr vtvsb vxy jmk.

   ^36 `l-tqx m`tv nsk vtrbyt vyr`t m`lhyk vxy `xyk jmk.

   ^37 `t-k$pk l`-ttn lv bnsk vbmrbyt l`-ttn `klk.

   ^38 `ny yhvh `lhykm `sr-hv&`ty `tkm m`r& m&rym ltt lkm `t-`r& knjn
   lhyvt lkm l`lhym.

   ^39 vky-ymvk `xyk jmk vnmkr-lk l`-tjbd bv jbdt jbd.

   ^40 kskyr ktvsb yhyh jmk jd-snt hybl yjbd jmk.

   ^41 vy&` mjmk hv` vbnyv jmv vsb `l-mspxtv v`l-`xzt `btyv ysvb.

   ^42 ky-jbdy hm `sr-hv&`ty `tm m`r& m&rym l` ymkrv mmkrt jbd.

   ^43 l`-trdh bv bprk vyr`t m`lhyk.

   ^44 vjbdk v`mtk `sr yhyv-lk m`t hgvym `sr $bybtykm mhm tqnv jbd v`mh.

   ^45 vgm mbny htvsbym hgrym jmkm mhm tqnv vmmspxtm `sr jmkm `sr hvlydv
   b`r&km vhyv lkm l`xzh.

   ^46 vhtnxltm `tm lbnykm `xrykm lrst `xzh ljlm bhm tjbdv vb`xykm
   bny-ysr`l `ys b`xyv l`-trdh bv bprk.

   ^47 vky tsyg yd gr vtvsb jmk vmk `xyk jmv vnmkr lgr tvsb jmk `v ljqr
   mspxt gr.

   ^48 `xry nmkr g`lh thyh-lv `xd m`xyv yg`lnv.

   ^49 `v-ddv `v bn-ddv yg`lnv `v-ms`r bsrv mmspxtv yg`lnv `v-hsygh ydv
   vng`l.

   ^50 vxsb jm-qnhv msnt hmkrv lv jd snt hybl vhyh k$p mmkrv bm$pr snym
   kymy skyr yhyh jmv.

   ^51 `m-jvd rbvt bsnym lpyhn ysyb g`ltv mk$p mqntv.

   ^52 v`m-mj+ ns`r bsnym jd-snt hybl vxsb-lv kpy snyv ysyb `t- g`ltv.

   ^53 kskyr snh bsnh yhyh jmv l`-yrdnv bprk ljynyk.

   ^54 v`m-l` yg`l b`lh vy&` bsnt hybl hv` vbnyv jmv.

   ^55 ky-ly bny-ysr`l jbdym jbdy hm `sr-hv&`ty `vtm m`r& m&rym `ny yhvh
   `lhykm.

  Chapter 26

   ^1 l`-tjsv lkm `lylm vp$l vm&bh l`-tqymv lkm v`bn mskyt l` ttnv b`r&km
   lhstxvt jlyh ky `ny yhvh `lhykm.

   ^2 `t-sbtty tsmrv vmqdsy tyr`v `ny yhvh.

   ^3 `m-bxqty tlkv v`t-m&vty tsmrv vjsytm `tm.

   ^4 vntty gsmykm bjtm vntnh h`r& ybvlh vj& hsdh ytn pryv.

   ^5 vhsyg lkm dys `t-b&yr vb&yr ysyg `t-zrj v`kltm lxmkm lsbj vysbtm
   lb+x b`r&km.

   ^6 vntty slvm b`r& vskbtm v`yn mxryd vhsbty xyh rjh mn-h`r& vxrb
   l`-tjbr b`r&km.

   ^7 vrdptm `t-`ybykm vnplv lpnykm lxrb.

   ^8 vrdpv mkm xmsh m`h vm`h mkm rbbh yrdpv vnplv `ybykm lpnykm lxrb.

   ^9 vpnyty `lykm vhpryty `tkm vhrbyty `tkm vhqymty `t-bryty `tkm.

   ^10 v`kltm ysn nvsn vysn mpny xds tv&y`v.

   ^11 vntty mskny btvkkm vl`-tgjl npsy `tkm.

   ^12 vhthlkty btvkkm vhyyty lkm l`lhym v`tm thyv-ly ljm.

   ^13 `ny yhvh `lhykm `sr hv&`ty `tkm m`r& m&rym mhyt lhm jbdym v`sbr m+t
   jlkm v`vlk `tkm qvmmyvt.

   ^14 v`m-l` tsmjv ly vl` tjsv `t kl-hm&vt h`lh.

   ^15 v`m-bxqty tm`$v v`m `t-msp+y tgjl npskm lblty jsvt `t-kl- m&vty
   lhprkm `t-bryty.

   ^16 `p-`ny `jsh-z`t lkm vhpqdty jlykm bhlh `t-hsxpt v`t-hqdxt mklvt
   jynym vmdybt nps vzrjtm lryq zrjkm v`klhv `ybykm.

   ^17 vntty pny bkm vngptm lpny `ybykm vrdv bkm sn`ykm vn$tm v`yn- rdp
   `tkm.

   ^18 v`m-jd-`lh l` tsmjv ly vy$pty ly$rh `tkm sbj jl-x+`tykm.

   ^19 vsbrty `t-g`vn jzkm vntty `t-smykm kbrzl v`t-`r&km knxsh.

   ^20 vtm lryq kxkm vl`-ttn `r&km `t-ybvlh vj& h`r& l` ytn pryv.

   ^21 v`m-tlkv jmy qry vl` t`bv lsmj ly vy$pty jlykm mkh sbj kx+`tykm.

   ^22 vhslxty bkm `t-xyt hsdh vsklh `tkm vhkryth `t-bhmtkm vhmjy+h `tkm
   vnsmv drkykm.

   ^23 v`m-b`lh l` tv$rv ly vhlktm jmy qry.

   ^24 vhlkty `p-`ny jmkm bqry vhkyty `tkm gm-`ny sbj jl-x+`tykm.

   ^25 vhb`ty jlykm xrb nqmt nqm-bryt vn`$ptm `l-jrykm vslxty dbr btvkkm
   vnttm byd-`vyb.

   ^26 bsbry lkm m+h-lxm v`pv jsr nsym lxmkm btnvr `xd vhsybv lxmkm bmsql
   v`kltm vl` tsbjv.

   ^27 v`m-bz`t l` tsmjv ly vhlktm jmy bqry.

   ^28 vhlkty jmkm bxmt-qry vy$rty `tkm `p-`ny sbj jl-x+`tykm.

   ^29 v`kltm bsr bnykm vbsr bntykm t`klv.

   ^30 vhsmdty `t-bmtykm vhkrty `t-xmnykm vntty `t-pgrykm jl-pgry glvlykm
   vgjlh npsy `tkm.

   ^31 vntty `t-jrykm xrbh vhsmvty `t-mqdsykm vl` `ryx bryx nyxxkm.

   ^32 vhsmty `ny `t-h`r& vsmmv jlyh `ybykm hysbym bh.

   ^33 v`tkm `zrh bgvym vhryqty `xrykm xrb vhyth `r&km smmh vjrykm yhyv
   xrbh.

   ^34 `z tr&h h`r& `t-sbttyh kl ymy hsmh v`tm b`r& `ybykm `z tsbt h`r&
   vhr&t `t-sbttyh.

   ^35 kl-ymy hsmh tsbt `t `sr l`-sbth bsbttykm bsbtkm jlyh.

   ^36 vhns`rym bkm vhb`ty mrk blbbm b`r&t `ybyhm vrdp `tm qvl jlh ndp
   vn$v mn$t-xrb vnplv v`yn rdp.

   ^37 vkslv `ys-b`xyv kmpny-xrb vrdp `yn vl`-thyh lkm tqvmh lpny `ybykm.

   ^38 v`bdtm bgvym v`klh `tkm `r& `ybykm.

   ^39 vhns`rym bkm ymqv bjvnm b`r&t `ybykm v`p bjvnt `btm `tm ymqv.

   ^40 vhtvdv `t-jvnm v`t-jvn `btm bmjlm `sr mjlv-by v`p `sr-hlkv jmy
   bqry.

   ^41 `p-`ny `lk jmm bqry vhb`ty `tm b`r& `ybyhm `v-`z yknj lbbm hjrl v`z
   yr&v `t-jvnm.

   ^42 vzkrty `t-bryty yjqvb v`p `t-bryty y&xq v`p `t-bryty `brhm `zkr
   vh`r& `zkr.

   ^43 vh`r& tjzb mhm vtr& `t-sbttyh bhsmh mhm vhm yr&v `t-jvnm yjn vbyjn
   bmsp+y m`$v v`t-xqty gjlh npsm.

   ^44 v`p-gm-z`t bhyvtm b`r& `ybyhm l`-m`$tym vl`-gjltym lkltm lhpr bryty
   `tm ky `ny yhvh `lhyhm.

   ^45 vzkrty lhm bryt r`snym `sr hv&`ty-`tm m`r& m&rym ljyny hgvym lhyvt
   lhm l`lhym `ny yhvh.

   ^46 `lh hxqym vhmsp+ym vhtvrt `sr ntn yhvh bynv vbyn bny ysr`l bhr $yny
   byd-msh.

  Chapter 27

   ^1 vydbr yhvh `l-msh l`mr.

   ^2 dbr `l-bny ysr`l v`mrt `lhm `ys ky ypl` ndr bjrkk npst lyhvh.

   ^3 vhyh jrkk hzkr mbn jsrym snh vjd bn-ssym snh vhyh jrkk xmsym sql k$p
   bsql hqds.

   ^4 v`m-nqbh hv` vhyh jrkk slsym sql.

   ^5 v`m mbn-xms snym vjd bn-jsrym snh vhyh jrkk hzkr jsrym sqlym vlnqbh
   jsrt sqlym.

   ^6 v`m mbn-xds vjd bn-xms snym vhyh jrkk hzkr xmsh sqlym k$p vlnqbh
   jrkk slst sqlym k$p.

   ^7 v`m mbn-ssym snh vmjlh `m-zkr vhyh jrkk xmsh jsr sql vlnqbh jsrh
   sqlym.

   ^8 v`m-mk hv` mjrkk vhjmydv lpny hkhn vhjryk `tv hkhn jl-py `sr tsyg yd
   hndr yjryknv hkhn.

   ^9 v`m-bhmh `sr yqrybv mmnh qrbn lyhvh kl `sr ytn mmnv lyhvh yhyh-qds.

   ^10 l` yxlypnv vl`-ymyr `tv +vb brj `v-rj b+vb v`m-hmr ymyr bhmh bbhmh
   vhyh-hv` vtmvrtv yhyh-qds.

   ^11 v`m kl-bhmh +m`h `sr l`-yqrybv mmnh qrbn lyhvh vhjmyd `t- hbhmh
   lpny hkhn.

   ^12 vhjryk hkhn `th byn +vb vbyn rj kjrkk hkhn kn yhyh.

   ^13 v`m-g`l yg`lnh vy$p xmystv jl-jrkk.

   ^14 v`ys ky-yqds `t-bytv qds lyhvh vhjrykv hkhn byn +vb vbyn rj k`sr
   yjryk `tv hkhn kn yqvm.

   ^15 v`m-hmqdys yg`l `t-bytv vy$p xmysyt k$p-jrkk jlyv vhyh lv.

   ^16 v`m msdh `xztv yqdys `ys lyhvh vhyh jrkk lpy zrjv zrj xmr sjrym
   bxmsym sql k$p.

   ^17 `m-msnt hybl yqdys sdhv kjrkk yqvm.

   ^18 v`m-`xr hybl yqdys sdhv vxsb-lv hkhn `t-hk$p jl-py hsnym hnvtrt jd
   snt hybl vngrj mjrkk.

   ^19 v`m-g`l yg`l `t-hsdh hmqdys `tv vy$p xmsyt k$p-jrkk jlyv vqm lv.

   ^20 v`m-l` yg`l `t-hsdh v`m-mkr `t-hsdh l`ys `xr l` yg`l jvd.

   ^21 vhyh hsdh b&`tv bybl qds lyhvh ksdh hxrm lkhn thyh `xztv.

   ^22 v`m `t-sdh mqntv `sr l` msdh `xztv yqdys lyhvh.

   ^23 vxsb-lv hkhn `t mk$t hjrkk jd snt hybl vntn `t-hjrkk byvm hhv` qds
   lyhvh.

   ^24 bsnt hyvbl ysvb hsdh l`sr qnhv m`tv l`sr-lv `xzt h`r&.

   ^25 vkl-jrkk yhyh bsql hqds jsrym grh yhyh hsql.

   ^26 `k-bkvr `sr-ybkr lyhvh bbhmh l`-yqdys `ys `tv `m-svr `m-sh lyhvh
   hv`.

   ^27 v`m bbhmh h+m`h vpdh bjrkk vy$p xmstv jlyv v`m-l` yg`l vnmkr bjrkk.

   ^28 `k-kl-xrm `sr yxrm `ys lyhvh mkl-`sr-lv m`dm vbhmh vmsdh `xztv l`
   ymkr vl` yg`l kl-xrm qds-qdsym hv` lyhvh.

   ^29 kl-xrm `sr yxrm mn-h`dm l` ypdh mvt yvmt.

   ^30 vkl-mjsr h`r& mzrj h`r& mpry hj& lyhvh hv` qds lyhvh.

   ^31 v`m-g`l yg`l `ys mmjsrv xmsytv y$p jlyv.

   ^32 vkl-mjsr bqr v&`n kl `sr-yjbr txt hsb+ hjsyry yhyh-qds lyhvh.

   ^33 l` ybqr byn-+vb lrj vl` ymyrnv v`m-hmr ymyrnv vhyh-hv` vtmvrtv
   yhyh-qds l` yg`l.

   ^34 `lh hm&vt `sr &vh yhvh `t-msh `l-bny ysr`l bhr $yny.
