   ^20 mjdh bgd byvm qrh xm& jl-ntr vsr bsrym jl lb-rj.

   ^21 `m-rjb sn`k h`klhv lxm v`m-&m` hsqhv mym.

   ^22 ky gxlym `th xth jl-r`sv vyhvh yslm-lk.

   ^23 rvx &pvn txvll gsm vpnym nzjmym lsvn $tr.

   ^24 +vb sbt jl-pnt-gg m`st mdvnym vbyt xbr.

   ^25 mym qrym jl-nps jyph vsmvjh +vbh m`r& mrxq.

   ^26 mjyn nrps vmqvr msxt &dyq m+ lpny-rsj.

   ^27 `kl dbs hrbvt l`-+vb vxqr kbdm kbvd.

   ^28 jyr prv&h `yn xvmh `ys `sr `yn mj&r lrvxv.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 26

   ^1 kslg bqy& vkm+r bq&yr kn l`-n`vh lk$yl kbvd.

   ^2 k&pvr lnvd kdrvr ljvp kn qllt xnm l` tb`.

   ^3 sv+ l$v$ mtg lxmvr vsb+ lgv k$ylym.

   ^4 `l-tjn k$yl k`vltv pn-tsvh-lv gm-`th.

   ^5 jnh k$yl k`vltv pn-yhyh xkm bjynyv.

   ^6 mq&h rglym xm$ sth slx dbrym byd-k$yl.

   ^7 dlyv sqym mp$x vmsl bpy k$ylym.

   ^8 k&rvr `bn bmrgmh kn-nvtn lk$yl kbvd.

   ^9 xvx jlh byd-skvr vmsl bpy k$ylym.

   ^10 rb mxvll-kl vskr k$yl vskr jbrym.

   ^11 kklb sb jl-q`v k$yl svnh b`vltv.

   ^12 r`yt `ys xkm bjynyv tqvh lk$yl mmnv.

   ^13 `mr j&l sxl bdrk `ry byn hrxbvt.

   ^14 hdlt t$vb jl-&yrh vj&l jl-m+tv.

   ^15 +mn j&l ydv b&lxt nl`h lhsybh `l-pyv.

   ^16 xkm j&l bjynyv msbjh msyby +jm.

   ^17 mxzyq b`zny-klb jbr mtjbr jl-ryb l`-lv.

   ^18 kmtlhlh hyrh zqym x&ym vmvt.

   ^19 kn-`ys rmh `t-rjhv v`mr hl`-msxq `ny.

   ^20 b`p$ j&ym tkbh-`s vb`yn nrgn ystq mdvn.

   ^21 pxm lgxlym vj&ym l`s v`ys mdvnym lxrxr-ryb.

   ^22 dbry nrgn kmtlhmym vhm yrdv xdry-b+n.

   ^23 k$p $ygym m&ph jl-xrs sptym dlqym vlb-rj.

   ^24 bsptv ynkr svn` vbqrbv ysyt mrmh.

   ^25 ky-yxnn qvlv `l-t`mn-bv ky sbj tvjbvt blbv.

   ^26 tk$h sn`h bms`vn tglh rjtv bqhl.

   ^27 krh-sxt bh ypl vgll `bn `lyv tsvb.

   ^28 lsvn-sqr ysn` dkyv vph xlq yjsh mdxh.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 27

   ^1 `l-tthll byvm mxr ky l`-tdj mh-yld yvm.

   ^2 yhllk zr vl`-pyk nkry v`l-sptyk.

   ^3 kbd-`bn vn+l hxvl vkj$ `vyl kbd msnyhm.

   ^4 `kzryvt xmh vs+p `p vmy yjmd lpny qn`h.

   ^5 +vbh tvkxt mglh m`hbh m$trt.

   ^6 n`mnym p&jy `vhb vnjtrvt nsyqvt svn`.

   ^7 nps sbjh tbv$ npt vnps rjbh kl-mr mtvq.

   ^8 k&pvr nvddt mn-qnh kn-`ys nvdd mmqvmv.

   ^9 smn vq+rt ysmx-lb vmtq rjhv mj&t-nps.

   ^10 rjk vrjh `byk `l-tjzb vbyt `xyk `l-tbv` byvm `ydk +vb skn qrvb m`x
   rxvq.

   ^11 xkm bny vsmx lby v`sybh xrpy dbr.

   ^12 jrvm r`h rjh n$tr pt`ym jbrv njnsv.

   ^13 qx-bgdv ky-jrb zr vbjd nkryh xblhv.

   ^14 mbrk rjhv bqvl gdvl bbqr hskym qllh txsb lv.

   ^15 dlp +vrd byvm $gryr v`st mdvnym nstvh.

   ^16 &pnyh &pn-rvx vsmn ymynv yqr`.

   ^17 brzl bbrzl yxd v`ys yxd pny-rjhv.

   ^18 n&r t`nh y`kl pryh vsmr `dnyv ykbd.

   ^19 kmym hpnym lpnym kn lb-h`dm l`dm.

   ^20 s`vl v`bdh l` tsbjnh vjyny h`dm l` tsbjnh.

   ^21 m&rp lk$p vkvr lzhb v`ys lpy mhllv.

   ^22 `m tktvs-`t-h`vyl bmkts btvk hrypvt bjly l`-t$vr mjlyv `vltv.

   ^23 ydj tdj pny &`nk syt lbk ljdrym.

   ^24 ky l` ljvlm x$n v`m-nzr ldvr dvr.

   ^25 glh x&yr vnr`h-ds` vn`$pv jsbvt hrym.

   ^26 kbsym llbvsk vmxyr sdh jtvdym.

   ^27 vdy xlb jzym llxmk llxm bytk vxyym lnjrvtyk.

  Chapter 28

   ^1 n$v v`yn-rdp rsj v&dyqym kkpyr yb+x.

   ^2 bpsj `r& rbym sryh vb`dm mbyn ydj kn y`ryk.

   ^3 gbr rs vjsq dlym m+r $xp v`yn lxm.

   ^4 jzby tvrh yhllv rsj vsmry tvrh ytgrv bm.

   ^5 `nsy-rj l`-ybynv msp+ vmbqsy yhvh ybynv kl.

   ^6 +vb-rs hvlk btmv mjqs drkym vhv` jsyr.

   ^7 nv&r tvrh bn mbyn vrjh zvllym yklym `byv.

   ^8 mrbh hvnv bnsk vbtrbyt lxvnn dlym yqb&nv.

   ^9 m$yr `znv msmj tvrh gm-tpltv tvjbh.

   ^10 msgh ysrym bdrk rj bsxvtv hv`-ypvl vtmymym ynxlv-+vb.

   ^11 xkm bjynyv `ys jsyr vdl mbyn yxqrnv.

   ^12 bjl& &dyqym rbh tp`rt vbqvm rsjym yxps `dm.

   ^13 mk$h psjyv l` y&lyx vmvdh vjzb yrxm.

   ^14 `sry `dm mpxd tmyd vmqsh lbv ypvl brjh.

   ^15 `ry-nhm vdb svqq msl rsj jl jm-dl.

   ^16 ngyd x$r tbvnvt vrb mjsqvt sn`y b&j y`ryk ymym.

   ^17 `dm jsq bdm-nps jd-bvr ynv$ `l-ytmkv-bv.

   ^18 hvlk tmym yvsj vnjqs drkym ypvl b`xt.

   ^19 jbd `dmtv ysbj-lxm vmrdp rqym ysbj-rys.

   ^20 `ys `mvnvt rb-brkvt v`& lhjsyr l` ynqh.

   ^21 hkr-pnym l`-+vb vjl-pt-lxm ypsj-gbr.

   ^22 nbhl lhvn `ys rj jyn vl`-ydj ky-x$r yb`nv.

   ^23 mvkyx `dm `xry xn ym&` mmxlyq lsvn.

   ^24 gvzl `byv v`mv v`mr `yn-psj xbr hv` l`ys msxyt.

   ^25 rxb-nps ygrh mdvn vbv+x jl-yhvh ydsn.

   ^26 bv+x blbv hv` k$yl vhvlk bxkmh hv` yml+.

   ^27 nvtn lrs `yn mx$vr vmjlym jynyv rb-m`rvt.

   ^28 bqvm rsjym y$tr `dm vb`bdm yrbv &dyqym.

  Chapter 29

   ^1 `ys tvkxvt mqsh-jrp ptj ysbr v`yn mrp`.

   ^2 brbvt &dyqym ysmx hjm vbmsl rsj y`nx jm.

   ^3 `ys-`hb xkmh ysmx `byv vrjh zvnvt y`bd-hvn.

   ^4 mlk bmsp+ yjmyd `r& v`ys trvmvt yhr$nh.

   ^5 gbr mxlyq jl-rjhv rst pvrs jl-pjmyv.

   ^6 bpsj `ys rj mvqs v&dyq yrvn vsmx.

   ^7 ydj &dyq dyn dlym rsj l`-ybyn djt.

   ^8 `nsy l&vn ypyxv qryh vxkmym ysybv `p.

   ^9 `ys-xkm nsp+ `t-`ys `vyl vrgz vsxq v`yn nxt.

   ^10 `nsy dmym ysn`v-tm vysrym ybqsv npsv.

   ^11 kl-rvxv yv&y` k$yl vxkm b`xvr ysbxnh.

   ^12 msl mqsyb jl-dbr-sqr kl-msrtyv rsjym.

   ^13 rs v`ys tkkym npgsv m`yr-jyny snyhm yhvh.

   ^14 mlk svp+ b`mt dlym k$`v ljd ykvn.

   ^15 sb+ vtvkxt ytn xkmh vnjr mslx mbys `mv.

   ^16 brbvt rsjym yrbh-psj v&dyqym bmpltm yr`v.

   ^17 y$r bnk vynyxk vytn mjdnym lnpsk.

   ^18 b`yn xzvn yprj jm vsmr tvrh `srhv.

   ^19 bdbrym l`-yv$r jbd ky-ybyn v`yn mjnh.

   ^20 xzyt `ys `& bdbryv tqvh lk$yl mmnv.

   ^21 mpnq mnjr jbdv v`xrytv yhyh mnvn.

   ^22 `ys-`p ygrh mdvn vbjl xmh rb-psj.

   ^23 g`vt `dm tspylnv vspl-rvx ytmk kbvd.

   ^24 xvlq jm-gnb svn` npsv `lh ysmj vl` ygyd.

   ^25 xrdt `dm ytn mvqs vbv+x byhvh ysgb.

   ^26 rbym mbqsym pny-mvsl vmyhvh msp+-`ys.

   ^27 tvjbt &dyqym `ys jvl vtvjbt rsj ysr-drk.

  Chapter 30

   ^1 dbry `gvr bn-yqh hms` n`m hgbr l`yty`l l`yty`l v`kl.

   ^2 ky bjr `nky m`ys vl`-bynt `dm ly.

   ^3 vl`-lmdty xkmh vdjt qdsym `dj.

   ^4 my jlh-smym vyrd my `$p-rvx bxpnyv my &rr-mym bsmlh my hqym
   kl-`p$y-`r& mh-smv vmh-sm-bnv ky tdj.

   ^5 kl-`mrt `lvh &rvph mgn hv` lx$ym bv.

   ^6 `l-tv$p jl-dbryv pn-yvkyx bk vnkzbt.

   ^7 stym s`lty m`tk `l-tmnj mmny b+rm `mvt.

   ^8 sv` vdbr-kzb hrxq mmny r`s vjsr `l-ttn-ly h+rypny lxm xqy.

   ^9 pn `sbj vkxsty v`mrty my yhvh vpn-`vrs vgnbty vtpsty sm `lhy.

   ^10 `l-tlsn jbd `l-`dnv pn-yqllk v`smt.

   ^11 dvr `byv yqll v`t-`mv l` ybrk.

   ^12 dvr +hvr bjynyv vm&`tv l` rx&.

   ^13 dvr mh-rmv jynyv vjpjpyv yns`v.

   ^14 dvr xrbvt snyv vm`klvt mtljtyv l`kl jnyym m`r& v`byvnym m`dm.

   ^15 ljlvqh sty bnvt hb hb slvs hnh l` tsbjnh `rbj l`-`mrv hvn.

   ^16 s`vl vj&r rxm `r& l`-sbjh mym v`s l`-`mrh hvn.

   ^17 jyn tljg l`b vtbvz lyqht-`m yqrvh jrby-nxl vy`klvh bny-nsr.

   ^18 slsh hmh npl`v mmny v`rbj l` ydjtym.

   ^19 drk hnsr bsmym drk nxs jly &vr drk-`nyh blb-ym vdrk gbr bjlmh.

   ^20 kn drk `sh mn`pt `klh vmxth pyh v`mrh l`-pjlty `vn.

   ^21 txt slvs rgzh `r& vtxt `rbj l`-tvkl s`t.

   ^22 txt-jbd ky ymlvk vnbl ky ysbj-lxm.

   ^23 txt snv`h ky tbjl vspxh ky-tyrs gbrth.

   ^24 `rbjh hm q+ny-`r& vhmh xkmym mxkmym.

   ^25 hnmlym jm l`-jz vykynv bqy& lxmm.

   ^26 spnym jm l`-j&vm vysymv b$lj bytm.

   ^27 mlk `yn l`rbh vy&` x&& klv.

   ^28 smmyt bydym ttps vhy` bhykly mlk.

   ^29 slsh hmh my+yby &jd v`rbjh my+by lkt.

   ^30 lys gbvr bbhmh vl`-ysvb mpny-kl.

   ^31 zrzyr mtnym `v-tys vmlk `lqvm jmv.

   ^32 `m-nblt bhtns` v`m-zmvt yd lph.

   ^33 ky my& xlb yv&y` xm`h vmy&-`p yv&y` dm vmy& `pym yv&y` ryb.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 31

   ^1 dbry lmv`l mlk ms` `sr-y$rtv `mv.

   ^2 mh-bry vmh-br-b+ny vmh br-ndry.

   ^3 `l-ttn lnsym xylk vdrkyk lmxvt mlkyn.

   ^4 `l lmlkym lmv`l `l lmlkym stv-yyn vlrvznym `v skr.

   ^5 pn-ysth vyskx mxqq vysnh dyn kl-bny-jny.

   ^6 tnv-skr l`vbd vyyn lmry nps.

   ^7 ysth vyskx rysv vjmlv l` yzkr-jvd.

   ^8 ptx-pyk l`lm `l-dyn kl-bny xlvp.

   ^9 ptx-pyk sp+-&dq vdyn jny v`byvn.

   ^10 `st-xyl my ym&` vrxq mpnynym mkrh.

   ^11 b+x bh lb bjlh vsll l` yx$r.

   ^12 gmlthv +vb vl`-rj kl ymy xyyh.

   ^13 drsh &mr vpstym vtjs bxp& kpyh.

   ^14 hyth k`nyvt $vxr mmrxq tby` lxmh.

   ^15 vtqm bjvd lylh vttn +rp lbyth vxq lnjrtyh.

   ^16 zmmh sdh vtqxhv mpry kpyh n+j krm.

   ^17 xgrh bjvz mtnyh vt`m& zrjvtyh.

   ^18 +jmh ky-+vb $xrh l`-ykbh blyl nrh.

   ^19 ydyh slxh bkysvr vkpyh tmkv plk.

   ^20 kph prsh ljny vydyh slxh l`byvn.

   ^21 l`-tyr` lbyth mslg ky kl-byth lbs snym.

   ^22 mrbdym jsth-lh ss v`rgmn lbvsh.

   ^23 nvdj bsjrym bjlh bsbtv jm-zqny-`r&.

   ^24 $dyn jsth vtmkr vxgvr ntnh lknjny.

   ^25 jz-vhdr lbvsh vtsxq lyvm `xrvn.

   ^26 pyh ptxh bxkmh vtvrt-x$d jl-lsvnh.

   ^27 &vpyh hlykvt byth vlxm j&lvt l` t`kl.

   ^28 qmv bnyh vy`srvh bjlh vyhllh.

   ^29 rbvt bnvt jsv xyl v`t jlyt jl-klnh.

   ^30 sqr hxn vhbl hypy `sh yr`t-yhvh hy` tthll.

   ^31 tnv-lh mpry ydyh vyhllvh bsjrym mjsyh.

Ecclesiastes
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 1

   ^1 dbry qhlt bn-dvd mlk byrvslm.

   ^2 hbl hblym `mr qhlt hbl hblym hkl hbl.

   ^3 mh-ytrvn l`dm bkl-jmlv syjml txt hsms.

   ^4 dvr hlk vdvr b` vh`r& ljvlm jmdt.

   ^5 vzrx hsms vb` hsms v`l-mqvmv sv`p zvrx hv` sm.

   ^6 hvlk `l-drvm v$vbb `l-&pvn $vbb $bb hvlk hrvx vjl-$bybtyv sb hrvx.

   ^7 kl-hnxlym hlkym `l-hym vhym `ynnv ml` `l-mqvm shnxlym hlkym sm hm
   sbym llkt.

   ^8 kl-hdbrym ygjym l`-yvkl `ys ldbr l`-tsbj jyn lr`vt vl`-tml` `zn
   msmj.

   ^9 mh-shyh hv` syhyh vmh-snjsh hv` syjsh v`yn kl-xds txt hsms.

   ^10 ys dbr sy`mr r`h-zh xds hv` kbr hyh ljlmym `sr hyh mlpnnv.

   ^11 `yn zkrvn lr`snym vgm l`xrnym syhyv l`-yhyh lhm zkrvn jm syhyv
   l`xrnh.

   ^12 `ny qhlt hyyty mlk jl-ysr`l byrvslm.

   ^13 vntty `t-lby ldrvs vltvr bxkmh jl kl-`sr njsh txt hsmym hv` jnyn rj
   ntn `lhym lbny h`dm ljnvt bv.

   ^14 r`yty `t-kl-hmjsym snjsv txt hsms vhnh hkl hbl vrjvt rvx.

   ^15 mjvt l`-yvkl ltqn vx$rvn l`-yvkl lhmnvt.

   ^16 dbrty `ny jm-lby l`mr `ny hnh hgdlty vhv$pty xkmh jl kl-`sr- hyh
   lpny jl-yrvslm vlby r`h hrbh xkmh vdjt.

   ^17 v`tnh lby ldjt xkmh vdjt hvllvt vsklvt ydjty sgm-zh hv` rjyvn rvx.

   ^18 ky brb xkmh rb-kj$ vyv$yp djt yv$yp mk`vb.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 2

   ^1 `mrty `ny blby lkh-n` `n$kh bsmxh vr`h b+vb vhnh gm-hv` hbl.

   ^2 lsxvq `mrty mhvll vlsmxh mh-zh jsh.

   ^3 trty blby lmsvk byyn `t-bsry vlby nhg bxkmh vl`xz b$klvt jd `sr-`r`h
   `y-zh +vb lbny h`dm `sr yjsv txt hsmym m$pr ymy xyyhm.

   ^4 hgdlty mjsy bnyty ly btym n+jty ly krmym.

   ^5 jsyty ly gnvt vprd$ym vn+jty bhm j& kl-pry.

   ^6 jsyty ly brkvt mym lhsqvt mhm yjr &vmx j&ym.

   ^7 qnyty jbdym vspxvt vbny-byt hyh ly gm mqnh bqr v&`n hrbh hyh ly mkl
   shyv lpny byrvslm.

   ^8 kn$ty ly gm-k$p vzhb v$glt mlkym vhmdynvt jsyty ly srym vsrvt
   vtjnvgt bny h`dm sdh vsdvt.

   ^9 vgdlty vhv$pty mkl shyh lpny byrvslm `p xkmty jmdh ly.

   ^10 vkl `sr s`lv jyny l` `&lty mhm l`-mnjty `t-lby mkl-smxh ky- lby smx
   mkl-jmly vzh-hyh xlqy mkl-jmly.

   ^11 vpnyty `ny bkl-mjsy sjsv ydy vbjml sjmlty ljsvt vhnh hkl hbl vrjvt
   rvx v`yn ytrvn txt hsms.

   ^12 vpnyty `ny lr`vt xkmh vhvllvt v$klvt ky mh h`dm sybv` `xry hmlk `t
   `sr-kbr jsvhv.

   ^13 vr`yty `ny sys ytrvn lxkmh mn-h$klvt kytrvn h`vr mn-hxsk.

   ^14 hxkm jynyv br`sv vhk$yl bxsk hvlk vydjty gm-`ny smqrh `xd yqrh
   `t-klm.

   ^15 v`mrty `ny blby kmqrh hk$yl gm-`ny yqrny vlmh xkmty `ny `z yvtr
   vdbrty blby sgm-zh hbl.

   ^16 ky `yn zkrvn lxkm jm-hk$yl ljvlm bskbr hymym hb`ym hkl nskx v`yk
   ymvt hxkm jm-hk$yl.

   ^17 vsn`ty `t-hxyym ky rj jly hmjsh snjsh txt hsms ky-hkl hbl vrjvt
   rvx.

   ^18 vsn`ty `ny `t-kl-jmly s`ny jml txt hsms s`nyxnv l`dm syhyh `xry.

   ^19 vmy yvdj hxkm yhyh `v $kl vysl+ bkl-jmly sjmlty vsxkmty txt hsms
   gm-zh hbl.

   ^20 v$bvty `ny ly`s `t-lby jl kl-hjml sjmlty txt hsms.

   ^21 ky-ys `dm sjmlv bxkmh vbdjt vbksrvn vl`dm sl` jml-bv ytnnv xlqv
   gm-zh hbl vrjh rbh.

   ^22 ky mh-hvh l`dm bkl-jmlv vbrjyvn lbv shv` jml txt hsms.

   ^23 ky kl-ymyv mk`bym vkj$ jnynv gm-blylh l`-skb lbv gm-zh hbl hv`.

   ^24 `yn-+vb b`dm sy`kl vsth vhr`h `t-npsv +vb bjmlv gm-zh r`yty `ny ky
   myd h`lhym hy`.

   ^25 ky my y`kl vmy yxvs xv& mmny.

   ^26 ky l`dm s+vb lpnyv ntn xkmh vdjt vsmxh vlxv+` ntn jnyn l`$vp vlknv$
   ltt l+vb lpny h`lhym gm-zh hbl vrjvt rvx.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 3

   ^1 lkl zmn vjt lkl-xp& txt hsmym.

   ^2 jt lldt vjt lmvt jt l+jt vjt ljqvr n+vj.

   ^3 jt lhrvg vjt lrpv` jt lprv& vjt lbnvt.

   ^4 jt lbkvt vjt lsxvq jt $pvd vjt rqvd.

   ^5 jt lhslyk `bnym vjt knv$ `bnym jt lxbvq vjt lrxq mxbq.

   ^6 jt lbqs vjt l`bd jt lsmvr vjt lhslyk.

   ^7 jt lqrvj vjt ltpvr jt lxsvt vjt ldbr.

   ^8 jt l`hb vjt lsn` jt mlxmh vjt slvm.

   ^9 mh-ytrvn hjvsh b`sr hv` jml.

   ^10 r`yty `t-hjnyn `sr ntn `lhym lbny h`dm ljnvt bv.

   ^11 `t-hkl jsh yph bjtv gm `t-hjlm ntn blbm mbly `sr l`-ym&` h`dm
   `t-hmjsh `sr-jsh h`lhym mr`s vjd-$vp.

   ^12 ydjty ky `yn +vb bm ky `m-lsmvx vljsvt +vb bxyyv.

   ^13 vgm kl-h`dm sy`kl vsth vr`h +vb bkl-jmlv mtt `lhym hy`.

   ^14 ydjty ky kl-`sr yjsh h`lhym hv` yhyh ljvlm jlyv `yn lhv$yp vmmnv
   `yn lgrj vh`lhym jsh syr`v mlpnyv.

   ^15 mh-shyh kbr hv` v`sr lhyvt kbr hyh vh`lhym ybqs `t-nrdp.

   ^16 vjvd r`yty txt hsms mqvm hmsp+ smh hrsj vmqvm h&dq smh hrsj.

   ^17 `mrty `ny blby `t-h&dyq v`t-hrsj ysp+ h`lhym ky-jt lkl-xp& vjl
   kl-hmjsh sm.

   ^18 `mrty `ny blby jl-dbrt bny h`dm lbrm h`lhym vlr`vt shm-bhmh hmh
   lhm.

   ^19 ky mqrh bny-h`dm vmqrh hbhmh vmqrh `xd lhm kmvt zh kn mvt zh vrvx
   `xd lkl vmvtr h`dm mn-hbhmh `yn ky hkl hbl.

   ^20 hkl hvlk `l-mqvm `xd hkl hyh mn-hjpr vhkl sb `l-hjpr.

   ^21 my yvdj rvx bny h`dm hjlh hy` lmjlh vrvx hbhmh hyrdt hy` lm+h l`r&.

   ^22 vr`yty ky `yn +vb m`sr ysmx h`dm bmjsyv ky-hv` xlqv ky my yby`nv
   lr`vt bmh syhyh `xryv.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 4

   ^1 vsbty `ny v`r`h `t-kl-hjsqym `sr njsym txt hsms vhnh dmjt hjsqym
   v`yn lhm mnxm vmyd jsqyhm kx v`yn lhm mnxm.

   ^2 vsbx `ny `t-hmtym skbr mtv mn-hxyym `sr hmh xyym jdnh.

   ^3 v+vb msnyhm `t `sr-jdn l` hyh `sr l`-r`h `t-hmjsh hrj `sr njsh txt
   hsms.

   ^4 vr`yty `ny `t-kl-jml v`t kl-ksrvn hmjsh ky hy` qn`t-`ys mrjhv gm-zh
   hbl vrjvt rvx.

   ^5 hk$yl xbq `t-ydyv v`kl `t-bsrv.

   ^6 +vb ml` kp nxt mml` xpnym jml vrjvt rvx.

   ^7 vsbty `ny v`r`h hbl txt hsms.

   ^8 ys `xd v`yn sny gm bn v`x `yn-lv v`yn q& lkl-jmlv gm-jynyv l`- tsbj
   jsr vlmy `ny jml vmx$r `t-npsy m+vbh gm-zh hbl vjnyn rj hv`.

   ^9 +vbym hsnym mn-h`xd `sr ys-lhm skr +vb bjmlm.

   ^10 ky `m-yplv h`xd yqym `t-xbrv v`ylv h`xd sypvl v`yn sny lhqymv.

   ^11 gm `m-yskbv snym vxm lhm vl`xd `yk yxm.

   ^12 v`m-ytqpv h`xd hsnym yjmdv ngdv vhxv+ hmsls l` bmhrh yntq.

   ^13 +vb yld m$kn vxkm mmlk zqn vk$yl `sr l`-ydj lhzhr jvd.

   ^14 ky-mbyt h$vrym y&` lmlk ky gm bmlkvtv nvld rs.

   ^15 r`yty `t-kl-hxyym hmhlkym txt hsms jm hyld hsny `sr yjmd txtyv.

   ^16 `yn-q& lkl-hjm lkl `sr-hyh lpnyhm gm h`xrvnym l` ysmxv-bv ky- gm-zh
   hbl vrjyvn rvx.

   ^17 smr rglyk k`sr tlk `l-byt h`lhym vqrvb lsmj mtt hk$ylym zbx ky-`ynm
   yvdjym ljsvt rj.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 5

   ^1 `l-tbhl jl-pyk vlbk `l-ymhr lhv&y` dbr lpny h`lhym ky h`lhym bsmym
   v`th jl-h`r& jl-kn yhyv dbryk mj+ym.

   ^2 ky b` hxlvm brb jnyn vqvl k$yl brb dbrym.

   ^3 k`sr tdr ndr l`lhym `l-t`xr lslmv ky `yn xp& bk$ylym `t `sr- tdr
   slm.

   ^4 +vb `sr l`-tdr mstdvr vl` tslm.

   ^5 `l-ttn `t-pyk lx+y` `t-bsrk v`l-t`mr lpny hml`k ky sggh hy` lmh yq&p
   h`lhym jl-qvlk vxbl `t-mjsh ydyk.

   ^6 ky brb xlmvt vhblym vdbrym hrbh ky `t-h`lhym yr`.

   ^7 `m-jsq rs vgzl msp+ v&dq tr`h bmdynh `l-ttmh jl-hxp& ky gbh mjl gbh
   smr vgbhym jlyhm.

   ^8 vytrvn `r& bkl hy` mlk lsdh njbd.

   ^9 `hb k$p l`-ysbj k$p vmy-`hb bhmvn l` tbv`h gm-zh hbl.

   ^10 brbvt h+vbh rbv `vklyh vmh-ksrvn lbjlyh ky `m-r`yt jynyv.

   ^11 mtvqh snt hjbd `m-mj+ v`m-hrbh y`kl vhsbj ljsyr `ynnv mnyx lv
   lysvn.

   ^12 ys rjh xvlh r`yty txt hsms jsr smvr lbjlyv lrjtv.

   ^13 v`bd hjsr hhv` bjnyn rj vhvlyd bn v`yn bydv m`vmh.

   ^14 k`sr y&` mb+n `mv jrvm ysvb llkt ksb` vm`vmh l`-ys` bjmlv sylk
   bydv.

   ^15 vgm-zh rjh xvlh kl-jmt sb` kn ylk vmh-ytrvn lv syjml lrvx.

   ^16 gm kl-ymyv bxsk y`kl vkj$ hrbh vxlyv vq&p.

   ^17 hnh `sr-r`yty `ny +vb `sr-yph l`kvl-vlstvt vlr`vt +vbh bkl- jmlv
   syjml txt-hsms m$pr ymy-xyv `sr-ntn-lv h`lhym ky-hv` xlqv.

   ^18 gm kl-h`dm `sr ntn-lv h`lhym jsr vnk$ym vhsly+v l`kl mmnv vls`t
   `t-xlqv vlsmx bjmlv zh mtt `lhym hy`.

   ^19 ky l` hrbh yzkr `t-ymy xyyv ky h`lhym mjnh bsmxt lbv.

  Chapter 6

   ^1 ys rjh `sr r`yty txt hsms vrbh hy` jl-h`dm.

   rj hv`.

   mn-h+vbh vgm-qbvrh l`-hyth lv `mrty +vb mmnv hnpl.

  Chapter 7

   m&`ty.

  Chapter 8

   ^1 my khxkm vmy yvdj psr dbr xkmt `dm t`yr pnyv vjz pnyv ysn`.

   ^3 `l-tbhl mpnyv tlk `l-tjmd bdbr rj ky kl-`sr yxp& yjsh.

  Chapter 9

   `ynnv zbx k+vb kx+` hnsbj k`sr sbvjh yr`.

   vhvllvt blbbm bxyyhm v`xryv `l-hmtym.

   `sr `th hlk smh.

   bpx khm yvqsym bny h`dm ljt rjh kstpvl jlyhm pt`m.

   ^13 gm-zh r`yty xkmh txt hsms vgdvlh hy` `ly.

   gdlym.

  Chapter 10

  Chapter 11

   sypvl hj& sm yhv`.

   `l-hbvr.

Song of Solomon
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 1

   ^1 syr hsyrym `sr lslmh.

   ^2 ysqny mnsyqvt pyhv ky-+vbym ddyk myyn.

   ^3 lryx smnyk +vbym smn tvrq smk jl-kn jlmvt `hbvk.

   ^4 mskny `xryk nrv&h hby`ny hmlk xdryv ngylh vnsmxh bk nzkyrh ddyk myyn
   mysrym `hbvk.

   ^5 sxvrh `ny vn`vh bnvt yrvslm k`hly qdr kyryjvt slmh.

   ^6 `l-tr`vny s`ny sxrxrt sszptny hsms bny `my nxrv-by smny n+rh
   `t-hkrmym krmy sly l` n+rty.

   ^7 hgydh ly s`hbh npsy `ykh trjh `ykh trby& b&hrym slmh `hyh kj+yh jl
   jdry xbryk.

   ^8 `m-l` tdjy lk hyph bnsym &`y-lk bjqby h&`n vrjy `t-gdytyk jl msknvt
   hrjym.

   ^9 l$$ty brkby prjh dmytyk rjyty.

   ^10 n`vv lxyyk btrym &v`rk bxrvzym.

   ^11 tvry zhb njsh-lk jm nqdvt hk$p.

   ^12 jd-shmlk bm$bv nrdy ntn ryxv.

   ^13 &rvr hmr dvdy ly byn sdy ylyn.

   ^14 `skl hkpr dvdy ly bkrmy jyn gdy.

   ^15 hnk yph rjyty hnk yph jynyk yvnym.

   ^16 hnk yph dvdy `p njym `p-jrsnv rjnnh.

   ^17 qrvt btynv `rzym rxy+nv brvtym.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 2

   ^1 `ny xb&lt hsrvn svsnt hjmqym.

   ^2 ksvsnh byn hxvxym kn rjyty byn hbnvt.

   ^3 ktpvx bj&y hyjr kn dvdy byn hbnym b&lv xmdty vysbty vpryv mtvq lxky.

   ^4 hby`ny `l-byt hyyn vdglv jly `hbh.

   ^5 $mkvny b`sysvt rpdvny btpvxym ky-xvlt `hbh `ny.

   ^6 sm`lv txt lr`sy vymynv txbqny.

   ^7 hsbjty `tkm bnvt yrvslm b&b`vt `v b`ylvt hsdh `m-tjyrv v`m- tjvrrv
   `t-h`hbh jd stxp&.

   ^8 qvl dvdy hnh-zh b` mdlg jl-hhrym mqp& jl-hgbjvt.

   ^9 dvmh dvdy l&by `v ljpr h`ylym hnh-zh jvmd `xr ktlnv msgyx mn- hxlnvt
   m&y& mn-hxrkym.

   ^10 jnh dvdy v`mr ly qvmy lk rjyty ypty vlky-lk.

   ^11 ky-hnh h$tv jbr hgsm xlp hlk lv.

   ^12 hn&nym nr`v b`r& jt hzmyr hgyj vqvl htvr nsmj b`r&nv.

   ^13 ht`nh xn+h pgyh vhgpnym $mdr ntnv ryx qvmy lky rjyty ypty vlky-lk.

   ^14 yvnty bxgvy h$lj b$tr hmdrgh hr`yny `t-mr`yk hsmyjyny `t- qvlk
   ky-qvlk jrb vmr`yk n`vh.

   ^15 `xzv-lnv svjlym svjlym q+nym mxblym krmym vkrmynv $mdr.

   ^16 dvdy ly v`ny lv hrjh bsvsnym.

   ^17 jd sypvx hyvm vn$v h&llym $b dmh-lk dvdy l&by `v ljpr h`ylym jl-hry
   btr.

  Chapter 3

   ^1 jl-mskby blylvt bqsty `t s`hbh npsy bqstyv vl` m&`tyv.

   ^2 `qvmh n` v`$vbbh bjyr bsvqym vbrxbvt `bqsh `t s`hbh npsy bqstyv vl`
   m&`tyv.

   ^3 m&`vny hsmrym h$bbym bjyr `t s`hbh npsy r`ytm.

   ^4 kmj+ sjbrty mhm jd sm&`ty `t s`hbh npsy `xztyv vl` `rpnv jd-
   shby`tyv `l-byt `my v`l-xdr hvrty.

   ^5 hsbjty `tkm bnvt yrvslm b&b`vt `v b`ylvt hsdh `m-tjyrv v`m- tjvrrv
   `t-h`hbh jd stxp&.

   ^6 my z`t jlh mn-hmdbr ktymrvt jsn mq+rt mvr vlbvnh mkl `bqt rvkl.

   ^7 hnh m+tv slslmh ssym gbrym $byb lh mgbry ysr`l.

   vbyvm smxt lbv.

Isaiah
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 1

   ^1 xzvn ysjyhv bn-`mv& `sr xzh jl-yhvdh vyrvslm bymy jzyhv yvtm `xz
   yxzqyhv mlky yhvdh.

   ^2 smjv smym vh`zyny `r& ky yhvh dbr bnym gdlty vrvmmty vhm psjv by.

   ^3 ydj svr qnhv vxmvr `bv$ bjlyv ysr`l l` ydj jmy l` htbvnn.

   ^4 hvy gvy x+` jm kbd jvn zrj mrjym bnym msxytym jzbv `t-yhvh n`&v
   `t-qdvs ysr`l nzrv `xvr.

   ^5 jl mh tkv jvd tv$ypv $rh kl-r`s lxly vkl-lbb dvy.

   ^6 mkp-rgl vjd-r`s `yn-bv mtm p&j vxbvrh vmkh +ryh l`-zrv vl` xbsv vl`
   rkkh bsmn.

   ^7 `r&km smmh jrykm srpvt `s `dmtkm lngdkm zrym `klym `th vsmmh kmhpkt
   zrym.

   ^8 vnvtrh bt-&yvn k$kh bkrm kmlvnh bmqsh kjyr n&vrh.

   ^9 lvly yhvh &b`vt hvtyr lnv sryd kmj+ k$dm hyynv ljmrh dmynv.

   ^10 smjv dbr-yhvh q&yny $dm h`zynv tvrt `lhynv jm jmrh.

   ^11 lmh-ly rb-zbxykm y`mr yhvh sbjty jlvt `ylym vxlb mry`ym vdm prym
   vkbsym vjtvdym l` xp&ty.

   ^12 ky tb`v lr`vt pny my-bqs z`t mydkm rm$ x&ry.

   ^13 l` tv$ypv hby` mnxt-sv` q+rt tvjbh hy` ly xds vsbt qr` mqr` l`-`vkl
   `vn vj&rh.

   ^14 xdsykm vmvjdykm sn`h npsy hyv jly l+rx nl`yty ns`.

   ml`v.

   ^16 rx&v hzkv h$yrv rj mjllykm mngd jyny xdlv hrj.

   ktvlj k&mr yhyv.

   ^19 `m-t`bv vsmjtm +vb h`r& t`klv.

   ^20 v`m-tm`nv vmrytm xrb t`klv ky py yhvh dbr.

   ^22 k$pk hyh l$ygym $b`k mhvl bmym.

   ^25 v`sybh ydy jlyk v`&rp kbr $ygyk v`$yrh kl-bdylyk.

  Chapter 5

   ^1 `syrh n` lydydy syrt dvdy lkrmv krm hyh lydydy bqrn bn-smn.

   gdrv vhyh lmrm$.

   jlyv m+r.

   mspx l&dqh vhnh &jqh.

   ^8 hvy mgyjy byt bbyt sdh bsdh yqrybv jd `p$ mqvm vhvsbtm lbdkm bqrb
   h`r&.

   ^9 b`zny yhvh &b`vt `m-l` btym rbym lsmh yhyv gdlym v+vbym m`yn yvsb.

   ^10 ky jsrt &mdy-krm yjsv bt `xt vzrj xmr yjsh `yph.

   ^11 hvy mskymy bbqr skr yrdpv m`xry bnsp yyn ydlyqm.

   ^12 vhyh knvr vnbl tp vxlyl vyyn mstyhm v`t pjl yhvh l` yby+v vmjsh
   ydyv l` r`v.

   ^13 lkn glh jmy mbly-djt vkbvdv mty rjb vhmvnv &xh &m`.

   ^14 lkn hrxybh s`vl npsh vpjrh pyh lbly-xq vyrd hdrh vhmvnh vs`vnh vjlz
   bh.

   ^15 vysx `dm vyspl-`ys vjyny gbhym tsplnh.

   ^16 vygbh yhvh &b`vt bmsp+ vh`l hqdvs nqds b&dqh.

   ^17 vrjv kbsym kdbrm vxrbvt mxym grym y`klv.

   ^18 hvy msky hjvn bxbly hsv` vkjbvt hjglh x+`h.

   ^19 h`mrym ymhr yxysh mjshv lmjn nr`h vtqrb vtbv`h j&t qdvs ysr`l
   vndjh.

   ^20 hvy h`mrym lrj +vb vl+vb rj smym xsk l`vr v`vr lxsk smym mr lmtvq
   vmtvq lmr.

   ^21 hvy xkmym bjynyhm vngd pnyhm nbnym.

   ^22 hvy gbvrym lstvt yyn v`nsy-xyl lm$k skr.

   ^23 m&dyqy rsj jqb sxd v&dqt &dyqym y$yrv mmnv.

   ^24 lkn k`kl qs lsvn `s vxss lhbh yrph srsm kmq yhyh vprxm k`bq yjlh ky
   m`$v `t tvrt yhvh &b`vt v`t `mrt qdvs-ysr`l n`&v.

   ^25 jl-kn xrh `p-yhvh bjmv vy+ ydv jlyv vykhv vyrgzv hhrym vthy nbltm
   k$vxh bqrb xv&vt bkl-z`t l`-sb `pv vjvd ydv n+vyh.

   ^26 vns`-n$ lgvym mrxvq vsrq lv mq&h h`r& vhnh mhrh ql ybv`.

   ^27 `yn-jyp v`yn-kvsl bv l` ynvm vl` yysn vl` nptx `zvr xl&yv vl` ntq
   srvk njlyv.

   ^28 `sr x&yv snvnym vkl-qsttyv drkvt pr$vt $v$yv k&r nxsbv vglglyv
   k$vph.

   ^29 s`gh lv klby` vs`g kkpyrym vynhm vy`xz +rp vyply+ v`yn m&yl.

   ^30 vynhm jlyv byvm hhv` knhmt-ym vnb+ l`r& vhnh-xsk &r v`vr xsk
   bjrypyh.

  Chapter 14

   ^1 ky yrxm yhvh `t-yjqb vbxr jvd bysr`l vhnyxm jl-`dmtm vnlvh hgr jlyhm

   ^2 vlqxvm jmym vhby`vm `l-mqvmm vhtnxlvm byt-ysr`l jl `dmt yhvh ljbdym
   vlspxvt vhyv sbym lsbyhm vrdv bngsyhm.

   ^7 nxh sq+h kl-h`r& p&xv rnh.

   ^8 gm-brvsym smxv lk `rzy lbnvn m`z skbt l`-yjlh hkrt jlynv.

   kl mlky gvym.

   ^12 `yk nplt msmym hyll bn-sxr ngdjt l`r& xvls jl-gvym.

   ^13 v`th `mrt blbbk hsmym `jlh mmjl lkvkby-`l `rym k$`y v`sb bhr- mvjd
   byrkty &pvn.

   ^14 `jlh jl-bmty jb `dmh ljlyvn.

   ^15 `k `l-s`vl tvrd `l-yrkty-bvr.

   ^16 r`yk `lyk ysgyxv `lyk ytbvnnv hzh h`ys mrgyz h`r& mrjys mmlkvt.

   ^17 sm tbl kmdbr vjryv hr$ `$yryv l`-ptx byth.

   ^18 kl-mlky gvym klm skbv bkbvd `ys bbytv.

   ^19 v`th hslkt mqbrk kn&r ntjb lbvs hrgym m+jny xrb yvrdy `l- `bny-bvr
   kpgr mvb$.

   ^20 l`-txd `tm bqbvrh ky-`r&k sxt jmk hrgt l`-yqr` ljvlm zrj mrjym.

   ^21 hkynv lbnyv m+bx bjvn `bvtm bl-yqmv vyrsv `r& vml`v pny-tbl jrym.

   ^22 vqmty jlyhm n`m yhvh &b`vt vhkrty lbbl sm vs`r vnyn vnkd n`m- yhvh.

   ^23 vsmtyh lmvrs qpd v`gmy-mym v+`+`tyh bm+`+` hsmd n`m yhvh &b`vt.

   ^24 nsbj yhvh &b`vt l`mr `m-l` k`sr dmyty kn hyth vk`sr yj&ty hy` tqvm.

   ^25 lsbr `svr b`r&y vjl-hry `bv$nv v$r mjlyhm jlv v$blv mjl skmv y$vr.

   ^26 z`t hj&h hyjv&h jl-kl-h`r& vz`t hyd hn+vyh jl-kl-hgvym.

   ^27 ky-yhvh &b`vt yj& vmy ypr vydv hn+vyh vmy ysybnh.

   ^28 bsnt-mvt hmlk `xz hyh hms` hzh.

   ^29 `l-tsmxy plst klk ky nsbr sb+ mkk ky-msrs nxs y&` &pj vpryv srp
   mjvpp.

   ^30 vrjv bkvry dlym v`byvnym lb+x yrb&v vhmty brjb srsk vs`rytk yhrg.

   ^31 hylyly sjr zjqy-jyr nmvg plst klk ky m&pvn jsn b` v`yn bvdd
   bmvjdyv.

  Chapter 25

   ^1 yhvh `lhy `th `rvmmk `vdh smk ky jsyt pl` j&vt mrxvq `mvnh `mn.

   ^2 ky smt mjyr lgl qryh b&vrh lmplh `rmvn zrym mjyr ljvlm l` ybnh.

   ^3 jl-kn ykbdvk jm-jz qryt gvym jry&ym yyr`vk.

   ^4 ky-hyyt mjvz ldl mjvz l`byvn b&r-lv mx$h mzrm &l mxrb ky rvx jry&ym
   kzrm qyr.

   ^5 kxrb b&yvn s`vn zrym tknyj xrb b&l jb zmyr jry&ym yjnh.

   ^6 vjsh yhvh &b`vt lkl-hjmym bhr hzh msth smnym msth smrym smnym mmxym
   smrym mzqqym.

   ^7 vblj bhr hzh pny-hlv+ hlv+ jl-kl-hjmym vhm$kh hn$vkh jl-kl- hgvym.

   ^8 blj hmvt ln&x vmxh `dny yhvh dmjh mjl kl-pnym vxrpt jmv y$yr mjl
   kl-h`r& ky yhvh dbr.

   ^9 v`mr byvm hhv` hnh `lhynv zh qvynv lv vyvsyjnv zh yhvh qvynv lv
   ngylh vnsmxh bysvjtv.

   ^10 ky-tnvx yd-yhvh bhr hzh vndvs mv`b txtyv khdvs mtbn bmy mdmnh.

   ^11 vprs ydyv bqrbv k`sr yprs hsxh lsxvt vhspyl g`vtv jm `rbvt ydyv.

   ^12 vmb&r msgb xvmtyk hsx hspyl hgyj l`r& jd-jpr.

  Chapter 26

   ^3 y&r $mvk t&r slvm slvm ky bk b+vx.

   ysby tbl.

   ^18 lbk yhgh `ymh `yh $pr `yh sql `yh $pr `t-hmgdlym.

   v&y `dyr l` yjbrnv.

  Chapter 34

   ^1 qrbv gvym lsmj vl`mym hqsybv tsmj h`r& vml`h tbl vkl-&`&`yh.

   ^2 ky q&p lyhvh jl-kl-hgvym vxmh jl-kl-&b`m hxrymm ntnm l+bx.

   ^3 vxllyhm yslkv vpgryhm yjlh b`sm vnm$v hrym mdmm.

   ^4 vnmqv kl-&b` hsmym vnglv k$pr hsmym vkl-&b`m ybvl knbl jlh mgpn
   vknblt mt`nh.

   ^5 ky-rvth bsmym xrby hnh jl-`dvm trd vjl-jm xrmy lmsp+.

   ^6 xrb lyhvh ml`h dm hdsnh mxlb mdm krym vjtvdym mxlb klyvt `ylym ky
   zbx lyhvh bb&rh v+bx gdvl b`r& `dvm.

   ^7 vyrdv r`mym jmm vprym jm-`byrym vrvth `r&m mdm vjprm mxlb ydsn.

   ^8 ky yvm nqm lyhvh snt slvmym lryb &yvn.

   ^9 vnhpkv nxlyh lzpt vjprh lgpryt vhyth `r&h lzpt bjrh.

   ^10 lylh vyvmm l` tkbh ljvlm yjlh jsnh mdvr ldvr txrb ln&x n&xym `yn
   jbr bh.

   ^11 vyrsvh q`t vqpvd vynsvp vjrb ysknv-bh vn+h jlyh qv-thv v`bny- bhv.

   ^12 xryh v`yn-sm mlvkh yqr`v vkl-sryh yhyv `p$.

   ^13 vjlth `rmntyh $yrym qmvs vxvx bmb&ryh vhyth nvh tnym x&yr lbnvt
   yjnh.

   ^14 vpgsv &yym `t-`yym vsjyr jl-rjhv yqr` `k-sm hrgyjh lylyt vm&`h lh
   mnvx.

   ^15 smh qnnh qpvz vtml+ vbqjh vdgrh b&lh `k-sm nqb&v dyvt `sh rjvth.

   ^16 drsv mjl-$pr yhvh vqr`v `xt mhnh l` njdrh `sh rjvth l` pqdv ky-py
   hv` &vh vrvxv hv` qb&n.

   ^17 vhv`-hpyl lhn gvrl vydv xlqth lhm bqv jd-jvlm yyrsvh ldvr vdvr
   ysknv-bh.

  Chapter 35

   ^1 yssvm mdbr v&yh vtgl jrbh vtprx kxb&lt.

   ^2 prx tprx vtgl `p gylt vrnn kbvd hlbnvn ntn-lh hdr hkrml vhsrvn hmh
   yr`v kbvd-yhvh hdr `lhynv.

   ^3 xzqv ydym rpvt vbrkym kslvt `m&v.

   ^4 `mrv lnmhry-lb xzqv `l-tyr`v hnh `lhykm nqm ybv` gmvl `lhym hv` ybv`
   vysjkm.

   ^5 `z tpqxnh jyny jvrym v`zny xrsym tptxnh.

   ^6 `z ydlg k`yl p$x vtrn lsvn `lm ky-nbqjv bmdbr mym vnxlym bjrbh.

   ^7 vhyh hsrb l`gm v&m`vn lmbvjy mym bnvh tnym rb&h x&yr lqnh vgm`.

   ^8 vhyh-sm m$lvl vdrk vdrk hqds yqr` lh l`-yjbrnv +m` vhv`-lmv hlk drk
   v`vylym l` ytjv.

   ysygv vn$v ygvn v`nxh.

  Chapter 36

   ^1 vyhy b`rbj jsrh snh lmlk xzqyhv jlh $nxryb mlk-`svr jl kl-jry yhvdh
   hb&rvt vytpsm.

   ^2 vyslx mlk-`svr `t-rb-sqh mlkys yrvslmh `l-hmlk xzqyhv bxyl kbd vyjmd
   btjlt hbrkh hjlyvnh bm$lt sdh kvb$.

   ^3 vy&` `lyv `lyqym bn-xlqyhv `sr jl-hbyt vsbn` h$pr vyv`x bn- `$p
   hmzkyr.

   ^4 vy`mr `lyhm rb-sqh `mrv-n` `l-xzqyhv kh-`mr hmlk hgdvl mlk `svr mh
   hb+xvn hzh `sr b+xt.

   ^5 `mrty `k-dbr-sptym j&h vgbvrh lmlxmh jth jl-my b+xt ky mrdt by.

   ^6 hnh b+xt jl-msjnt hqnh hr&v& hzh jl-m&rym `sr y$mk `ys jlyv vb` bkpv
   vnqbh kn prjh mlk-m&rym lkl-hb+xym jlyv.

   ^7 vky-t`mr `ly `l-yhvh `lhynv b+xnv hlv`-hv` `sr h$yr xzqyhv `t- bmtyv
   v`t-mzbxtyv vy`mr lyhvdh vlyrvslm lpny hmzbx hzh tstxvv.

   ^8 vjth htjrb n` `t-`dny hmlk `svr v`tnh lk `lpym $v$ym `m-tvkl ltt lk
   rkbym jlyhm.

   ^9 v`yk tsyb `t pny pxt `xd jbdy `dny hq+nym vtb+x lk jl-m&rym lrkb
   vlprsym.

   ^10 vjth hmbljdy yhvh jlyty jl-h`r& hz`t lhsxyth yhvh `mr `ly jlh
   `l-h`r& hz`t vhsxyth.

   ^11 vy`mr `lyqym vsbn` vyv`x `l-rb-sqh dbr-n` `l-jbdyk `rmyt ky smjym
   `nxnv v`l-tdbr `lynv yhvdyt b`zny hjm `sr jl-hxvmh.

   ^12 vy`mr rb-sqh h`l `dnyk v`lyk slxny `dny ldbr `t-hdbrym h`lh hl`
   jl-h`nsym hysbym jl-hxvmh l`kl `t-xr`yhm vlstvt `t-synyhm jmkm.

   ^13 vyjmd rb-sqh vyqr` bqvl-gdvl yhvdyt vy`mr smjv `t-dbry hmlk hgdvl
   mlk `svr.

   ^14 kh `mr hmlk `l-ys` lkm xzqyhv ky l`-yvkl lh&yl `tkm.

   ^15 v`l-yb+x `tkm xzqyhv `l-yhvh l`mr h&l y&ylnv yhvh l` tntn hjyr hz`t
   byd mlk `svr.

   ^16 `l-tsmjv `l-xzqyhv ky kh `mr hmlk `svr jsv-`ty brkh v&`v `ly v`klv
   `ys-gpnv v`ys t`ntv vstv `ys my-bvrv.

   ^17 jd-b`y vlqxty `tkm `l-`r& k`r&km `r& dgn vtyrvs `r& lxm vkrmym.

   ^18 pn-y$yt `tkm xzqyhv l`mr yhvh y&ylnv hh&ylv `lhy hgvym `ys `t-`r&v
   myd mlk `svr.

   ^19 `yh `lhy xmt v`rpd `yh `lhy $prvym vky-h&ylv `t-smrvn mydy.

   ^20 my bkl-`lhy h`r&vt h`lh `sr-h&ylv `t-`r&m mydy ky-y&yl yhvh
   `t-yrvslm mydy.

   ^21 vyxrysv vl`-jnv `tv dbr ky-m&vt hmlk hy` l`mr l` tjnhv.

  Chapter 37

   ^1 vyhy ksmj hmlk xzqyhv vyqrj `t-bgdyv vytk$ bsq vyb` byt yhvh.

   ^2 vyslx `t-`lyqym `sr-jl-hbyt v`t sbn` h$vpr v`t zqny hkhnym mtk$ym
   bsqym `l-ysjyhv bn-`mv& hnby`.

   ^3 vy`mrv `lyv kh `mr xzqyhv yvm-&rh vtvkxh vn`&h hyvm hzh ky b`v bnym
   jd-msbr vkx `yn lldh.

   ^4 `vly ysmj yhvh `lhyk `t dbry rb-sqh `sr slxv mlk-`svr `dnyv lxrp
   `lhym xy vhvkyx bdbrym `sr smj yhvh `lhyk vns`t tplh bjd hs`ryt hnm&`h.

   ^5 vyb`v jbdy hmlk xzqyhv `l-ysjyhv.

   ^6 vy`mr `lyhm ysjyhv kh t`mrvn `l-`dnykm kh `mr yhvh `l-tyr` mpny
   hdbrym `sr smjt `sr gdpv njry mlk-`svr `vty.

   ^7 hnny nvtn bv rvx vsmj smvjh vsb `l-`r&v vhpltyv bxrb b`r&v.

   ^8 vysb rb-sqh vym&` `t-mlk `svr nlxm jl-lbnh ky smj ky n$j mlkys.

   `l-xzqyhv l`mr.

   ^10 kh t`mrvn `l-xzqyhv mlk-yhvdh l`mr `l-ys`k `lhyk `sr `th bv+x bv
   l`mr l` tntn yrvslm byd mlk `svr.

   ^11 hnh `th smjt `sr jsv mlky `svr lkl-h`r&vt lhxrymm v`th tn&l.

   ^12 hh&ylv `vtm `lhy hgvym `sr hsxytv `bvty `t-gvzn v`t-xrn vr&p
   vbny-jdn `sr btlsr.

   ^13 `yh mlk-xmt vmlk `rpd vmlk ljyr $prvym hnj vjvh.

   ^14 vyqx xzqyhv `t-h$prym myd hml`kym vyqr`hv vyjl byt yhvh vyprshv
   xzqyhv lpny yhvh.

   ^15 vytpll xzqyhv `l-yhvh l`mr.

   ^16 yhvh &b`vt `lhy ysr`l ysb hkrbym `th-hv` h`lhym lbdk lkl mmlkvt
   h`r& `th jsyt `t-hsmym v`t-h`r&.

   ^17 h+h yhvh `znk vsmj pqx yhvh jynk vr`h vsmj `t kl-dbry $nxryb `sr
   slx lxrp `lhym xy.

   ^18 `mnm yhvh hxrybv mlky `svr `t-kl-h`r&vt v`t-`r&m.

   ^19 vntn `t-`lhyhm b`s ky l` `lhym hmh ky `m-mjsh ydy-`dm j& v`bn
   vy`bdvm.

   ^20 vjth yhvh `lhynv hvsyjnv mydv vydjv kl-mmlkvt h`r& ky-`th yhvh
   lbdk.

   ^21 vyslx ysjyhv bn-`mv& `l-xzqyhv l`mr kh-`mr yhvh `lhy ysr`l `sr
   htpllt `ly `l-$nxryb mlk `svr.

   ^22 zh hdbr `sr-dbr yhvh jlyv bzh lk ljgh lk btvlt bt-&yvn `xryk r`s
   hnyjh bt yrvslm.

   ^23 `t-my xrpt vgdpt vjl-my hrymvth qvl vts` mrvm jynyk `l-qdvs ysr`l.

   ^24 byd jbdyk xrpt `dny vt`mr brb rkby `ny jlyty mrvm hrym yrkty lbnvn
   v`krt qvmt `rzyv mbxr brsyv v`bv` mrvm q&v yjr krmlv.

   ^25 `ny qrty vstyty mym v`xrb bkp-pjmy kl y`ry m&vr.

   ^26 hlv`-smjt lmrxvq `vth jsyty mymy qdm vy&rtyh jth hb`tyh vthy lhs`vt
   glym n&ym jrym b&rvt.

   ^27 vysbyhn q&ry-yd xtv vbsv hyv jsb sdh vyrq ds` x&yr ggvt vsdmh lpny
   qmh.

   ^28 vsbtk v&`tk vbv`k ydjty v`t htrgzk `ly.

   ^29 yjn htrgzk `ly vs`nnk jlh b`zny vsmty xxy b`pk vmtgy bsptyk
   vhsybtyk bdrk `sr-b`t bh.

   ^30 vzh-lk h`vt `kvl hsnh $pyx vbsnh hsnyt sxy$ vbsnh hslysyt zrjv
   vq&rv vn+jv krmym v`kvl prym.

   ^31 vy$ph ply+t byt-yhvdh hns`rh srs lm+h vjsh pry lmjlh.

   ^32 ky myrvslm t&` s`ryt vply+h mhr &yvn qn`t yhvh &b`vt tjsh- z`t.

   ^33 lkn kh-`mr yhvh `l-mlk `svr l` ybv` `l-hjyr hz`t vl`-yvrh sm x&
   vl`-yqdmnh mgn vl`-yspk jlyh $llh.

   ^34 bdrk `sr-b` bh ysvb v`l-hjyr hz`t l` ybv` n`m-yhvh.

   ^35 vgnvty jl-hjyr hz`t lhvsyjh lmjny vlmjn dvd jbdy.

   ^36 vy&` ml`k yhvh vykh bmxnh `svr m`h vsmnym vxmsh `lp vyskymv bbqr
   vhnh klm pgrym mtym.

   ^37 vy$j vylk vysb $nxryb mlk-`svr vysb bnynvh.

   ^38 vyhy hv` mstxvh byt n$rk `lhyv v`drmlk vsr`&r bnyv hkhv bxrb vhmh
   nml+v `r& `rr+ vymlk `$r-xdn bnv txtyv.

  Chapter 38

   ^1 bymym hhm xlh xzqyhv lmvt vybv` `lyv ysjyhv bn-`mv& hnby` vy`mr `lyv
   kh-`mr yhvh &v lbytk ky mt `th vl` txyh.

   ^2 vy$b xzqyhv pnyv `l-hqyr vytpll `l-yhvh.

   ^3 vy`mr `nh yhvh zkr-n` `t `sr hthlkty lpnyk b`mt vblb slm vh+vb
   bjynyk jsyty vybk xzqyhv bky gdvl.

   ^4 vyhy dbr-yhvh `l-ysjyhv l`mr.

   ^5 hlvk v`mrt `l-xzqyhv kh-`mr yhvh `lhy dvd `byk smjty `t-tpltk r`yty
   `t-dmjtk hnny yv$p jl-ymyk xms jsrh snh.

   ^6 vmkp mlk-`svr `&ylk v`t hjyr hz`t vgnvty jl-hjyr hz`t.

   ^7 vzh-lk h`vt m`t yhvh `sr yjsh yhvh `t-hdbr hzh `sr dbr.

   ^8 hnny msyb `t-&l hmjlvt `sr yrdh bmjlvt `xz bsms `xrnyt jsr mjlvt
   vtsb hsms jsr mjlvt bmjlvt `sr yrdh.

   ^9 mktb lxzqyhv mlk-yhvdh bxltv vyxy mxlyv.

   ^10 `ny `mrty bdmy ymy `lkh bsjry s`vl pqdty ytr snvty.

   ^11 `mrty l`-`r`h yh yh b`r& hxyym l`-`by+ `dm jvd jm-yvsby xdl.

   ^12 dvry n$j vnglh mny k`hl rjy qpdty k`rg xyy mdlh yb&jny myvm jd-lylh
   tslymny.

   ^13 svyty jd-bqr k`ry kn ysbr kl-j&mvty myvm jd-lylh tslymny.

   ^14 k$v$ jgvr kn `&p&p `hgh kyvnh dlv jyny lmrvm `dny jsqh-ly jrbny.

   ^15 mh-`dbr v`mr-ly vhv` jsh `ddh kl-snvty jl-mr npsy.

   ^16 `dny jlyhm yxyv vlkl-bhn xyy rvxy vtxlymny vhxyny.

   ^17 hnh lslvm mr-ly mr v`th xsqt npsy msxt bly ky hslkt `xry gvk
   kl-x+`y.

   ^18 ky l` s`vl tvdk mvt yhllk l`-ysbrv yvrdy-bvr `l-`mtk.

   ^19 xy xy hv` yvdk kmvny hyvm `b lbnym yvdyj `l-`mtk.

   ^20 yhvh lhvsyjny vngnvty nngn kl-ymy xyynv jl-byt yhvh.

   ^21 vy`mr ysjyhv ys`v dblt t`nym vymrxv jl-hsxyn vyxy.

   ^22 vy`mr xzqyhv mh `vt ky `jlh byt yhvh.

  Chapter 39

   ^1 bjt hhv` slx mrdk bl`dn bn-bl`dn mlk-bbl $prym vmnxh `l- xzqyhv
   vysmj ky xlh vyxzq.

   ^2 vysmx jlyhm xzqyhv vyr`m `t-byt nkth `t-hk$p v`t-hzhb v`t- hbsmym
   v`t hsmn h+vb v`t kl-byt klyv v`t kl-`sr nm&` b`&rtyv l`- hyh dbr `sr
   l`-hr`m xzqyhv bbytv vbkl-mmsltv.

   ^3 vyb` ysjyhv hnby` `l-hmlk xzqyhv vy`mr `lyv mh `mrv h`nsym h`lh
   vm`yn yb`v `lyk vy`mr xzqyhv m`r& rxvqh b`v `ly mbbl.

   ^4 vy`mr mh r`v bbytk vy`mr xzqyhv `t kl-`sr bbyty r`v l`-hyh dbr `sr
   l`-hr`ytym b`v&rty.

   ^5 vy`mr ysjyhv `l-xzqyhv smj dbr-yhvh &b`vt.

   ^6 hnh ymym b`ym vns` kl-`sr bbytk v`sr `&rv `btyk jd-hyvm hzh bbl
   l`-yvtr dbr `mr yhvh.

   ^7 vmbnyk `sr y&`v mmk `sr tvlyd yqxv vhyv $ry$ym bhykl mlk bbl.

   ^8 vy`mr xzqyhv `l-ysjyhv +vb dbr-yhvh `sr dbrt vy`mr ky yhyh slvm v`mt
   bymy.

  Chapter 40

   ^1 nxmv nxmv jmy y`mr `lhykm.

   ^2 dbrv jl-lb yrvslm vqr`v `lyh ky ml`h &b`h ky nr&h jvnh ky lqxh myd
   yhvh kplym bkl-x+`tyh.

   ^3 qvl qvr` bmdbr pnv drk yhvh ysrv bjrbh m$lh l`lhynv.

   ^4 kl-gy` yns` vkl-hr vgbjh ysplv vhyh hjqb lmysvr vhrk$ym lbqjh.

   ^5 vnglh kbvd yhvh vr`v kl-bsr yxdv ky py yhvh dbr.

   ^6 qvl `mr qr` v`mr mh `qr` kl-hbsr x&yr vkl-x$dv k&y& hsdh.

   ^7 ybs x&yr nbl &y& ky rvx yhvh nsbh bv `kn x&yr hjm.

   ^8 ybs x&yr nbl &y& vdbr-`lhynv yqvm ljvlm.

   ^9 jl hr-gbh jly-lk mbsrt &yvn hrymy bkx qvlk mbsrt yrvslm hrymy
   `l-tyr`y `mry ljry yhvdh hnh `lhykm.

   ^10 hnh `dny yhvh bxzq ybv` vzrjv mslh lv hnh skrv `tv vpjltv lpnyv.

   ^11 krjh jdrv yrjh bzrjv yqb& +l`ym vbxyqv ys` jlvt ynhl.

   ^12 my-mdd bsjlv mym vsmym bzrt tkn vkl bsls jpr h`r& vsql bpl$ hrym
   vgbjvt bm`znym.

   ^13 my-tkn `t-rvx yhvh v`ys j&tv yvdyjnv.

   ^14 `t-my nvj& vybynhv vylmdhv b`rx msp+ vylmdhv djt vdrk tbvnvt
   yvdyjnv.

   ^15 hn gvym kmr mdly vksxq m`znym nxsbv hn `yym kdq y+vl.

   ^16 vlbnvn `yn dy bjr vxytv `yn dy jvlh.

   ^17 kl-hgvym k`yn ngdv m`p$ vthv nxsbv-lv.

   ^18 v`l-my tdmyvn `l vmh-dmvt tjrkv lv.

   ^19 hp$l n$k xrs v&rp bzhb yrqjnv vrtqvt k$p &vrp.

   ^20 hm$kn trvmh j& l`-yrqb ybxr xrs xkm ybqs-lv lhkyn p$l l` ymv+.

   ^21 hlv` tdjv hlv` tsmjv hlv` hgd mr`s lkm hlv` hbyntm mv$dvt h`r&.

   ^22 hysb jl-xvg h`r& vysbyh kxgbym hnv+h kdq smym vymtxm k`hl lsbt.

   ^23 hnvtn rvznym l`yn sp+y `r& kthv jsh.

   ^24 `p bl-n+jv `p bl-zrjv `p bl-srs b`r& gzjm vgm-nsp bhm vybsv v$jrh
   kqs ts`m.

   ^25 v`l-my tdmyvny v`svh y`mr qdvs.

   ^26 s`v-mrvm jynykm vr`v my-br` `lh hmv&y` bm$pr &b`m lklm bsm yqr` mrb
   `vnym v`my& kx `ys l` njdr.

   ^27 lmh t`mr yjqb vtdbr ysr`l n$trh drky myhvh vm`lhy msp+y yjbvr.

   ^28 hlv` ydjt `m-l` smjt `lhy jvlm yhvh bvr` q&vt h`r& l` yyjp vl` yygj
   `yn xqr ltbvntv.

   ^29 ntn lyjp kx vl`yn `vnym j&mh yrbh.

   ^30 vyjpv njrym vygjv vbxvrym ksvl ykslv.

   ^31 vqvy yhvh yxlypv kx yjlv `br knsrym yrv&v vl` yygjv ylkv vl` yyjpv.

  Chapter 41

   ^1 hxrysv `ly `yym vl`mym yxlypv kx ygsv `z ydbrv yxdv lmsp+ nqrbh.

   ^2 my hjyr mmzrx &dq yqr`hv lrglv ytn lpnyv gvym vmlkym yrd ytn kjpr
   xrbv kqs ndp qstv.

   ^3 yrdpm yjbvr slvm `rx brglyv l` ybv`.

   ^4 my-pjl vjsh qr` hdrvt mr`s `ny yhvh r`svn v`t-`xrnym `ny-hv`.

   ^5 r`v `yym vyyr`v q&vt h`r& yxrdv qrbv vy`tyvn.

   ^6 `ys `t-rjhv yjzrv vl`xyv y`mr xzq.

   ^7 vyxzq xrs `t-&rp mxlyq p+ys `t-hvlm pjm `mr ldbq +vb hv` vyxzqhv
   bm$mrym l` ymv+.

   ^8 v`th ysr`l jbdy yjqb `sr bxrtyk zrj `brhm `hby.

   ^9 `sr hxzqtyk mq&vt h`r& vm`&ylyh qr`tyk v`mr lk jbdy-`th bxrtyk vl`
   m`$tyk.

   ^10 `l-tyr` ky jmk-`ny `l-tstj ky-`ny `lhyk `m&tyk `p-jzrtyk `p- tmktyk
   bymyn &dqy.

   ^11 hn ybsv vyklmv kl hnxrym bk yhyv k`yn vy`bdv `nsy rybk.

   ^12 tbqsm vl` tm&`m `nsy m&tk yhyv k`yn vk`p$ `nsy mlxmtk.

   ^13 ky `ny yhvh `lhyk mxzyq ymynk h`mr lk `l-tyr` `ny jzrtyk.

   ^14 `l-tyr`y tvljt yjqb mty ysr`l `ny jzrtyk n`m-yhvh vg`lk qdvs ysr`l.

   ^15 hnh smtyk lmvrg xrv& xds bjl pypyvt tdvs hrym vtdq vgbjvt km& tsym.

   ^16 tzrm vrvx ts`m v$jrh tpy& `vtm v`th tgyl byhvh bqdvs ysr`l tthll.

   ^17 hjnyym vh`byvnym mbqsym mym v`yn lsvnm b&m` nsth `ny yhvh `jnm `lhy
   ysr`l l` `jzbm.

   ^18 `ptx jl-spyym nhrvt vbtvk bqjvt mjynvt `sym mdbr l`gm-mym v`r& &yh
   lmv&`y mym.

   ^19 `tn bmdbr `rz s+h vhd$ vj& smn `sym bjrbh brvs tdhr vt`svr yxdv.

   ^20 lmjn yr`v vydjv vysymv vyskylv yxdv ky yd-yhvh jsth z`t vqdvs ysr`l
   br`h.

   ^21 qrbv rybkm y`mr yhvh hgysv j&mvtykm y`mr mlk yjqb.

   ^22 ygysv vygydv lnv `t `sr tqrynh hr`snvt mh hnh hgydv vnsymh lbnv
   vndjh `xrytn `v hb`vt hsmyjnv.

   ^23 hgydv h`tyvt l`xvr vndjh ky `lhym `tm `p-ty+ybv vtrjv vnstjh vnr`
   yxdv.

   ^24 hn-`tm m`yn vpjlkm m`pj tvjbh ybxr bkm.

   ^25 hjyrvty m&pvn vy`t mmzrx-sms yqr` bsmy vyb` $gnym kmv-xmr vkmv yv&r
   yrm$-+y+.

   ^26 my-hgyd mr`s vndjh vmlpnym vn`mr &dyq `p `yn-mgyd `p `yn msmyj `p
   `yn-smj `mrykm.

   ^27 r`svn l&yvn hnh hnm vlyrvslm mbsr `tn.

   ^28 v`r` v`yn `ys vm`lh v`yn yvj& v`s`lm vysybv dbr.

   ^29 hn klm `vn `p$ mjsyhm rvx vthv n$kyhm.

  Chapter 42

   ^1 hn jbdy `tmk-bv bxyry r&th npsy ntty rvxy jlyv msp+ lgvym yv&y`.

   ^2 l` y&jq vl` ys` vl`-ysmyj bxv& qvlv.

   ^3 qnh r&v& l` ysbvr vpsth khh l` ykbnh l`mt yv&y` msp+.

   ^4 l` ykhh vl` yrv& jd-ysym b`r& msp+ vltvrtv `yym yyxylv.

   ^5 kh-`mr h`l yhvh bvr` hsmym vnv+yhm rqj h`r& v&`&`yh ntn nsmh ljm
   jlyh vrvx lhlkym bh.

   ^6 `ny yhvh qr`tyk b&dq v`xzq bydk v`&rk v`tnk lbryt jm l`vr gvym.

   ^7 lpqx jynym jvrvt lhv&y` mm$gr `$yr mbyt kl` ysby xsk.

   ^8 `ny yhvh hv` smy vkbvdy l`xr l`-`tn vthlty lp$ylym.

   ^9 hr`snvt hnh-b`v vxdsvt `ny mgyd b+rm t&mxnh `smyj `tkm.

   ^10 syrv lyhvh syr xds thltv mq&h h`r& yvrdy hym vml`v `yym vysbyhm.

   ^11 ys`v mdbr vjryv x&rym tsb qdr yrnv ysby $lj mr`s hrym y&vxv.

   ^12 ysymv lyhvh kbvd vthltv b`yym ygydv.

   ^13 yhvh kgbvr y&` k`ys mlxmvt yjyr qn`h yryj `p-y&ryx jl-`ybyv ytgbr.

   ^14 hxsyty mjvlm `xrys `t`pq kyvldh `pjh `sm v`s`p yxd.

   ^15 `xryb hrym vgbjvt vkl-jsbm `vbys vsmty nhrvt l`yym v`gmym `vbys.

   ^16 vhvlkty jvrym bdrk l` ydjv bntybvt l`-ydjv `drykm `sym mxsk lpnyhm
   l`vr vmjqsym lmysvr `lh hdbrym jsytm vl` jzbtym.

   ^17 n$gv `xvr ybsv bst hb+xym bp$l h`mrym lm$kh `tm `lhynv.

   ^18 hxrsym smjv vhjvrym hby+v lr`vt.

   ^19 my jvr ky `m-jbdy vxrs kml`ky `slx my jvr kmslm vjvr kjbd yhvh.

   ^20 r`yt rbvt vl` tsmr pqvx `znym vl` ysmj.

   ^21 yhvh xp& lmjn &dqv ygdyl tvrh vy`dyr.

   ^22 vhv` jm-bzvz vs$vy hpx bxvrym klm vbbty kl`ym hxb`v hyv lbz v`yn
   m&yl ms$h v`yn-`mr hsb.

   ^23 my bkm y`zyn z`t yqsb vysmj l`xvr.

   ^24 my-ntn lmsv$h yjqb vysr`l lbzzym hlv` yhvh zv x+`nv lv vl`- `bv
   bdrkyv hlvk vl` smjv btvrtv.

   ^25 vyspk jlyv xmh `pv vjzvz mlxmh vtlh+hv m$byb vl` ydj vtbjr- bv
   vl`-ysym jl-lb.

  Chapter 43

   ^1 vjth kh-`mr yhvh br`k yjqb vy&rk ysr`l `l-tyr` ky g`ltyk qr`ty bsmk
   ly-`th.

   ^2 ky-tjbr bmym `tk-`ny vbnhrvt l` ys+pvk ky-tlk bmv-`s l` tkvh vlhbh
   l` tbjr-bk.

   ^3 ky `ny yhvh `lhyk qdvs ysr`l mvsyjk ntty kprk m&rym kvs v$b` txtyk.

   ^5 `l-tyr` ky `tk-`ny mmzrx `by` zrjk vmmjrb `qb&k.

   ^6 `mr l&pvn tny vltymn `l-tkl`y hby`y bny mrxvq vbnvty mq&h h`r&.

   ^7 kl hnqr` bsmy vlkbvdy br`tyv y&rtyv `p-jsytyv.

   ^8 hv&y` jm-jvr vjynym ys vxrsym v`znym lmv.

   ^9 kl-hgvym nqb&v yxdv vy`$pv l`mym my bhm ygyd z`t vr`snvt ysmyjnv
   ytnv jdyhm vy&dqv vysmjv vy`mrv `mt.

   ^10 `tm jdy n`m-yhvh vjbdy `sr bxrty lmjn tdjv vt`mynv ly vtbynv ky-`ny
   hv` lpny l`-nv&r `l v`xry l` yhyh.

   ^11 `nky `nky yhvh v`yn mbljdy mvsyj.

   ^12 `nky hgdty vhvsjty vhsmjty v`yn bkm zr v`tm jdy n`m-yhvh v`ny-`l.

   ^13 gm-myvm `ny hv` v`yn mydy m&yl `pjl vmy ysybnh.

   ^14 kh-`mr yhvh g`lkm qdvs ysr`l lmjnkm slxty bblh vhvrdty bryxym klm
   vksdym b`nyvt rntm.

   ^15 `ny yhvh qdvskm bvr` ysr`l mlkkm.

   ^16 kh `mr yhvh hnvtn bym drk vbmym jzym ntybh.

   ^17 hmv&y` rkb-v$v$ xyl vjzvz yxdv yskbv bl-yqvmv djkv kpsth kbv.

   ^18 `l-tzkrv r`snvt vqdmnyvt `l-ttbnnv.

   ^19 hnny jsh xdsh jth t&mx hlv` tdjvh `p `sym bmdbr drk bysmvn nhrvt.

   lhsqvt jmy bxyry.

   ^21 jm-zv y&rty ly thlty y$prv.

   ^22 vl`-`ty qr`t yjqb ky-ygjt by ysr`l.

   blbvnh.

  Chapter 44

   ^1 vjth smj yjqb jbdy vysr`l bxrty bv.

   ^2 kh-`mr yhvh jsk vy&rk mb+n yjzrk `l-tyr` jbdy yjqb vysrvn bxrty bv.

   yknh.

   `yn `lhym.

   ^11 hn kl-xbryv ybsv vxrsym hmh m`dm ytqb&v klm yjmdv ypxdv ybsv yxd.

   ^12 xrs brzl mj&d vpjl bpxm vbmqbvt y&rhv vypjlhv bzrvj kxv gm- rjb
   v`yn kx l`-sth mym vyyjp.

   ^13 xrs j&ym n+h qv yt`rhv bsrd yjshv bmq&jvt vbmxvgh yt`rhv vyjshv
   ktbnyt `ys ktp`rt `dm lsbt byt.

   ^14 lkrt-lv `rzym vyqx trzh v`lvn vy`m&-lv bj&y-yjr n+j `rn vgsm ygdl.

   ^15 vhyh l`dm lbjr vyqx mhm vyxm `p-ysyq v`ph lxm `p-ypjl-`l vystxv
   jshv p$l vy$gd-lmv.

   ^16 x&yv srp bmv-`s jl-x&yv bsr y`kl y&lh &ly vysbj `p-yxm vy`mr h`x
   xmvty r`yty `vr.

   ^17 vs`rytv l`l jsh lp$lv y$gvd-lv vystxv vytpll `lyv vy`mr h&ylny ky
   `ly `th.

   ^18 l` ydjv vl` ybynv ky +x mr`vt jynyhm mhskyl lbtm.

   ^19 vl`-ysyb `l-lbv vl` djt vl`-tbvnh l`mr x&yv srpty bmv-`s v`p `pyty
   jl-gxlyv lxm `&lh bsr v`kl vytrv ltvjbh `jsh lbvl j& `$gvd.

   ^20 rjh `pr lb hvtl h+hv vl`-y&yl `t-npsv vl` y`mr hlv` sqr bymyny.

   ^21 zkr-`lh yjqb vysr`l ky jbdy-`th y&rtyk jbd-ly `th ysr`l l` tnsny.

   ^22 mxyty kjb psjyk vkjnn x+`vtyk svbh `ly ky g`ltyk.

   ^23 rnv smym ky-jsh yhvh hryjv txtyvt `r& p&xv hrym rnh yjr vkl- j& bv
   ky-g`l yhvh yjqb vbysr`l ytp`r.

   ^24 kh-`mr yhvh g`lk vy&rk mb+n `nky yhvh jsh kl n+h smym lbdy rqj h`r&
   my `ty.

   ^25 mpr `tvt bdym vq$mym yhvll msyb xkmym `xvr vdjtm yskl.

  Chapter 45

   ^1 kh-`mr yhvh lmsyxv lkvrs `sr-hxzqty bymynv lrd-lpnyv gvym vmtny
   mlkym `ptx lptx lpnyv dltym vsjrym l` y$grv.

   `lhy ysr`l.

   ^4 lmjn jbdy yjqb vysr`l bxyry v`qr` lk bsmk `knk vl` ydjtny.

   ^6 lmjn ydjv mmzrx-sms vmmjrbh ky-`p$ bljdy `ny yhvh v`yn jvd.

   ^7 yv&r `vr vbvr` xsk jsh slvm vbvr` rj `ny yhvh jsh kl-`lh.

   `ny yhvh br`tyv.

   `yn-ydym lv.

   ^10 hvy `mr l`b mh-tvlyd vl`sh mh-txylyn.

   t&vny.

   ^12 `nky jsyty `r& v`dm jlyh br`ty `ny ydy n+v smym vkl-&b`m &vyty.

   vl` bsxd `mr yhvh &b`vt.

   `lhym.

   ^15 `kn `th `l m$ttr `lhy ysr`l mvsyj.

   ^16 bvsv vgm-nklmv klm yxdv hlkv bklmh xrsy &yrym.

   ^17 ysr`l nvsj byhvh tsvjt jvlmym l`-tbsv vl`-tklmv jd-jvlmy jd.

   br`h lsbt y&rh `ny yhvh v`yn jvd.

   ^19 l` b$tr dbrty bmqvm `r& xsk l` `mrty lzrj yjqb thv bqsvny `ny yhvh

   ^20 hqb&v vb`v htngsv yxdv ply+y hgvym l` ydjv hns`ym `t-j& p$lm
   vmtpllym `l-`l l` yvsyj.

   ^21 hgydv vhgysv `p yvj&v yxdv my hsmyj z`t mqdm m`z hgydh hlv` `ny
   yhvh v`yn-jvd `lhym mbljdy `l-&dyq vmvsyj `yn zvlty.

   ^22 pnv-`ly vhvsjv kl-`p$y-`r& ky `ny-`l v`yn jvd.

   ^23 by nsbjty y&` mpy &dqh dbr vl` ysvb ky-ly tkrj kl-brk tsbj kl-lsvn.

  Chapter 48

   ^1 smjv-z`t byt-yjqb hnqr`ym bsm ysr`l vmmy yhvdh y&`v hnsbjym bsm yhvh
   vb`lhy ysr`l yzkyrv l` b`mt vl` b&dqh.

   ^2 ky-mjyr hqds nqr`v vjl-`lhy ysr`l n$mkv yhvh &b`vt smv.

   ^3 hr`snvt m`z hgdty vmpy y&`v v`smyjm pt`m jsyty vtb`nh.

   ^4 mdjty ky qsh `th vgyd brzl jrpk vm&xk nxvsh.

   ^5 v`gyd lk m`z b+rm tbv` hsmjtyk pn-t`mr j&by jsm vp$ly vn$ky &vm.

   ^6 smjt xzh klh v`tm hlv` tgydv hsmjtyk xdsvt mjth vn&rvt vl` ydjtm.

   ^7 jth nbr`v vl` m`z vlpny-yvm vl` smjtm pn-t`mr hnh ydjtyn.

   mb+n qr` lk.

   ^9 lmjn smy ``ryk `py vthlty `x+m-lk lblty hkrytk.

   ^10 hnh &rptyk vl` bk$p bxrtyk bkvr jny.

   ^11 lmjny lmjny `jsh ky `yk yxl vkbvdy l`xr l`-`tn.

   ^12 smj `ly yjqb vysr`l mqr`y `ny-hv` `ny r`svn `p `ny `xrvn.

   ^13 `p-ydy y$dh `r& vymyny +pxh smym qr` `ny `lyhm yjmdv yxdv.

   ^14 hqb&v klkm vsmjv my bhm hgyd `t-`lh yhvh `hbv yjsh xp&v bbbl vzrjv
   ksdym.

   ^15 `ny `ny dbrty `p-qr`tyv hby`tyv vh&lyx drkv.

   ^16 qrbv `ly smjv-z`t l` mr`s b$tr dbrty mjt hyvth sm `ny vjth `dny
   yhvh slxny vrvxv.

   ^17 kh-`mr yhvh g`lk qdvs ysr`l `ny yhvh `lhyk mlmdk lhvjyl mdrykk bdrk
   tlk.

   ^18 lv` hqsbt lm&vty vyhy knhr slvmk v&dqtk kgly hym.

   ^19 vyhy kxvl zrjk v&`&`y mjyk kmjtyv l`-ykrt vl`-ysmd smv mlpny.

   ^20 &`v mbbl brxv mksdym bqvl rnh hgydv hsmyjv z`t hv&y`vh jd- q&h h`r&
   `mrv g`l yhvh jbdv yjqb.

  Chapter 49

   ^1 smjv `yym `ly vhqsybv l`mym mrxvq yhvh mb+n qr`ny mmjy `my hzkyr
   smy.

   ^2 vysm py kxrb xdh b&l ydv hxby`ny vysymny lx& brvr b`sptv h$tyrny.

   ^3 vy`mr ly jbdy-`th ysr`l `sr-bk `tp`r.

   ^4 v`ny `mrty lryq ygjty lthv vhbl kxy klyty `kn msp+y `t-yhvh vpjlty
   `t-`lhy.

   ^5 vjth `mr yhvh y&ry mb+n ljbd lv lsvbb yjqb `lyv vysr`l l` y`$p v`kbd
   bjyny yhvh v`lhy hyh jzy.

   ^6 vy`mr nql mhyvtk ly jbd lhqym `t-sb+y yjqb vn&yry ysr`l lhsyb vnttyk
   l`vr gvym lhyvt ysvjty jd-q&h h`r&.

   ^7 kh `mr-yhvh g`l ysr`l qdvsv lbzh-nps lmtjb gvy ljbd mslym mlkym yr`v
   vqmv srym vystxvv lmjn yhvh `sr n`mn qds ysr`l vybxrk.

   ^8 kh `mr yhvh bjt r&vn jnytyk vbyvm ysvjh jzrtyk v`&rk v`tnk lbryt jm
   lhqym `r& lhnxyl nxlvt smmvt.

   ^9 l`mr l`$vrym &`v l`sr bxsk hglv jl-drkym yrjv vbkl-spyym mrjytm.

   ^10 l` yrjbv vl` y&m`v vl`-ykm srb vsms ky-mrxmm ynhgm vjl-mbvjy mym
   ynhlm.

   ^11 vsmty kl-hry ldrk vm$lty yrmvn.

   ^12 hnh-`lh mrxvq yb`v vhnh-`lh m&pvn vmym v`lh m`r& $ynym.

   ^13 rnv smym vgyly `r& yp&xv hrym rnh ky-nxm yhvh jmv vjnyv yrxm.

   ^14 vt`mr &yvn jzbny yhvh v`dny skxny.

   ^15 htskx `sh jvlh mrxm bn-b+nh gm-`lh tskxnh v`nky l` `skxk.

   ^16 hn jl-kpym xqtyk xvmtyk ngdy tmyd.

   ^17 mhrv bnyk mhr$yk vmxrbyk mmk y&`v.

   ^18 s`y-$byb jynyk vr`y klm nqb&v b`v-lk xy-`ny n`m-yhvh ky klm kjdy
   tlbsy vtqsrym kklh.

   ^19 ky xrbtyk vsmmtyk v`r& hr$tyk ky jth t&ry myvsb vrxqv mbljyk.

   ^20 jvd y`mrv b`znyk bny sklyk &r-ly hmqvm gsh-ly v`sbh.

   ^21 v`mrt blbbk my yld-ly `t-`lh v`ny skvlh vglmvdh glh v$vrh v`lh my
   gdl hn `ny ns`rty lbdy `lh `yph hm.

   ^22 kh-`mr `dny yhvh hnh `s` `l-gvym ydy v`l-jmym `rym n$y vhby`v bnyk
   bx&n vbntyk jl-ktp tns`nh.

   ^23 vhyv mlkym `mnyk vsrvtyhm mynyqtyk `pym `r& ystxvv lk vjpr rglyk
   ylxkv vydjt ky-`ny yhvh `sr l`-ybsv qvy.

   ^24 hyqx mgbvr mlqvx v`m-sby &dyq yml+.

   ^25 ky-kh `mr yhvh gm-sby gbvr yqx vmlqvx jry& yml+ v`t-yrybk `nky `ryb
   v`t-bnyk `nky `vsyj.

   ^26 vh`klty `t-mvnyk `t-bsrm vkj$y$ dmm yskrvn vydjv kl-bsr ky `ny yhvh
   mvsyjk vg`lk `byr yjqb.

  Chapter 59

   ^1 hn l`-q&rh yd-yhvh mhvsyj vl`-kbdh `znv msmvj.

   ^2 ky `m-jvntykm hyv mbdlym bynkm lbyn `lhykm vx+`vtykm h$tyrv pnym mkm
   msmvj.

   ^3 ky kpykm ng`lv bdm v`&bjvtykm bjvn sptvtykm dbrv-sqr lsvnkm jvlh
   thgh.

   `vn.

   ^5 by&y &pjvny bqjv vqvry jkbys y`rgv h`kl mby&yhm ymvt vhzvrh tbqj
   `pjh.

   ^6 qvryhm l`-yhyv lbgd vl` ytk$v bmjsyhm mjsyhm mjsy-`vn vpjl xm$
   bkpyhm.

   ^7 rglyhm lrj yr&v vymhrv lspk dm nqy mxsbvtyhm mxsbvt `vn sd vsbr
   bm$lvtm.

   ^8 drk slvm l` ydjv v`yn msp+ bmjglvtm ntybvtyhm jqsv lhm kl drk bh l`
   ydj slvm.

   ^9 jl-kn rxq msp+ mmnv vl` tsygnv &dqh nqvh l`vr vhnh-xsk lnghvt b`plvt
   nhlk.

   ^10 ngssh kjvrym qyr vk`yn jynym ngssh kslnv b&hrym knsp b`smnym kmtym.

   ^11 nhmh kdbym klnv vkyvnym hgh nhgh nqvh lmsp+ v`yn lysvjh rxqh mmnv.

   ^12 ky-rbv psjynv ngdk vx+`vtynv jnth bnv ky-psjynv `tnv vjvntynv
   ydjnvm.

   ^13 psj vkxs byhvh vn$vg m`xr `lhynv dbr-jsq v$rh hrv vhgv mlb
   dbry-sqr.

   ^14 vh$g `xvr msp+ v&dqh mrxvq tjmd ky-kslh brxvb `mt vnkxh l`- tvkl
   lbv`.

   ^15 vthy h`mt njdrt v$r mrj mstvll vyr` yhvh vyrj bjynyv ky-`yn msp+.

   ^16 vyr` ky-`yn `ys vystvmm ky `yn mpgyj vtvsj lv zrjv v&dqtv hy`
   $mkthv.

   ^17 vylbs &dqh ksryn vkvbj ysvjh br`sv vylbs bgdy nqm tlbst vyj+ kmjyl
   qn`h.

   ^18 kjl gmlvt kjl yslm xmh l&ryv gmvl l`ybyv l`yym gmvl yslm.

   ^19 vyyr`v mmjrb `t-sm yhvh vmmzrx-sms `t-kbvdv ky-ybv` knhr &r rvx
   yhvh n$$h bv.

   ^20 vb` l&yvn gv`l vlsby psj byjqb n`m yhvh.

   ^21 v`ny z`t bryty `vtm `mr yhvh rvxy `sr jlyk vdbry `sr-smty bpyk
   l`-ymvsv mpyk vmpy zrjk vmpy zrj zrjk `mr yhvh mjth vjd- jvlm.

  Chapter 60

   ^1 qvmy `vry ky b` `vrk vkbvd yhvh jlyk zrx.

   ^2 ky-hnh hxsk yk$h-`r& vjrpl l`mym vjlyk yzrx yhvh vkbvdv jlyk yr`h.

   ^3 vhlkv gvym l`vrk vmlkym lngh zrxk.

   ^4 s`y-$byb jynyk vr`y klm nqb&v b`v-lk bnyk mrxvq yb`v vbntyk jl-&d
   t`mnh.

   ^5 `z tr`y vnhrt vpxd vrxb lbbk ky-yhpk jlyk hmvn ym xyl gvym yb`v lk.

   ^6 spjt gmlym tk$k bkry mdyn vjyph klm msb` yb`v zhb vlbvnh ys`v vthlt
   yhvh ybsrv.

   ^7 kl-&`n qdr yqb&v lk `yly nbyvt ysrtvnk yjlv jl-r&vn mzbxy vbyt
   tp`rty `p`r.

   ^8 my-`lh kjb tjvpynh vkyvnym `l-`rbtyhm.

   ^9 ky-ly `yym yqvv v`nyvt trsys br`snh lhby` bnyk mrxvq k$pm vzhbm `tm
   lsm yhvh `lhyk vlqdvs ysr`l ky p`rk.

   ^10 vbnv bny-nkr xmtyk vmlkyhm ysrtvnk ky bq&py hkytyk vbr&vny rxmtyk.

   nhvgym.

   ^12 ky-hgvy vhmmlkh `sr l`-yjbdvk y`bdv vhgvym xrb yxrbv.

   ^13 kbvd hlbnvn `lyk ybv` brvs tdhr vt`svr yxdv lp`r mqvm mqdsy vmqvm
   rgly `kbd.

   ^14 vhlkv `lyk sxvx bny mjnyk vhstxvv jl-kpvt rglyk kl-mn`&yk vqr`v lk
   jyr yhvh &yvn qdvs ysr`l.

   ^15 txt hyvtk jzvbh vsnv`h v`yn jvbr vsmtyk lg`vn jvlm msvs dvr vdvr.

   ^16 vynqt xlb gvym vsd mlkym tynqy vydjt ky `ny yhvh mvsyjk vg`lk `byr
   yjqb.

   ^17 txt hnxst `by` zhb vtxt hbrzl `by` k$p vtxt hj&ym nxst vtxt h`bnym
   brzl vsmty pqdtk slvm vngsyk &dqh.

   ^18 l`-ysmj jvd xm$ b`r&k sd vsbr bgbvlyk vqr`t ysvjh xvmtyk vsjryk
   thlh.

   ^19 l`-yhyh-lk jvd hsms l`vr yvmm vlngh hyrx l`-y`yr lk vhyh-lk yhvh
   l`vr jvlm v`lhyk ltp`rtk.

   ^20 l`-ybv` jvd smsk vyrxk l` y`$p ky yhvh yhyh-lk l`vr jvlm vslmv ymy
   `blk.

   ^21 vjmk klm &dyqym ljvlm yyrsv `r& n&r m+jv mjsh ydy lhtp`r.

   ^22 hq+n yhyh l`lp vh&jyr lgvy j&vm `ny yhvh bjth `xysnh.

  Chapter 65

   ^1 ndrsty llv` s`lv nm&`ty ll` bqsny `mrty hnny hnny `l-gvy l`- qr`
   bsmy.

   ^4 hysbym bqbrym vbn&vrym ylynv h`klym bsr hxzyr vprq pglym klyhm.

   ^5 h`mrym qrb `lyk `l-tgs-by ky qdstyk `lh jsn b`py `s yqdt kl- hyvm.

   ^6 hnh ktvbh lpny l` `xsh ky `m-slmty vslmty jl-xyqm.

   ^7 jvntykm vjvnt `bvtykm yxdv `mr yhvh `sr q+rv jl-hhrym vjl- hgbjvt
   xrpvny vmdty pjltm r`snh jl-xyqm.

   ^8 kh `mr yhvh k`sr ym&` htyrvs b`skvl v`mr `l-tsxythv ky brkh bv kn
   `jsh lmjn jbdy lblty hsxyt hkl.

   ^9 vhv&`ty myjqb zrj vmyhvdh yvrs hry vyrsvh bxyry vjbdy ysknv- smh.

   ^10 vhyh hsrvn lnvh-&`n vjmq jkvr lrb& bqr ljmy `sr drsvny.

   ^11 v`tm jzby yhvh hskxym `t-hr qdsy hjrkym lgd slxn vhmml`ym lmny
   mm$k.

   ^12 vmnyty `tkm lxrb vklkm l+bx tkrjv yjn qr`ty vl` jnytm dbrty vl`
   smjtm vtjsv hrj bjyny vb`sr l`-xp&ty bxrtm.

   ^13 lkn kh-`mr `dny yhvh hnh jbdy y`klv v`tm trjbv hnh jbdy ystv v`tm
   t&m`v hnh jbdy ysmxv v`tm tbsv.

   ^14 hnh jbdy yrnv m+vb lb v`tm t&jqv mk`b lb vmsbr rvx tylylv.

   ^15 vhnxtm smkm lsbvjh lbxyry vhmytk `dny yhvh vljbdyv yqr` sm `xr.

   ^16 `sr hmtbrk b`r& ytbrk b`lhy `mn vhnsbj b`r& ysbj b`lhy `mn ky nskxv
   h&rvt hr`snvt vky n$trv mjyny.

   ^17 ky-hnny bvr` smym xdsym v`r& xdsh vl` tzkrnh hr`snvt vl` tjlynh
   jl-lb.

   ^18 ky-`m-sysv vgylv jdy-jd `sr `ny bvr` ky hnny bvr` `t-yrvslm gylh
   vjmh msvs.

   ^19 vglty byrvslm vssty bjmy vl`-ysmj bh jvd qvl bky vqvl zjqh.

   ^20 l`-yhyh msm jvd jvl ymym vzqn `sr l`-yml` `t-ymyv ky hnjr bn- m`h
   snh ymvt vhxv+` bn-m`h snh yqll.

   ^21 vbnv btym vysbv vn+jv krmym v`klv prym.

   ^22 l` ybnv v`xr ysb l` y+jv v`xr y`kl ky-kymy hj& ymy jmy vmjsh ydyhm
   yblv bxyry.

   ^23 l` yygjv lryq vl` yldv lbhlh ky zrj brvky yhvh hmh v&`&`yhm `tm.

   ^24 vhyh +rm-yqr`v v`ny `jnh jvd hm mdbrym v`ny `smj.

   ^25 z`b v+lh yrjv k`xd v`ryh kbqr y`kl-tbn vnxs jpr lxmv l`-yrjv
   vl`-ysxytv bkl-hr qdsy `mr yhvh.

  Chapter 66

   ^1 kh `mr yhvh hsmym k$`y vh`r& hdm rgly `y-zh byt `sr tbnv-ly v`y-zh
   mqvm mnvxty.

   ^2 v`t-kl-`lh ydy jsth vyhyv kl-`lh n`m-yhvh v`l-zh `by+ `l-jny
   vnkh-rvx vxrd jl-dbry.

   ^3 svx+ hsvr mkh-`ys zvbx hsh jrp klb mjlh mnxh dm-xzyr mzkyr lbnh mbrk
   `vn gm-hmh bxrv bdrkyhm vbsqv&yhm npsm xp&h.

   ^4 gm-`ny `bxr btjllyhm vmgvrtm `by` lhm yjn qr`ty v`yn jvnh dbrty vl`
   smjv vyjsv hrj bjyny vb`sr l`-xp&ty bxrv.

   ^5 smjv dbr-yhvh hxrdym `l-dbrv `mrv `xykm sn`ykm mndykm lmjn smy ykbd
   yhvh vnr`h bsmxtkm vhm ybsv.

   ^6 qvl s`vn mjyr qvl mhykl qvl yhvh mslm gmvl l`ybyv.

   ^7 b+rm txyl yldh b+rm ybv` xbl lh vhmly+h zkr.

   ^8 my-smj kz`t my r`h k`lh hyvxl `r& byvm `xd `m-yvld gvy pjm `xt
   ky-xlh gm-yldh &yvn `t-bnyh.

   ^9 h`ny `sbyr vl` `vlyd y`mr yhvh `m-`ny hmvlyd vj&rty `mr `lhyk.

   ^10 smxv `t-yrvslm vgylv bh kl-`hbyh sysv `th msvs kl-hmt`blym jlyh.

   ^11 lmjn tynqv vsbjtm msd tnxmyh lmjn tm&v vhtjngtm mzyz kbvdh.

   ^12 ky-kh `mr yhvh hnny n+h-`lyh knhr slvm vknxl sv+p kbvd gvym vynqtm
   jl-&d tns`v vjl-brkym tsjsjv.

   ^13 k`ys `sr `mv tnxmnv kn `nky `nxmkm vbyrvslm tnxmv.

   ^14 vr`ytm vss lbkm vj&mvtykm kds` tprxnh vnvdjh yd-yhvh `t- jbdyv vzjm
   `t-`ybyv.

   ^15 ky-hnh yhvh b`s ybv` vk$vph mrkbtyv lhsyb bxmh `pv vgjrtv blhby-`s.

   ^16 ky b`s yhvh nsp+ vbxrbv `t-kl-bsr vrbv xlly yhvh.

   ^17 hmtqdsym vhm+hrym `l-hgnvt `xr `xd btvk `kly bsr hxzyr vhsq& vhjkbr
   yxdv y$pv n`m-yhvh.

   ^18 v`nky mjsyhm vmxsbtyhm b`h lqb& `t-kl-hgvym vhlsnvt vb`v vr`v
   `t-kbvdy.

   ^19 vsmty bhm `vt vslxty mhm ply+ym `l-hgvym trsys pvl vlvd msky qst
   tbl vyvn h`yym hrxqym `sr l`-smjv `t-smjy vl`-r`v `t-kbvdy vhgydv
   `t-kbvdy bgvym.

   ^20 vhby`v `t-kl-`xykm mkl-hgvym mnxh lyhvh b$v$ym vbrkb vb&bym vbprdym
   vbkrkrvt jl hr qdsy yrvslm `mr yhvh k`sr yby`v bny ysr`l `t-hmnxh bkly
   +hvr byt yhvh.

   ^21 vgm-mhm `qx lkhnym llvym `mr yhvh.

   ^22 ky k`sr hsmym hxdsym vh`r& hxdsh `sr `ny jsh jmdym lpny n`m- yhvh
   kn yjmd zrjkm vsmkm.

   ^23 vhyh mdy-xds bxdsv vmdy sbt bsbtv ybv` kl-bsr lhstxvt lpny `mr
   yhvh.

   ^24 vy&`v vr`v bpgry h`nsym hpsjym by ky tvljtm l` tmvt v`sm l` tkbh
   vhyv dr`vn lkl-bsr.

Jeremiah
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 1

   ^1 dbry yrmyhv bn-xlqyhv mn-hkhnym `sr bjntvt b`r& bnymn.

   ^2 `sr hyh dbr-yhvh `lyv bymy y`syhv bn-`mvn mlk yhvdh bsls-jsrh snh
   lmlkv.

   ^3 vyhy bymy yhvyqym bn-y`syhv mlk yhvdh jd-tm jsty jsrh snh l&dqyhv
   bn-y`syhv mlk yhvdh jd-glvt yrvslm bxds hxmysy.

   ^4 vyhy dbr-yhvh `ly l`mr.

   ^5 b+rm `&vrk bb+n ydjtyk vb+rm t&` mrxm hqdstyk nby` lgvym nttyk.

   ^6 v`mr `hh `dny yhvh hnh l`-ydjty dbr ky-njr `nky.

   ^7 vy`mr yhvh `ly `l-t`mr njr `nky ky jl-kl-`sr `slxk tlk v`t kl- `sr
   `&vk tdbr.

   ^8 `l-tyr` mpnyhm ky-`tk `ny lh&lk n`m-yhvh.

   ^9 vyslx yhvh `t-ydv vygj jl-py vy`mr yhvh `ly hnh ntty dbry bpyk.

   ^10 r`h hpqdtyk hyvm hzh jl-hgvym vjl-hmmlkvt lntvs vlntv& vlh`byd
   vlhrv$ lbnvt vln+vj.

   ^11 vyhy dbr-yhvh `ly l`mr mh-`th r`h yrmyhv v`mr mql sqd `ny r`h.

   ^12 vy`mr yhvh `ly hy+bt lr`vt ky-sqd `ny jl-dbry ljstv.

   ^13 vyhy dbr-yhvh `ly snyt l`mr mh `th r`h v`mr $yr npvx `ny r`h vpnyv
   mpny &pvnh.

   ^14 vy`mr yhvh `ly m&pvn tptx hrjh jl kl-ysby h`r&.

   ^15 ky hnny qr` lkl-mspxvt mmlkvt &pvnh n`m-yhvh vb`v vntnv `ys k$`v
   ptx sjry yrvslm vjl kl-xvmtyh $byb vjl kl-jry yhvdh.

   ^16 vdbrty msp+y `vtm jl kl-rjtm `sr jzbvny vyq+rv l`lhym `xrym vystxvv
   lmjsy ydyhm.

   ^17 v`th t`zr mtnyk vqmt vdbrt `lyhm `t kl-`sr `nky `&vk `l-txt mpnyhm
   pn-`xtk lpnyhm.

   ^18 v`ny hnh nttyk hyvm ljyr mb&r vljmvd brzl vlxmvt nxst jl-kl- h`r&
   lmlky yhvdh lsryh lkhnyh vljm h`r&.

   ^19 vnlxmv `lyk vl`-yvklv lk ky-`tk `ny n`m-yhvh lh&ylk.
     __________________________________________________________________

  Chapter 2

   ^1 vyhy dbr-yhvh `ly l`mr.

   ^2 hlk vqr`t b`zny yrvslm l`mr kh `mr yhvh zkrty lk x$d njvryk `hbt
   klvltyk lktk `xry bmdbr b`r& l` zrvjh.

   ^3 qds ysr`l lyhvh r`syt tbv`th kl-`klyv y`smv rjh tb` `lyhm n`m- yhvh.

   ^4 smjv dbr-yhvh byt yjqb vkl-mspxvt byt ysr`l.

   ^5 kh `mr yhvh mh-m&`v `bvtykm by jvl ky rxqv mjly vylkv `xry hhbl
   vyhblv.

   ^6 vl` `mrv `yh yhvh hmjlh `tnv m`r& m&rym hmvlyk `tnv bmdbr b`r& jrbh
   vsvxh b`r& &yh v&lmvt b`r& l`-jbr bh `ys vl`-ysb `dm sm.

   ^7 v`by` `tkm `l-`r& hkrml l`kl pryh v+vbh vtb`v vt+m`v `t-`r&y vnxlty
   smtm ltvjbh.

   ^8 hkhnym l` `mrv `yh yhvh vtpsy htvrh l` ydjvny vhrjym psjv by
   vhnby`ym nb`v bbjl v`xry l`-yvjlv hlkv.

   ^9 lkn jd `ryb `tkm n`m-yhvh v`t-bny bnykm `ryb.

   ^10 ky jbrv `yy ktyym vr`v vqdr slxv vhtbvnnv m`d vr`v hn hyth kz`t.

   ^11 hhymyr gvy `lhym vhmh l` `lhym vjmy hmyr kbvdv blv` yvjyl.

   ^12 smv smym jl-z`t vsjrv xrbv m`d n`m-yhvh.

   ^13 ky-stym rjvt jsh jmy `ty jzbv mqvr mym xyym lx&b lhm b`rvt b`rt
   nsbrym `sr l`-yklv hmym.

   ^14 hjbd ysr`l `m-ylyd byt hv` mdvj hyh lbz.

   ^15 jlyv ys`gv kprym ntnv qvlm vysytv `r&v lsmh jryv n&th mbly ysb.

   ^16 gm-bny-np vtxpn$ yrjvk qdqd.

   ^17 hlv`-z`t tjsh-lk jzbk `t-yhvh `lhyk bjt mvlykk bdrk.

   ^18 vjth mh-lk ldrk m&rym lstvt my sxvr vmh-lk ldrk `svr lstvt my nhr.

   ^19 ty$rk rjtk vmsbvtyk tvkxk vdjy vr`y ky-rj vmr jzbk `t-yhvh `lhyk
   vl` pxdty `lyk n`m-`dny yhvh &b`vt.

   ^20 ky mjvlm sbrty jlk ntqty mv$rtyk vt`mry l` `jbd ky jl-kl- gbjh gbhh
   vtxt kl-j& rjnn `t &jh znh.

   ^21 v`nky n+jtyk srq klh zrj `mt v`yk nhpkt ly $vry hgpn nkryh.

   ^22 ky `m-tkb$y bntr vtrby-lk bryt nktm jvnk lpny n`m `dny yhvh.

   ^23 `yk t`mry l` n+m`ty `xry hbjlym l` hlkty r`y drkk bgy` djy mh jsyt
   bkrh qlh msrkt drkyh.

   ^24 prh lmd mdbr b`vt npsv s`ph rvx t`nth my ysybnh kl-mbqsyh l` yyjpv
   bxdsh ym&`vnh.

   ^25 mnjy rglk myxp vgvrnk m&m`h vt`mry nv`s lv` ky-`hbty zrym v`xryhm
   `lk.

   ^26 kbst gnb ky ym&` kn hbysv byt ysr`l hmh mlkyhm sryhm vkhnyhm
   vnby`yhm.

   ^27 `mrym lj& `by `th vl`bn `t yldtny ky-pnv `ly jrp vl` pnym vbjt rjtm
   y`mrv qvmh vhvsyjnv.

   ^28 v`yh `lhyk `sr jsyt lk yqvmv `m-yvsyjvk bjt rjtk ky m$pr jryk hyv
   `lhyk yhvdh.

   ^29 lmh trybv `ly klkm psjtm by n`m-yhvh.

   ^30 lsv` hkyty `t-bnykm mv$r l` lqxv `klh xrbkm nby`ykm k`ryh msxyt.

   ^31 hdvr `tm r`v dbr-yhvh hmdbr hyyty lysr`l `m `r& m`plyh mdvj `mrv
   jmy rdnv lv`-nbv` jvd `lyk.

   ^32 htskx btvlh jdyh klh qsryh vjmy skxvny ymym `yn m$pr.

   ^33 mh-ty+by drkk lbqs `hbh lkn gm `t-hrjvt lmdty `t-drkyk.

   ^34 gm bknpyk nm&`v dm npsvt `byvnym nqyym l`-bmxtrt m&`tym ky
   jl-kl-`lh.

   ^35 vt`mry ky nqyty `k sb `pv mmny hnny nsp+ `vtk jl-`mrk l` x+`ty.

   ^36 mh-tzly m`d lsnvt `t-drkk gm mm&rym tbvsy k`sr-bst m`svr.

   ^37 gm m`t zh t&`y vydyk jl-r`sk ky-m`$ yhvh bmb+xyk vl` t&lyxy lhm.

  Chapter 3

   ^1 l`mr hn yslx `ys `t-`stv vhlkh m`tv vhyth l`ys-`xr hysvb `lyh jvd
   hlv` xnvp txnp h`r& hhy` v`t znyt rjym rbym vsvb `ly n`m- yhvh.

   ^2 s`y-jynyk jl-spym vr`y `yph l` sglt jl-drkym ysbt lhm kjrby bmdbr
   vtxnypy `r& bznvtyk vbrjtk.

   ^3 vymnjv rbbym vmlqvs lv` hyh vm&x `sh zvnh hyh lk m`nt hklm.

   ^4 hlv` mjth qr`ty ly `by `lvp njry `th.

   ^5 hyn+r ljvlm `m-ysmr ln&x hnh dbrty vtjsy hrjvt vtvkl.

   ^6 vy`mr yhvh `ly bymy y`syhv hmlk hr`yt `sr jsth msbh ysr`l hlkh hy`
   jl-kl-hr gbh v`l-txt kl-j& rjnn vtzny-sm.

   ^7 v`mr `xry jsvth `t-kl-`lh `ly tsvb vl`-sbh vtr`h bgvdh `xvth yhvdh.

   ^8 v`r` ky jl-kl-`dvt `sr n`ph msbh ysr`l slxtyh v`tn `t-$pr kryttyh
   `lyh vl` yr`h bgdh yhvdh `xvth vtlk vtzn gm-hy`.

   ^9 vhyh mql znvth vtxnp `t-h`r& vtn`p `t-h`bn v`t-hj&.

   ^10 vgm-bkl-z`t l`-sbh `ly bgvdh `xvth yhvdh bkl-lbh ky `m-bsqr
   n`m-yhvh.

   ^11 vy`mr yhvh `ly &dqh npsh msbh ysr`l mbgdh yhvdh.

   ^12 hlk vqr`t `t-hdbrym h`lh &pvnh v`mrt svbh msbh ysr`l n`m- yhvh
   lv`-`pyl pny bkm ky-x$yd `ny n`m-yhvh l` `+vr ljvlm.

   ^13 `k djy jvnk ky byhvh `lhyk psjt vtpzry `t-drkyk lzrym txt kl- j&
   rjnn vbqvly l`-smjtm n`m-yhvh.

   ^14 svbv bnym svbbym n`m-yhvh ky `nky bjlty bkm vlqxty `tkm `xd mjyr
   vsnym mmspxh vhb`ty `tkm &yvn.

   ^15 vntty lkm rjym klby vrjv `tkm djh vhskyl.

   ^16 vhyh ky trbv vprytm b`r& bymym hhmh n`m-yhvh l`-y`mrv jvd `rvn
   bryt-yhvh vl` yjlh jl-lb vl` yzkrv-bv vl` ypqdv vl` yjsh jvd.

   ^17 bjt hhy` yqr`v lyrvslm k$` yhvh vnqvv `lyh kl-hgvym lsm yhvh
   lyrvslm vl`-ylkv jvd `xry srrvt lbm hrj.

   ^18 bymym hhmh ylkv byt-yhvdh jl-byt ysr`l vyb`v yxdv m`r& &pvn jl-h`r&
   `sr hnxlty `t-`bvtykm.

   ^19 v`nky `mrty `yk `sytk bbnym v`tn-lk `r& xmdh nxlt &by &b`vt gvym
   v`mr `by tqr`v-ly vm`xry l` tsvbv.

   ^20 `kn bgdh `sh mrjh kn bgdtm by byt ysr`l n`m-yhvh.

   ^21 qvl jl-spyym nsmj bky txnvny bny ysr`l ky hjvv `t-drkm skxv `t-yhvh
   `lhyhm.

   ^22 svbv bnym svbbym `rph msvbtykm hnnv `tnv lk ky `th yhvh `lhynv.

   ^23 `kn lsqr mgbjvt hmvn hrym `kn byhvh `lhynv tsvjt ysr`l.

   ^24 vhbst `klh `t-ygyj `bvtynv mnjvrynv `t-&`nm v`t-bqrm `t- bnyhm
   v`t-bnvtyhm.

   ^25 nskbh bbstnv vtk$nv klmtnv ky lyhvh `lhynv x+`nv `nxnv v`bvtynv
   mnjvrynv vjd-hyvm hzh vl` smjnv bqvl yhvh `lhynv.

  Chapter 4

   ^1 `m-tsvb ysr`l n`m-yhvh `ly tsvb v`m-t$yr sqv&yk mpny vl` tnvd.

   ^2 vnsbjt xy-yhvh b`mt bmsp+ vb&dqh vhtbrkv bv gvym vbv ythllv.

   ^3 ky-kh `mr yhvh l`ys yhvdh vlyrvslm nyrv lkm nyr v`l-tzrjv `l- qv&ym.

   ^4 hmlv lyhvh vh$rv jrlvt lbbkm `ys yhvdh vysby yrvslm pn-t&` k`s xmty
   vbjrh v`yn mkbh mpny rj mjllykm.

   ^5 hgydv byhvdh vbyrvslm hsmyjv v`mrv vtqjv svpr b`r& qr`v ml`v v`mrv
   h`$pv vnbv`h `l-jry hmb&r.

   ^6 s`v-n$ &yvnh hjyzv `l-tjmdv ky rjh `nky mby` m&pvn vsbr gdvl.

   ^7 jlh `ryh m$bkv vmsxyt gvym n$j y&` mmqmv lsvm `r&k lsmh jryk t&ynh
   m`yn yvsb.

   ^8 jl-z`t xgrv sqym $pdv vhylylv ky l`-sb xrvn `p-yhvh mmnv.

   ^9 vhyh byvm-hhv` n`m-yhvh y`bd lb-hmlk vlb hsrym vnsmv hkhnym vhnby`ym
   ytmhv.

   ^10 v`mr `hh `dny yhvh `kn hs` hs`t ljm hzh vlyrvslm l`mr slvm yhyh lkm
   vngjh xrb jd-hnps.

   ^11 bjt hhy` y`mr ljm-hzh vlyrvslm rvx &x spyym bmdbr drk bt-jmy lv`
   lzrvt vlv` lhbr.

   ^12 rvx ml` m`lh ybv` ly jth gm-`ny `dbr msp+ym `vtm.

   ^13 hnh kjnnym yjlh vk$vph mrkbvtyv qlv mnsrym $v$yv `vy lnv ky sddnv.

   ^14 kb$y mrjh lbk yrvslm lmjn tvsjy jd-mty tlyn bqrbk mxsbvt `vnk.

   ^15 ky qvl mgyd mdn vmsmyj `vn mhr `prym.

   ^16 hzkyrv lgvym hnh hsmyjv jl-yrvslm n&rym b`ym m`r& hmrxq vytnv
   jl-jry yhvdh qvlm.

   ^17 ksmry sdy hyv jlyh m$byb ky-`ty mrth n`m-yhvh.

   ^18 drkk vmjllyk jsv `lh lk z`t rjtk ky mr ky ngj jd-lbk.

   ^19 mjy mjy `xvlh qyrvt lby hmh-ly lby l` `xrys ky qvl svpr smjty npsy
   trvjt mlxmh.

   ^20 sbr jl-sbr nqr` ky sddh kl-h`r& pt`m sddv `hly rgj yryjty.

   ^21 jd-mty `r`h-n$ `smjh qvl svpr.

   ^22 ky `vyl jmy `vty l` ydjv bnym $klym hmh vl` nbvnym hmh xkmym hmh
   lhrj vlhy+yb l` ydjv.

   ^23 r`yty `t-h`r& vhnh-thv vbhv v`l-hsmym v`yn `vrm.

   ^24 r`yty hhrym vhnh rjsym vkl-hgbjvt htqlqlv.

   ^25 r`yty vhnh `yn h`dm vkl-jvp hsmym nddv.

   ^26 r`yty vhnh hkrml hmdbr vkl-jryv nt&v mpny yhvh mpny xrvn `pv.

   ^27 ky-kh `mr yhvh smmh thyh kl-h`r& vklh l` `jsh.

   ^28 jl-z`t t`bl h`r& vqdrv hsmym mmjl jl ky-dbrty zmty vl` nxmty
   vl`-`svb mmnh.

   ^29 mqvl prs vrmh qst brxt kl-hjyr b`v bjbym vbkpym jlv kl-hjyr jzvbh
   v`yn-yvsb bhn `ys.

   ^30 v`ty sdvd mh-tjsy ky-tlbsy sny ky-tjdy jdy-zhb ky-tqrjy bpvk jynyk
   lsv` ttypy m`$v-bk jgbym npsk ybqsv.

   ^31 ky qvl kxvlh smjty &rh kmbkyrh qvl bt-&yvn ttypx tprs kpyh `vy-n`
   ly ky-jyph npsy lhrgym.

  Chapter 5

   ^1 sv++v bxv&vt yrvslm vr`v-n` vdjv vbqsv brxvbvtyh `m-tm&`v `ys `m-ys
   jsh msp+ mbqs `mvnh v`$lx lh.

   ^2 v`m xy-yhvh y`mrv lkn lsqr ysbjv.

   ^3 yhvh jynyk hlv` l`mvnh hkyth `tm vl`-xlv klytm m`nv qxt mv$r xzqv
   pnyhm m$lj m`nv lsvb.

   ^4 v`ny `mrty `k-dlym hm nv`lv ky l` ydjv drk yhvh msp+ `lhyhm.

   ^5 `lkh-ly `l-hgdlym v`dbrh `vtm ky hmh ydjv drk yhvh msp+ `lhyhm `k
   hmh yxdv sbrv jl ntqv mv$rvt.

   ^6 jl-kn hkm `ryh myjr z`b jrbvt ysddm nmr sqd jl-jryhm kl-hyv&` mhnh
   y+rp ky rbv psjyhm j&mv msbvtyhm.

   ^7 `y lz`t `$lvx-lk bnyk jzbvny vysbjv bl` `lhym v`sbj `vtm vyn`pv vbyt
   zvnh ytgddv.

   ^8 $v$ym myznym mskym hyv `ys `l-`st rjhv y&hlv.

   ^9 hjl-`lh lv`-`pqd n`m-yhvh v`m bgvy `sr-kzh l` ttnqm npsy.

   ^10 jlv bsrvtyh vsxtv vklh `l-tjsv h$yrv n+ysvtyh ky lv` lyhvh hmh.

   ^11 ky bgvd bgdv by byt ysr`l vbyt yhvdh n`m-yhvh.

   ^12 kxsv byhvh vy`mrv l`-hv` vl`-tbv` jlynv rjh vxrb vrjb lv` nr`h.

   ^13 vhnby`ym yhyv lrvx vhdbr `yn bhm kh yjsh lhm.

   ^14 lkn kh-`mr yhvh `lhy &b`vt yjn dbrkm `t-hdbr hzh hnny ntn dbry bpyk
   l`s vhjm hzh j&ym v`kltm.

   ^15 hnny mby` jlykm gvy mmrxq byt ysr`l n`m-yhvh gvy `ytn hv` gvy mjvlm
   hv` gvy l`-tdj lsnv vl` tsmj mh-ydbr.

   ^16 `sptv kqbr ptvx klm gbvrym.

   ^17 v`kl q&yrk vlxmk y`klv bnyk vbnvtyk y`kl &`nk vbqrk y`kl gpnk
   vt`ntk yrss jry mb&ryk `sr `th bv+x bhnh bxrb.

   ^18 vgm bymym hhmh n`m-yhvh l`-`jsh `tkm klh.

   ^19 vhyh ky t`mrv txt mh jsh yhvh `lhynv lnv `t-kl-`lh v`mrt `lyhm k`sr
   jzbtm `vty vtjbdv `lhy nkr b`r&km kn tjbdv zrym b`r& l` lkm.

   ^20 hgydv z`t bbyt yjqb vhsmyjvh byhvdh l`mr.

   ^21 smjv-n` z`t jm $kl v`yn lb jynym lhm vl` yr`v `znym lhm vl` ysmjv.

   ^22 h`vty l`-tyr`v n`m-yhvh `m mpny l` txylv `sr-smty xvl gbvl lym
   xq-jvlm vl` yjbrnhv vytgjsv vl` yvklv vhmv glyv vl` yjbrnhv.

   ^23 vljm hzh hyh lb $vrr vmvrh $rv vylkv.

   ^24 vl`-`mrv blbbm nyr` n` `t-yhvh `lhynv hntn gsm vyrh vmlqvs bjtv
   sbjvt xqvt q&yr ysmr-lnv.

   ^25 jvnvtykm h+v-`lh vx+`vtykm mnjv h+vb mkm.

   ^26 ky-nm&`v bjmy rsjym ysvr ksk yqvsym h&ybv msxyt `nsym ylkdv.

   ^27 kklvb ml` jvp kn btyhm ml`ym mrmh jl-kn gdlv vyjsyrv.

   ^28 smnv jstv gm jbrv dbry-rj dyn l`-dnv dyn ytvm vy&lyxv vmsp+ `byvnym
   l` sp+v.

   ^29 hjl-`lh l`-`pqd n`m-yhvh `m bgvy `sr-kzh l` ttnqm npsy.

   ^30 smh vsjrvrh nhyth b`r&.

   ^31 hnby`ym nb`v-bsqr vhkhnym yrdv jl-ydyhm vjmy `hbv kn vmh- tjsv
   l`xryth.

  Chapter 6

   ^1 hjzv bny bnymn mqrb yrvslm vbtqvj tqjv svpr vjl-byt hkrm s`v ms`t ky
   rjh nsqph m&pvn vsbr gdvl.

   ^2 hnvh vhmjngh dmyty bt-&yvn.

   ^3 `lyh yb`v rjym vjdryhm tqjv jlyh `hlym $byb rjv `ys `t-ydv.

   ^4 qdsv jlyh mlxmh qvmv vnjlh b&hrym `vy lnv ky-pnh hyvm ky yn+v
   &lly-jrb.

   ^5 qvmv vnjlh blylh vnsxyth `rmnvtyh.

   ^6 ky kh `mr yhvh &b`vt krtv j&h vspkv jl-yrvslm $llh hy` hjyr hpqd klh
   jsq bqrbh.

   ^7 khqyr bvr mymyh kn hqrh rjth xm$ vsd ysmj bh jl-pny tmyd xly vmkh.

   ^8 hv$ry yrvslm pn-tqj npsy mmk pn-`symk smmh `r& lv` nvsbh.

   ^9 kh `mr yhvh &b`vt jvll yjvllv kgpn s`ryt ysr`l hsb ydk kbv&r
   jl-$l$lvt.

   ^10 jl-my `dbrh v`jydh vysmjv hnh jrlh `znm vl` yvklv lhqsyb hnh
   dbr-yhvh hyh lhm lxrph l` yxp&v-bv.

   ^11 v`t xmt yhvh ml`ty nl`yty hkyl spk jl-jvll bxv& vjl $vd bxvrym yxdv
   ky-gm-`ys jm-`sh ylkdv zqn jm-ml` ymym.

   ^12 vn$bv btyhm l`xrym sdvt vnsym yxdv ky-`+h `t-ydy jl-ysby h`r&
   n`m-yhvh.

   ^13 ky mq+nm vjd-gdvlm klv bv&j b&j vmnby` vjd-khn klv jsh sqr.

   ^14 vyrp`v `t-sbr jmy jl-nqlh l`mr slvm slvm v`yn slvm.

   ^15 hbysv ky tvjbh jsv gm-bvs l`-ybvsv gm-hklym l` ydjv lkn yplv bnplym
   bjt-pqdtym ykslv `mr yhvh.

   ^16 kh `mr yhvh jmdv jl-drkym vr`v vs`lv lntbvt jvlm `y-zh drk h+vb
   vlkv-bh vm&`v mrgvj lnpskm vy`mrv l` nlk.

   ^17 vhqmty jlykm &pym hqsybv lqvl svpr vy`mrv l` nqsyb.

   ^18 lkn smjv hgvym vdjy jdh `t-`sr-bm.

   ^19 smjy h`r& hnh `nky mby` rjh `l-hjm hzh pry mxsbvtm ky jl- dbry l`
   hqsybv vtvrty vym`$v-bh.

   ^20 lmh-zh ly lbvnh msb` tbv` vqnh h+vb m`r& mrxq jlvtykm l` lr&vn
   vzbxykm l`-jrbv ly.

   ^21 lkn kh `mr yhvh hnny ntn `l-hjm hzh mkslym vkslv bm `bvt vbnym yxdv
   skn vrjv y`bdv.

   ^22 kh `mr yhvh hnh jm b` m`r& &pvn vgvy gdvl yjvr myrkty-`r&.

   ^23 qst vkydvn yxzyqv `kzry hv` vl` yrxmv qvlm kym yhmh vjl- $v$ym
   yrkbv jrvk k`ys lmlxmh jlyk bt-&yvn.

   ^24 smjnv `t-smjv rpv ydynv &rh hxzyqtnv xyl kyvldh.

   ^25 `l-t&`y hsdh vbdrk `l-tlky ky xrb l`yb mgvr m$byb.

   ^26 bt-jmy xgry-sq vhtplsy b`pr `bl yxyd jsy lk m$pd tmrvrym ky pt`m
   yb` hsdd jlynv.

   ^27 bxvn nttyk bjmy mb&r vtdj vbxnt `t-drkm.

   ^28 klm $ry $vrrym hlky rkyl nxst vbrzl klm msxytym hmh.

   ^29 nxr mpx m`stm jprt lsv` &rp &rvp vrjym l` ntqv.

   ^30 k$p nm`$ qr`v lhm ky-m`$ yhvh bhm.

  Chapter 7

   ^1 hdbr `sr hyh `l-yrmyhv m`t yhvh l`mr.

   ^2 jmd bsjr byt yhvh vqr`t sm `t-hdbr hzh v`mrt smjv dbr-yhvh kl- yhvdh
   hb`ym bsjrym h`lh lhstxvt lyhvh.

   ^3 kh-`mr yhvh &b`vt `lhy ysr`l hy+ybv drkykm vmjllykm v`sknh `tkm
   bmqvm hzh.

   ^4 `l-tb+xv lkm `l-dbry hsqr l`mr hykl yhvh hykl yhvh hykl yhvh hmh.

   ^5 ky `m-hy+yb ty+ybv `t-drkykm v`t-mjllykm `m-jsv tjsv msp+ byn `ys
   vbyn rjhv.

   ^6 gr ytvm v`lmnh l` tjsqv vdm nqy `l-tspkv bmqvm hzh v`xry `lhym `xrym
   l` tlkv lrj lkm.

   ^7 vsknty `tkm bmqvm hzh b`r& `sr ntty l`bvtykm lmn-jvlm vjd- jvlm.

   ^8 hnh `tm b+xym lkm jl-dbry hsqr lblty hvjyl.

   ^9 hgnb r&x vn`p vhsbj lsqr vq+r lbjl vhlk `xry `lhym `xrym `sr
   l`-ydjtm.

   ^10 vb`tm vjmdtm lpny bbyt hzh `sr nqr`-smy jlyv v`mrtm n&lnv lmjn jsvt
   `t kl-htvjbvt h`lh.

   ^11 hmjrt pr&ym hyh hbyt hzh `sr-nqr`-smy jlyv bjynykm gm `nky hnh
   r`yty n`m-yhvh.

   ^12 ky lkv-n` `l-mqvmy `sr bsylv `sr sknty smy sm br`svnh vr`v `t
   `sr-jsyty lv mpny rjt jmy ysr`l.

   ^13 vjth yjn jsvtkm `t-kl-hmjsym h`lh n`m-yhvh v`dbr `lykm hskm vdbr
   vl` smjtm v`qr` `tkm vl` jnytm.

   ^14 vjsyty lbyt `sr nqr`-smy jlyv `sr `tm b+xym bv vlmqvm `sr- ntty lkm
   vl`bvtykm k`sr jsyty lslv.

   ^15 vhslkty `tkm mjl pny k`sr hslkty `t-kl-`xykm `t kl-zrj `prym.

   ^16 v`th `l-ttpll bjd-hjm hzh v`l-ts` bjdm rnh vtplh v`l-tpgj-by
   ky-`ynny smj `tk.

   ^17 h`ynk r`h mh hmh jsym bjry yhvdh vbx&vt yrvslm.

   ^18 hbnym mlq+ym j&ym vh`bvt mbjrym `t-h`s vhnsym lsvt b&q ljsvt kvnym
   lmlkt hsmym vh$k n$kym l`lhym `xrym lmjn hkj$ny.

   ^19 h`ty hm mkj$ym n`m-yhvh hlv` `tm lmjn bst pnyhm.

   ^20 lkn kh-`mr `dny yhvh hnh `py vxmty ntkt `l-hmqvm hzh jl-h`dm
   vjl-hbhmh vjl-j& hsdh vjl-pry h`dmh vbjrh vl` tkbh.

   ^21 kh `mr yhvh &b`vt `lhy ysr`l jlvtykm $pv jl-zbxykm v`klv bsr.

   ^22 ky l`-dbrty `t-`bvtykm vl` &vytym byvm hv&y` `vtm m`r& m&rym
   jl-dbry jvlh vzbx.

   ^23 ky `m-`t-hdbr hzh &vyty `vtm l`mr smjv bqvly vhyyty lkm l`lhym v`tm
   thyv-ly ljm vhlktm bkl-hdrk `sr `&vh `tkm lmjn yy+b lkm.

   ^24 vl` smjv vl`-h+v `t-`znm vylkv bmj&vt bsrrvt lbm hrj vyhyv l`xvr
   vl` lpnym.

   ^25 lmn-hyvm `sr y&`v `bvtykm m`r& m&rym jd hyvm hzh v`slx `lykm
   `t-kl-jbdy hnby`ym yvm hskm vslx.

   ^26 vlv` smjv `ly vl` h+v `t-`znm vyqsv `t-jrpm hrjv m`bvtm.

   ^27 vdbrt `lyhm `t-kl-hdbrym h`lh vl` ysmjv `lyk vqr`t `lyhm vl`
   yjnvkh.

   ^28 v`mrt `lyhm zh hgvy `sr lv`-smjv bqvl yhvh `lhyv vl` lqxv mv$r `bdh
   h`mvnh vnkrth mpyhm.

   ^29 gzy nzrk vhslyky vs`y jl-spym qynh ky m`$ yhvh vy+s `t-dvr jbrtv.

   ^30 ky-jsv bny-yhvdh hrj bjyny n`vm-yhvh smv sqv&yhm bbyt `sr- nqr`-smy
   jlyv l+m`v.

   ^31 vbnv bmvt htpt `sr bgy` bn-hnm lsrp `t-bnyhm v`t-bntyhm b`s `sr l`
   &vyty vl` jlth jl-lby.

   ^32 lkn hnh-ymym b`ym n`m-yhvh vl`-y`mr jvd htpt vgy` bn-hnm ky `m-gy`
   hhrgh vqbrv btpt m`yn mqvm.

   ^33 vhyth nblt hjm hzh lm`kl ljvp hsmym vlbhmt h`r& v`yn mxryd.

   ^34 vhsbty mjry yhvdh vmx&vt yrvslm qvl ssvn vqvl smxh qvl xtn vqvl klh
   ky lxrbh thyh h`r&.

  Chapter 8

   ^1 bjt hhy` n`m-yhvh vy&y`v `t-j&mvt mlky-yhvdh v`t-j&mvt-sryv
   v`t-j&mvt hkhnym v`t j&mvt hnby`ym v`t j&mvt yvsby-yrvslm mqbryhm.

   ^2 vs+xvm lsms vlyrx vlkl &b` hsmym `sr `hbvm v`sr jbdvm v`sr hlkv
   `xryhm v`sr drsvm v`sr hstxvv lhm l` y`$pv vl` yqbrv ldmn jl-pny h`dmh
   yhyv.

   ^3 vnbxr mvt mxyym lkl hs`ryt hns`rym mn-hmspxh hrjh hz`t bkl- hmqmvt
   hns`rym `sr hdxtym sm n`m yhvh &b`vt.

   ^4 v`mrt `lyhm kh `mr yhvh hyplv vl` yqvmv `m-ysvb vl` ysvb.

   ^5 mdvj svbbh hjm hzh yrvslm msbh n&xt hxzyqv btrmyt m`nv lsvb.

   ^6 hqsbty v`smj lv`-kn ydbrv `yn `ys nxm jl-rjtv l`mr mh jsyty klh sb
   bmr&vtm k$v$ sv+p bmlxmh.

   ^7 gm-x$ydh bsmym ydjh mvjdyh vtr v$v$ vjgvr smrv `t-jt b`nh vjmy l`
   ydjv `t msp+ yhvh.

   ^8 `ykh t`mrv xkmym `nxnv vtvrt yhvh `tnv `kn hnh lsqr jsh j+ sqr
   $prym.

   ^9 hbysv xkmym xtv vylkdv hnh bdbr-yhvh m`$v vxkmt-mh lhm.

   ^10 lkn `tn `t-nsyhm l`xrym sdvtyhm lyvrsym ky mq+n vjd-gdvl klh b&j
   b&j mnby` vjd-khn klh jsh sqr.

   ^11 vyrpv `t-sbr bt-jmy jl-nqlh l`mr slvm slvm v`yn slvm.

   ^12 hbsv ky tvjbh jsv gm-bvs l`-ybsv vhklm l` ydjv lkn yplv bnplym bjt
   pqdtm ykslv `mr yhvh.

   ^13 `$p `$ypm n`m-yhvh `yn jnbym bgpn v`yn t`nym bt`nh vhjlh nbl v`tn
   lhm yjbrvm.

   ^14 jl-mh `nxnv ysbym h`$pv vnbv` `l-jry hmb&r vndmh-sm ky yhvh `lhynv
   hdmnv vysqnv my-r`s ky x+`nv lyhvh.

   ^15 qvh lslvm v`yn +vb ljt mrph vhnh bjth.

   ^16 mdn nsmj nxrt $v$yv mqvl m&hlvt `byryv rjsh kl-h`r& vybv`v vy`klv
   `r& vmlv`h jyr vysby bh.

   ^17 ky hnny mslx bkm nxsym &pjnym `sr `yn-lhm lxs vnskv `tkm n`m- yhvh.

   ^18 mblygyty jly ygvn jly lby dvy.

   ^19 hnh-qvl svjt bt-jmy m`r& mrxqym hyhvh `yn b&yvn `m-mlkh `yn bh mdvj
   hkj$vny bp$lyhm bhbly nkr.

   ^20 jbr q&yr klh qy& v`nxnv lv` nvsjnv.

   ^21 jl-sbr bt-jmy hsbrty qdrty smh hxzqtny.

   ^22 h&ry `yn bgljd `m-rp` `yn sm ky mdvj l` jlth `rkt bt-jmy.

   ^23 my-ytn r`sy mym vjyny mqvr dmjh v`bkh yvmm vlylh `t xlly bt- jmy.

  Chapter 9

   yhlk.

   ^10 vntty `t-yrvslm lglym mjvn tnym v`t-jry yhvdh `tn smmh mbly yvsb.

   h`r& n&th kmdbr mbly jbr.

   bh.

   ^13 vylkv `xry srrvt lbm v`xry hbjlym `sr lmdvm `bvtm.

   vhsqytym my-r`s.

   klvty `vtm.

   ^16 kh `mr yhvh &b`vt htbvnnv vqr`v lmqvnnvt vtbv`ynh v`l-hxkmvt slxv
   vtbv`nh.

   ^17 vtmhrnh vtsnh jlynv nhy vtrdnh jynynv dmjh vjpjpynv yzlv- mym.

   msknvtynv.

   v`yn m`$p.

   ^24 hnh ymym b`ym n`m-yhvh vpqdty jl-kl-mvl bjrlh.

  Chapter 10

   ^1 smjv `t-hdbr `sr dbr yhvh jlykm byt ysr`l.

   ^2 kh `mr yhvh `l-drk hgvym `l-tlmdv vm`tvt hsmym `l-txtv ky- yxtv
   hgvym mhmh.

   ^3 ky-xqvt hjmym hbl hv` ky-j& myjr krtv mjsh ydy-xrs bmj&d.

   ^4 bk$p vbzhb yyphv bm$mrvt vbmqbvt yxzqvm vlv` ypyq.

   ^5 ktmr mqsh hmh vl` ydbrv nsv` ynsv` ky l` y&jdv `l-tyr`v mhm ky-l`
   yrjv vgm-hy+yb `yn `vtm.

   ^6 m`yn kmvk yhvh gdvl `th vgdvl smk bgbvrh.

   ^7 my l` yr`k mlk hgvym ky lk y`th ky bkl-xkmy hgvym vbkl-mlkvtm m`yn
   kmvk.

   ^8 vb`xt ybjrv vyk$lv mv$r hblym j& hv`.

   ^9 k$p mrqj mtrsys yvb` vzhb m`vpz mjsh xrs vydy &vrp tklt v`rgmn lbvsm
   mjsh xkmym klm.

   gvym zjmv.

   smy` `lh.

   ^12 jsh `r& bkxv mkyn tbl bxkmtv vbtbvntv n+h smym.

   ^13 lqvl ttv hmvn mym bsmym vyjlh ns`ym mq&h `r& brqym lm+r jsh vyv&`
   rvx m`&rtyv.

   ^14 nbjr kl-`dm mdjt hbys kl-&vrp mp$l ky sqr n$kv vl`-rvx bm.

   ^15 hbl hmh mjsh tjtjym bjt pqdtm y`bdv.

   ^16 l`-k`lh xlq yjqb ky-yv&r hkl hv` vysr`l sb+ nxltv yhvh &b`vt smv.

   ^17 `$py m`r& knjtk ysbty bm&vr.

   ^18 ky-kh `mr yhvh hnny qvlj `t-yvsby h`r& bpjm hz`t vh&rvty lhm lmjn
   ym&`v.

   ^19 `vy ly jl-sbry nxlh mkty v`ny `mrty `k zh xly v`s`nv.

   ^20 `hly sdd vkl-mytry ntqv bny y&`ny v`ynm `yn-n+h jvd `hly vmqym
   yryjvty.

   ^21 ky nbjrv hrjym v`t-yhvh l` drsv jl-kn l` hskylv vkl-mrjytm npv&h.

   ^22 qvl smvjh hnh b`h vrjs gdvl m`r& &pvn lsvm `t-jry yhvdh smmh mjvn
   tnym.

   ^23 ydjty yhvh ky l` l`dm drkv l`-l`ys hlk vhkyn `t-&jdv.

   ^24 y$rny yhvh `k-bmsp+ `l-b`pk pn-tmj+ny.

   ^25 spk xmtk jl-hgvym `sr l`-ydjvk vjl mspxvt `sr bsmk l` qr`v ky-`klv
   `t-yjqb v`klhv vyklhv v`t-nvhv hsmv.

  Chapter 11

   ^1 hdbr `sr hyh `l-yrmyhv m`t yhvh l`mr.

   ^2 smjv `t-dbry hbryt hz`t vdbrtm `l-`ys yhvdh vjl-ysby yrvslm.

   hbryt hz`t.

   ^4 `sr &vyty `t-`bvtykm byvm hv&y`y-`vtm m`r&-m&rym mkvr hbrzl l`mr
   smjv bqvly vjsytm `vtm kkl `sr-`&vh `tkm vhyytm ly ljm v`nky `hyh lkm
   l`lhym.

   kyvm hzh v`jn v`mr `mn yhvh.

   ^6 vy`mr yhvh `ly qr` `t-kl-hdbrym h`lh bjry yhvdh vbx&vt yrvslm l`mr
   smjv `t-dbry hbryt hz`t vjsytm `vtm.

   ^7 ky hjd hjdty b`bvtykm byvm hjlvty `vtm m`r& m&rym vjd-hyvm hzh hskm
   vhjd l`mr smjv bqvly.

   ^8 vl` smjv vl`-h+v `t-`znm vylkv `ys bsryrvt lbm hrj v`by` jlyhm

   ^9 vy`mr yhvh `ly nm&`-qsr b`ys yhvdh vbysby yrvslm.

   ^10 sbv jl-jvnt `bvtm hr`snym `sr m`nv lsmvj `t-dbry vhmh hlkv `xry
   `lhym `xrym ljbdm hprv byt-ysr`l vbyt yhvdh `t-bryty `sr krty `t-`bvtm.

   ^11 lkn kh `mr yhvh hnny mby` `lyhm rjh `sr l`-yvklv l&`t mmnh vzjqv
   `ly vl` `smj `lyhm.

   ^12 vhlkv jry yhvdh vysby yrvslm vzjqv `l-h`lhym `sr hm mq+rym lhm
   vhvsj l`-yvsyjv lhm bjt rjtm.

   ^13 ky m$pr jryk hyv `lhyk yhvdh vm$pr x&vt yrvslm smtm mzbxvt lbst
   mzbxvt lq+r lbjl.

   ^14 v`th `l-ttpll bjd-hjm hzh v`l-ts` bjdm rnh vtplh ky `ynny smj bjt
   qr`m `ly bjd rjtm.

   ^15 mh lydydy bbyty jsvth hmzmth hrbym vbsr-qds yjbrv mjlyk ky rjtky `z
   tjlzy.

   ^16 zyt rjnn yph pry-t`r qr` yhvh smk lqvl hmvlh gdlh h&yt `s jlyh vrjv
   dlyvtyv.

   ^17 vyhvh &b`vt hnv+j `vtk dbr jlyk rjh bgll rjt byt-ysr`l vbyt yhvdh
   `sr jsv lhm lhkj$ny lq+r lbjl.

   ^18 vyhvh hvdyjny v`djh `z hr`ytny mjllyhm.

   ^19 v`ny kkbs `lvp yvbl l+bvx vl`-ydjty ky-jly xsbv mxsbvt nsxyth j&
   blxmv vnkrtnv m`r& xyym vsmv l`-yzkr jvd.

   ^20 vyhvh &b`vt sp+ &dq bxn klyvt vlb `r`h nqmtk mhm ky `lyk glyty
   `t-ryby.

   ^21 lkn kh-`mr yhvh jl-`nsy jntvt hmbqsym `t-npsk l`mr l` tnb` bsm yhvh
   vl` tmvt bydnv.

   ^22 lkn kh `mr yhvh &b`vt hnny pqd jlyhm hbxvrym ymtv bxrb bnyhm
   vbnvtyhm ymtv brjb.
